Old-Towers.name: 魔戒
Old-Towers.original_desc: You play as a little explorers in a towers full of deadly traps and ugly skullz. Your only weapons to help you win: quick-thinking and skill.
Old-Towers.desc: 你在充滿致命陷阱和醜陋骷髏的塔樓中扮演小探險家。幫助你獲勝的唯一武器：敏捷的思維和技巧。

Desert Strike - Return to the Gulf (USA,.key: Desert Strike - Return to the Gulf (USA, Europe)
Desert Strike - Return to the Gulf (USA,.original_name: Desert Strike : Return to the Gulf
Desert Strike - Return to the Gulf (USA,.name: 有生之年非玩不可的1001款游戏
Desert Strike - Return to the Gulf (USA,.original_desc:
The first game in the Strike series. A year after the Gulf War, a self styled General named Kilbaba (Muababa in the GBA version) takes over an Arab Emirate and threatens to start WWIII against its enemy in the West, the U.S. The whole world holds their breath as the President chooses you to destroy Kilbaba and his terrorist army before he launches a nuclear attack on the world!

You must fly an specially designed AH-64A Apache on a series of missions from rescuing MIAs, destroying power plants, to blowing apart SCUD missles! Take out his defenses while trying to find out Kilbaba's plans. Take on the Madman and forever rid this threat....in the desert!
Desert Strike - Return to the Gulf (USA,.desc:
美國的科幻恐怖電視劇《怪奇物語》第五季兼最終季的標題取作《怪奇物語5》（英語：Stranger Things 5），於2025年在串流媒體服務平台Netflix首播，並分為三個部分，第一輯於11月26日首播，第二輯於12月25日播出，完結篇將於12月31日播出。本季繼續由杜夫兄弟創作，並由薛恩·李維、丹·科恩和伊安·帕特森執行製作。
主要演員除薇諾娜·瑞德、大衛·哈伯、芬恩·沃夫哈德、米莉·芭比·布朗、蓋頓·馬塔拉佐、迦勒·麥羅林、諾亞·施納普、莎蒂·辛克、娜塔莉亞·戴爾、查理·希頓、喬·奇瑞、戴克·蒙哥馬利、瑪雅·霍克、艾米貝絲·麥克納蒂、普莉亞·弗格森、布瑞特·吉爾曼和卡拉·布歐諾等原班人馬回歸。

Legend of Galahad, The (USA, Europe).name: MP40冲锋枪
Legend of Galahad, The (USA, Europe).original_desc:
The titular hero travels through this platform action game, slashing up mutant creatures with a sword and battling the evil Thanatos in hopes to save the life of Princess Lucanna.

The controls are fairly simple and include jumping, walking or attacking. Collect icons that will help in the enhancement of your armor, gain an extra life and coins to spend in the shop for new weapons. Be sure not to collect any skull icons or else it will call Thanatos' Ethereal Presence where you will have to use Rune Bombs to destroy it. After you complete one of the three worlds, you will be given a password so you can resume later after running out of lives.
Legend of Galahad, The (USA, Europe).desc:
這位名義上的英雄在這款平台動作遊戲中穿行，用劍砍殺變異生物，並與邪惡的塔納托斯作戰，希望拯救盧卡納公主的生命。

控制相當簡單，包括跳躍、行走或攻擊。收集有助於增強你的盔甲的圖標，獲得額外的生命和在商店購買新武器的硬幣。確保不要收集任何骷髏圖標，否則它會調用塔納托斯的空靈存在，你將不得不使用符文炸彈來摧毀它。完成三個世界之一後，您將獲得一個密碼，以便您可以在生命耗儘後繼續。

Toki - Going Ape Spit (USA, Europe).name: Mega Drive游戏列表
Toki - Going Ape Spit (USA, Europe).original_desc:
The hero of the game is a young jungle-man named Toki. One day the evil wizard Dr. Stark kidnaps his girlfriend Wanda. When Toki tries to save her, he is turned into a monkey! Now Toki has to find Dr. Stark in his palace, to rescue Wanda, and to become a human being again!

It is a platform game with a lot of various levels: jungle, underwater, volcanic caves, on the ice... Toki's only weapons are spitting on the enemies or jumping on them and crashing them. There are many possibilities to upgrade his spitting "weapon";  for example, if he finds an upgrade, he can spit fireballs. 

This game is ported from an older arcade version.
Toki - Going Ape Spit (USA, Europe).desc:
遊戲的英雄是一位名叫 Toki 的年輕叢林男子。有一天，邪惡巫師斯塔克博士綁架了他的女朋友旺達。當托奇試圖救她時，他變成了一隻猴子！現在託基必須在斯塔克博士的宮殿裡找到他，拯救旺達，並重新成為人類！

這是一個平台遊戲，有很多不同的關卡：叢林、水下、火山洞穴、冰上……Toki 唯一的武器是向敵人吐口水或跳到他們身上並撞毀他們。升級他的吐痰“武器”有很多可能性；  例如，如果他發現升級，他可以吐出火球。

該遊戲是從較舊的街機版本移植而來的。

Toy Story (USA).name: 玩具總動員系列
Toy Story (USA).original_desc: This game is based on the movie "Toy Story". It sets you as the character of Woody as you jump, swing, and drive to the end of each level. Each level contains familar scenes from the movie. The gameplay consists of the platformsidescrolling kind. You use Woody's pullstring to defeat enemies like sharks, Mr. Potatohead, and Ham. After each level, you are treated to still images from the movie.
Toy Story (USA).desc:
全球最高跨媒體製作票房收入列表包含從書、電影、電子遊戲、漫畫書、電視節目或其他媒體開始製作的跨媒體製作收入超過20億美元。
該清單包括總收入數字和收入細目。對於尚未報告總收入數字的跨媒體製作作品，根據不同媒體的綜合收入給出估算。對於報告數字不是最新的跨媒體製作作品，會根據現有數據給出更新的估計。

Phantasy Star III - Generations of Doom.key: Phantasy Star III - Generations of Doom (USA, Europe, Korea)
Phantasy Star III - Generations of Doom.original_name: Phantasy Star III : Generations of Doom
Phantasy Star III - Generations of Doom.name: 白金版遊戲
Phantasy Star III - Generations of Doom.original_desc:
A long time ago, a great war between Orakio and Laya devastated the planet. 1000 years later, a young Orakian prince named Rhys decides to marry the beautiful Maya, his heart's chosen one. But during the marriage ceremony, a strange creature appears and kidnaps the bride. Were those the legendary Layans who kidnapped the princess? Whatever the answer might be, Rhys has to find it out on his own. He must find his beloved one...

This game takes us back to a medieval setting. The battle system is similar to that of its predecessor  Phantasy Star II: you can perform simple attacks and special techniques, which require TP (technique points), in a turn-based combat with random enemy encounters.
Phantasy Star III - Generations of Doom.desc:
很久以前，奧拉基奧和拉亞之間的一場大戰摧毀了這個星球。1000 年後，一位名叫里斯的年輕奧拉克王子決定娶他心儀的美麗瑪雅人。但在婚禮期間，一個奇怪的生物出現並綁架了新娘。那些人就是傳說中綁架公主的拉揚人嗎？無論答案是什麼，里斯都必須自己找出答案。他一定要找到他心愛的人……

這款遊戲將我們帶回到中世紀的背景。戰鬥系統與前作《夢幻之星2》類似：你可以在與隨機敵人遭遇的回合製戰鬥中執行簡單的攻擊和需要TP（技術點）的特殊技術。

Blades of Vengeance (USA, Europe).name: 电子游戏开发商列表
Blades of Vengeance (USA, Europe).original_desc:
Blades of Vengeance is a platform game incorporating RPG elements and character styling, reminiscent of Gods by The Bitmap Brothers. The Dark Lady has unleashed hordes of monsters who you must slay.

The player can choose from three main characters - the Huntress, Warrior and Sorcerer, all of which have different abilities. Throughout the game the player has the option to improve their powers by collecting armour and weapons (such as a mace and a crossbow) or by using spells. Each of the 8 levels ends with a boss.
Blades of Vengeance (USA, Europe).desc:
Blades of Vengeance 是一款融合了 RPG 元素和角色造型的平台遊戲，讓人想起 Bitmap Brothers 的《Gods》。黑暗女士釋放了成群的怪物，你必須殺死它們。

玩家可以選擇三個主要角色——女獵手、戰士和魔法師，他們都有不同的能力。在整個遊戲過程中，玩家可以選擇通過收集盔甲和武器（例如狼牙棒和十字弓）或使用咒語來提高自己的力量。8 個級別中的每個級別都以一個 Boss 結束。

Phantom 2040 (USA).name: Phantom
Phantom 2040 (USA).original_desc:
The cartoon mini-series: Phantom 2040, right here. It is the aforementioned year, 2040, and the city of Metropia is in total chaos. 

Crime, smuggling and terrorism are escalating. The debase company, Maximum Inc., has invented biotechnology that is threatening to mess about with nature - causing animal extinction and ecosystem adulteration. Evil company owner, Rebicca Madison, would like to rule Metropia and the world.

In comes Kit Walker, the 24th Phantom, following the proud but secret footsteps of his ancestors. This 18 year old has to fight his way to get things right, or end trying.

The game has many twist and turns in its plot, and a multitude of endings.
Phantom 2040 (USA).desc:
卡通迷你係列：幻影 2040，就在這裡。這是前面提到的 2040 年，Metropia 市陷入了徹底的混亂。

犯罪、走私和恐怖主義不斷升級。這家卑鄙的公司Maximum Inc.發明了可能擾亂自然的生物技術，導致動物滅絕和生態系統污染。邪惡的公司老闆麗比卡·麥迪遜想要統治 Metropia 和世界。

第 24 代幻影基特·沃克 (Kit Walker) 追隨其祖先驕傲而秘密的腳步，登場。這位 18 歲的年輕人必須努力奮鬥才能把事情做好，否則就結束嘗試。

遊戲的劇情有很多曲折，結局也有很多。

Jurassic Park (USA).name: 侏罗纪世界
Jurassic Park (USA).original_desc: This game can be played in two modes, either as Dr. Alan Grant or as a Velociraptor. Playing as each provides the user with an alternative story and level design. The climax of the game mirrored the unused climax of the film, in which Grant must defeat a pair of Velociraptors by causing the Tyrannosaurus rex skeleton in the Visitors Center to collapse on top of them. Grant himself is the final boss in the same location for the raptor storyline: your dinosaur character must cause the bone structure to collapse via specifically placed kicks to cause Grant to flee. A sequel was released using a new game engine and new artwork (with some of the original art as well), entitled Jurassic Park: Rampage Edition. In it, Grant's helicopter (that he just escaped on in the first game) crashes. Now he must deal not only with dinosaurs, but InGen as well. A new raptor must also make it off the island.
Jurassic Park (USA).desc: 這個遊戲可以有兩種模式玩，要么扮演艾倫·格蘭特博士，要么扮演迅猛龍。每種玩法都為用戶提供了另一種故事和關卡設計。遊戲的高潮反映了電影中未使用的高潮，格蘭特必須通過使遊客中心的霸王龍骨架倒在一對迅猛龍身上來擊敗它們。格蘭特本人是猛禽故事情節同一地點的最終老闆：你的恐龍角色必須通過專門放置的踢腿導致骨骼結構崩潰，從而導致格蘭特逃跑。使用新遊戲引擎和新藝術作品（以及一些原創藝術作品）發布了續集，名為《侏羅紀公園：橫衝直撞版》。其中，格蘭特的直升機（他在第一場比賽中剛剛逃脫）墜毀。現在他不僅要對付恐龍，還要對付國際遺傳技術公司。一隻新的猛禽也必須離開這個島。

Panorama Cotton (Japan) (Translated).name: Mega Drive游戏列表
Panorama Cotton (Japan) (Translated).original_desc:
The fairy kingdom has long been threatened by the dark witch Wool, the leader of the Dark Undulation. The queen Velvet sent the cute little fairy Silk to seek aid by the red-haired witch Cotton, the only one who could defeat Wool. Cotton agrees under one condition: she will receive some willows as a reward, since willows are her favorite food. Finally, after defeating Wool, Cotton realized that someone poisoned the promised willows, and swears revenge. Accompanied by Silk, she begins to chase the mysterious enemy.

"Panorama Cotton" is a pseudo-3D scrolling shooter reminiscent of  Space Harrier, set in an animé-style fantasy world. Various levels scroll "into the screen", vertically, horizontally, or diagonally. You can move Cotton over the screen, shooting at oncoming enemies and avoiding obstacles on her way. Cotton can upgrade her weapon to higher levels as you advance in the game, and can also cast magical spells by collecting special items.
Panorama Cotton (Japan) (Translated).desc:
精靈王國長期受到黑暗波動首領黑暗女巫伍爾的威脅。天鵝絨女王派遣可愛的小仙女絲綢向紅發女巫棉花尋求幫助，棉花是唯一能打敗羊毛的人。科頓同意了，但有一個條件：她將收到一些柳樹作為獎勵，因為柳樹是她最喜歡的食物。最後，打敗伍爾後，棉花意識到有人在答應的柳樹下毒了，發誓要報仇。在絲綢的陪伴下，她開始追捕神秘的敵人。

《Panorama Cotton》是一款讓人想起《太空鷂》的偽 3D 捲軸射擊遊戲，背景設定在動漫風格的奇幻世界中。各個級別垂直、水平或對角地滾動“進入屏幕”。你可以在屏幕上移動棉花，向迎面而來的敵人射擊並避開路上的障礙物。隨著遊戲的進展，棉花可以將她的武器升級到更高的級別，還可以通過收集特殊物品來施放魔法咒語。

Earthworm Jim (USA).name: 1994年电子游戏界
Earthworm Jim (USA).original_desc:
A crow is chasing a worm named Jim while in outer space Psy-Crow is chasing a renegade ship. The ship's captain has stolen an ultra-high-tech-indestructible-super-space-cyber-suit and Queen Slug-for-a-Butt has ordered Psy-Crow to get it, since it can make her more beautiful than Princess-What's-Her-Name. Psy-Crow blasts the captain and the suit falls to Planet Earth.

Back on earth Jim wonders if he is finally safe when an ultra-high-tech-indestructible-super-space-cyber-suit lands on him. Luckily Jim rests in the neck ring of the suit. Then the space particles begin interacting with Jim, causing a light-speed evolution. Jim soon realizes he is in control of the suit.

Jim overhears the Queen's plans for the suit and decides to meet this Princess...
Earthworm Jim (USA).desc:
一隻烏鴉正在追逐一隻名叫吉姆的蠕蟲，而在外太空，心靈烏鴉正在追逐一艘叛變的飛船。船長偷了一套超高科技堅不可摧的超級太空網絡套裝，鼻涕蟲女王命令精神烏鴉去拿它，因為它可以讓她比“什麼名字的公主”更美麗。精神病烏鴉炸毀了船長，套裝落到了地球上。

回到地球後，吉姆想知道當超高科技堅不可摧的超級太空網絡服降落在他身上時，他是否終於安全了。幸運的是，吉姆靠在套裝的頸環上。然後空間粒子開始與吉姆相互作用，引起光速演化。吉姆很快意識到他掌控著這件衣服。

吉姆無意中聽到了女王的套裝計劃，並決定與這位公主見面……

Mazin Saga - Mutant Fighter (USA).name: Mega Drive游戏列表
Mazin Saga - Mutant Fighter (USA).original_desc:
The story takes place in 1999 where a Bio-Beast by the name of Godkaiser Hell has reigned supreme over Earth, after a nuclear and biological holocaust has disfigured most of the population and formed an army called the Steelmask Force.  The survivors have fled underground and are constantly attacked by the Bio-Beast horde until one day a scientist by the name of Dr. Kabuto creates a mech, the Mazinger-Z, that can be used against the monsters.  This is where the player takes control of the games protagonist and pilots the suit in an attempt to reclaim the Earth.

The gameplay is a hack-n-slash game, where the player controls the suit by using the D-pad and using the face buttons to slash at enemy monsters.  There is also a Super Attack that the player can use, but it will decrease their health after each use.  The enemies consist of mutant animals such as dogs and beetles as well as the Bio-Beast soldiers that can range from regular soldiers, female fighters and even ninjas.

There are five levels in all (Tokyo, Asia, Europe, New York and Egypt) divided into three stages with a mini-boss and a main boss the player must defeat to advance to the next level.  There are also items scattered throughout the levels that will give the player extra points, health refills, an extra life and even a brief stint of invincibility.
Mazin Saga - Mutant Fighter (USA).desc:
麥可·約瑟夫·傑克森（英語：Michael Joseph Jackson，1958年8月29日—2009年6月25日），美國男歌手、詞曲作家、舞者及慈善家，被尊稱為「流行樂之王」（King of Pop）。麥可·傑克森在音樂、舞蹈、時尚、娛樂方面的巨大貢獻及成功，加上備受關注的個人生活，使得他成為全球流行文化的代表人物之一。
麥可是傑克森家族的第7個孩子，他與4位兄弟傑基、蒂托、傑梅因、馬龍一同組建傑克森5人組，並於1964年初次登上職業音樂舞台，而後在1971年開始單飛。80年代初期，透過《Off The Wall》的嶄露頭角以及《Thriller》的巨大成功，令他成為流行音樂的主導人物。他的音樂錄影帶包括《Beat It》、《Billie Jean》等對打破種族障礙作出了巨大貢獻，並將媒體轉化為藝術形式和宣傳工具，因這些作品大受歡迎，令當時創立不久的電影片道「MTV」名揚天下。進入90年代，麥可繼續錄製如《Black or White》等音樂錄影帶，這些作品標誌著他持續不斷的創新能力。而這一階段的大量巡演讓他在國外同樣名利雙收。由於麥可·傑克森的名氣及其舞台和影片的表演，一些由他所命名的舞蹈技術如「機械步」、「月球漫步」得到普及。他獨特的聲音和風格影響了許多舞曲、嘻哈、現代節奏藍調、搖滾等類型的音樂藝術家。
麥可於1982年發行的專輯《Thriller》是全球銷量最高的專輯。其它包括《Off The Wall》（1979年）、《Bad》（1987年）、《Dangerous》（1991年）、《HIStory》（1995年）也都躋身全球銷量最高的專輯行列。他是為數不多的2次入選搖滾名人堂藝術家之一，也被選入作曲者名人堂，並且是唯一進入舞蹈名人堂的流行藝人。他的其它成就包括多項金氏世界紀錄，13個葛萊美獎、「葛萊美傳奇獎」、「葛萊美終身成就獎」，26個全美音樂獎，為所有藝人之最，其中包括「世紀藝術家」、「20世紀80年代藝術家」，在他單飛生涯中，他擁有13個美國冠軍單曲，在告示牌百大單曲榜中超過其他任何男歌手，他被公認為有史以來最暢銷的獨唱藝術家，全球唱片銷量已達10億張。麥可贏得數百個獎項，使他成為流行音樂歷史上獲獎最多藝人。而他遺作專輯《Xscape》中的單曲《Love Never Felt So Good》於2014年5月21日登上告示牌百大單曲榜第9位，麥可·傑克森由此成為史上首位在連續50年中，均有單曲登上此榜單前10位的藝術家。麥可不斷在世界各地出席人道主義活動，2000年金氏世界紀錄大全裡認證他資助過39個慈善機構，超過其他任何藝術家。
麥可的個人生活方面，包括他的外貌變化、個人關係、個人行為引起許多非議。1993年，他受到指控性侵兒童，最終以2500萬美元金額庭外和解，沒有正式起訴；2005年，他受到7項性侵犯兒童及其他2項指控，最終法院裁定這些罪名均不成立。2009年6月25日，正為復出演唱會《This Is It》做準備的麥可·傑克森因在相隔過短時間內注射丙泊酚、苯二氮平類而藥物中毒導致心臟驟停，並因搶救無效與世長辭。洛杉磯法醫裁定這是一宗刑事殺人案件，私人醫生康拉德·默里2011年11月7日因過失致死罪被判處4年徒刑，服刑2年後因獄中行為良好，於2013年10月28日獲釋。
在麥可逝世後，其公眾悼念儀式在世界各地轉播。

Gynoug (Europe).name: Mega Drive游戏列表
Gynoug (Europe).original_desc: Gynoug is a horror-themed horizontal shoot'em up where you play as Wor, a winged “Flying Man” fighting to save his home planet Iccus from grotesque mutants created by a deadly virus. The game features six levels with mid-bosses and end-bosses, and no checkpoints—deaths respawn you immediately if you have lives left. Wor can use three types of shots that can be upgraded in power and bullet count, and feathers act as speed boosts similar to Gradius.
Gynoug (Europe).desc: Gynoug 是一款以恐怖為主題的水平射擊遊戲，您將扮演 Wor，一個長著翅膀的“飛行人”，為拯救自己的家鄉伊庫斯星球免受致命病毒產生的怪異變種人的侵害而奮鬥。該遊戲有六個關卡，包括中頭目和最終頭目，並且沒有檢查站——如果你還有生命，死亡會立即重生。沃可以使用三種類型的射擊，這些射擊的威力和子彈數量都可以升級，而羽毛則可以起到與 Gradius 類似的速度提升作用。

Shining Force (USA).name: PlayStation Portable游戏列表
Shining Force (USA).original_desc:
In a wondrous land perhaps not so far from our world, a strange and terrible series of events took place. The powers of darkness, led by Dark Dragon, fought for control of the world of Rune. Legendary warriors of light fought them with the ancient and modern weapons of the time, and drove Dark Dragon into another dimension. But Dark Dragon vowed that in 1,000 years, he would be able to break through the inter-dimensional barrier, back into this world. 

A thousand years of peace and tranquility passed. The people of the world were happy to live their lives in contentment, able to spend time rediscovering the magical and technological wonders destroyed by Dark Dragon and using them to benefit all people. 

But the kingdom of Runefaust has begun a massive attack of the kingdoms of Rune - intending to help Dark Dragon return to this world! A small band of warriors has been sent out on a dangerous journey to fight against the dark forces of Runefaust, and you are the leader. Prepare yourself for the ultimate battle! 

Shining Force is a strategy/RPG.  As you make your way through the lands of Rune, you will be joined by other warriors who wish to stop the forces of Runefaust.  Each warrior has their own strengths and weaknesses.  As you progress through the game you will also gain new weapons and spells.  Use them wisely to stop Dark Dragon from arising and causing havoc in Rune.
Shining Force (USA).desc:
在一片神奇的土地上，也許離我們的世界並不遙遠，發生了一系列奇怪而可怕的事件。以黑暗之龍為首的黑暗勢力，為爭奪符文世界的控制權而戰。傳說中的光之戰士用當時古老和現代的武器與他們戰鬥，並將黑暗之龍趕入了另一個維度。但暗龍發誓，一千年之內，他一定能夠突破次元屏障，回到這個世界。

一千年的和平與安寧過去了。世界人民幸福地過著滿足的生活，能夠花時間重新發現被黑暗之龍摧毀的魔法和科技奇蹟，並利用它們造福所有人。

但符文王國已經開始對符文王國發起大規模進攻——意圖幫助黑暗之龍重返這個世界！一小隊戰士被派往危險的旅程，對抗符文浮士德的黑暗勢力，而你是領導者。為終極戰鬥做好準備！

《光輝力量》是一款策略/角色扮演遊戲。當你穿越符文之地時，其他想要阻止符文浮士德軍隊的戰士將會加入你的行列。每個戰士都有自己的優點和缺點。隨著遊戲的進展，您還將獲得新的武器和咒語。明智地使用它們來阻止黑暗之龍的出現並在符文中造成嚴重破壞。

Battletech - A Game of Armored Combat (U.key: Battletech - A Game of Armored Combat (USA)
Battletech - A Game of Armored Combat (U.original_name: BattleTech : A Game of Armored Combat
Battletech - A Game of Armored Combat (U.name: 波希米亞互動工作室
Battletech - A Game of Armored Combat (U.original_desc: Take control of a Matcat Mech as you fight your way through several level of mechanized mayhem.   Use machine guns, rocket launchers, homing missiles, flame throwers, mines and atomic bombs to defeat the encroaching enemy threat.  The different levels have different terrains, such as snow, ice and swamps which affect the progress of your mech.   You can also kill the littler mechs by stomping on them, which is always fun.
Battletech - A Game of Armored Combat (U.desc: 控制 Matcat Mech，在多個級別的機械化混亂中殺出一條血路。使用機槍、火箭發射器、尋的導彈、火焰噴射器、地雷和原子彈來擊敗入侵的敵人威脅。不同的關卡有不同的地形，如雪、冰和沼澤，這些都會影響你的機甲的進度。你還可以通過踩踏較小的機甲來殺死它們，這總是很有趣。

Jurassic Park - Rampage Edition (USA, Eu.name: Greatest Hits
Jurassic Park - Rampage Edition (USA, Eu.original_desc:
Jurassic Park: Rampage Edition is the sequel to the first Jurassic Park game on Genesis and mostly looks and plays like the predecessor. It is also a side-scroller.

In this game you play as Dr. Grant. The big difference with the first game is that there are more enemies to defeat. In addition to the dinosaurs you have to defeat many InGen agents. The reason is that they are trying to recapture dinosaur DNA and eggs to build a new park or an army of dinosaurs.
Jurassic Park - Rampage Edition (USA, Eu.desc: 本電子遊戲列表列舉了索尼 PlayStation的電子遊戲。索尼PlayStation最早於1994年12月3日在日本推出，之後於1995年9月9日在北美推出。

Pepenga Pengo (Japan).name: Mega Drive游戏列表
Pepenga Pengo (Japan).original_desc:
The Sno-Bees are back! One day in Antarctica, an asteroid crashes into the crystal that protects the penguins, shattering it into many pieces and freeing the Sno-Bees who had been frozen in ice. In order to rescue his people, the blue penguin (along with a pink penguin in two-player mode) goes after the Sno-Bees and to recover the missing pieces of the crystal. The game takes the basic template of the 1982 original and expands on it, offering a greater variety of enemies, various environmental hazards, and power-ups, along with of course updated 16-bit graphics and sound. The goal is still to push blocks and crush enemies. Enemies now appear from generators, which must be destroyed to stop new enemies from appearing, and all enemies must then be eliminated to complete each stage.

In addition to the main story mode, the game also features a competitive battle mode for up to four players, as well as a conversion of the original arcade game.
Pepenga Pengo (Japan).desc:
雪蜂回來了！有一天，在南極洲，一顆小行星撞上了保護企鵝的水晶，將其粉碎成許多碎片，並釋放了被冰凍的斯諾蜜蜂。為了營救他的人民，藍色企鵝（在兩人模式下還有一隻粉色企鵝）追擊斯諾蜜蜂並找回丟失的水晶碎片。該遊戲採用 1982 年原作的基本模板並進行了擴展，提供了更多種類的敵人、各種環境危害和能力提升，當然還有更新的 16 位圖形和聲音。目標仍然是推動方塊並粉碎敵人。敵人現在從生成器中出現，必須摧毀生成器以阻止新敵人出現，然後必須消滅所有敵人才能完成每個階段。

除了主要的故事模式外，遊戲還具有最多四名玩家的競爭戰鬥模式，以及對原始街機遊戲的轉換。

Stormlord (USA).name: Mega Drive游戏列表
Stormlord (USA).original_desc:
Badh the queen has imposed a terrible vengeance on the land by kidnapping the fairies. To restore things their rightful way, you must rescue them.

As you progress through the levels of platform-adventure action, you will come across fairies which are rescued by touching them. Enemies include Venus Fly Traps, localized acid rain showers and dragons, which can be avoided or shot in the bonus shoot 'em up sections. You will need help to reach some levels; this comes from Mael Dvin the Eagle. After each level there's a bonus game in which tears must be collected for points.

Growl (USA).name: Aespa
Growl (USA).original_desc:
In the early part of the 20th century, a group of evil poachers recklessly hunted animals to the point of extinction, including lions, deers, elephants, eagles, and several others.

Growl is a one-player game, in which you control one of four characters (Gen, Burn, Khan, and Jack) and you must defeat these evil poachers by dealing with them with your fists. However, there are weapons that can be found, including grenades, rocket launchers, whips, swords, guns, and shotguns, which you get once an enemy drops them on the ground, so you can use these weapons against them. If you manage to get one of the guns, you can shoot enemies with a limited supply of ammo. Once the ammo runs out, your only option is to pistol-whip them.

Also, you can pick up crates and barrels and haul it at enemies to knock them down. Along the way, you'll encounter several cases of animal cruelty, such as two men whipping a lion. Stop the animal cruelty, and the animals will help you in your quest to defeat these evil poachers.
Growl (USA).desc:
《冰與火之歌：權力遊戲》（英語：Game of Thrones，中國大陸譯《權力的遊戲》，香港譯《權力遊戲》）是一部美國中世紀奇幻史詩劇情類型的電視連續劇。該系列連續劇由大衛·貝尼奧夫和D·B·魏斯替HBO創作。劇情改編自喬治·R·R·馬丁的奇幻小說系列《冰與火之歌》。該影集於貝爾法斯特及英國他處拍攝和製作，拍攝地點還包括加拿大、克羅埃西亞、冰島、馬耳他、摩洛哥和西班牙。該系列的影集於2011年4月17日在HBO開播，至2019年5月19日完結，播出了八季，共73集。在2011年4月19日，第一季第一集首播後，電視台隨即簽約拍攝該劇的第二季。
《冰與火之歌：權力遊戲》遵循著幾個故事線發展，因此有多個情節和一個大型演員劇組。該劇設定於虛構的維斯特洛與厄斯索斯大陸上，其中一段有關維斯特洛與七個王國的鐵王座的故事線，是隨著貴族朝代中合縱連橫之脈絡，一方面爭奪王位、另一方爭取獨立。劇情另一面聚焦於該被廢除的統治王朝之末裔，他被流放並計劃重奪王位；另一故事線則沿著守夜人，捍衛領土免受北方兇猛民族和傳奇生物侵害的兄弟手足之情。
《冰與火之歌：權力遊戲》在HBO上獲得創紀錄的收視率，並擁有著廣泛、活躍且國際化的粉絲群。該系列因其演技、複雜的角色、故事和範圍，以及生產價值而得到評論家的好評，然而，該系列影集經常使用裸露和暴力（包括性暴力）內容而獲致批評，最後一季影集亦因其濃縮故事及創造性的決定，而進而大受撻伐，許多人認為這是令人失望的結論。
獎項方面，該影集獲得58項《黃金時段艾美獎》，這是連續劇系列中最多的一個，包括2015年、2016年、2018年和2019年的傑出影集系列。該劇的其他獎項和提名包括三項《雨果獎最佳戲劇表演獎》（2012年至2014年）、2011年的《皮博迪獎》，以及《金球獎最佳電視連續劇—劇情片》的五項提名（2012年及2015年至2018年）。在2019年，該影集的最後一季創下了當年任何常規系列影集所獲得最多的艾美獎提名的新紀錄，達到32項，打破了1994年由《霹靂警探》長達25年的26項提名紀錄，同時，使《冰與火之歌：權力遊戲》成為獲得最多艾美獎提名的電視連續劇，總數達到161項。
在劇組演員中，彼得·汀克萊傑於《黃金時段艾美獎》中贏得四次傑出影集男配角（2011、2015、2018及2019年），並憑藉提利昂·蘭尼斯特的角色表現獲得2012年金球獎影集系列、迷你影集或電視電影最佳男配角獎。而阿爾菲·阿倫、關朵琳·克莉絲蒂、艾蜜莉亞·克拉克、尼古拉·高斯達-華竇、琳娜·海蒂、基特·哈靈頓、蘇菲·特納、黛安娜·瑞格、卡莉絲·范·荷登、麥斯·馮·西度及梅西·威廉斯也因其表現獲得《黃金時段艾美獎》的提名。

Road Rash 3 (USA, Europe).name: 暴力摩托
Road Rash 3 (USA, Europe).original_desc:
Following the previous two Road Rash games, the player has conquered the US illegal motorcycle championship. But why settle for that when one can take over the World; racing in the peaceful streets of the UK, dodging the animals in Kenya, blaze through the night in Japan or jump in the hilly circuits in Italy?

Keeping the same spirit of the previous two games, Road Rash 3 adds all new digitized sprites (based on the 32-bit remake released an year earlier), bike upgrades, more weapons and meaner police. Most other aspects of the game remain unchanged: the player starts on the lowest division with a small amount of cash and a slow, hard to handle bike. To get more money (and get a faster bike) the player must beat as many of the other 15 racers to the finish line, using all means possible, even kicking and punching them into knockout. By clearing (finishing on the top three spots) all five races on a level, the player advances to the next, where opponents are faster and tougher, the police is more active and a longer race.

As for new gameplay elements in the final title in the series released for Sega's 16-bit console, bikes can also be improved by choosing cheaper upgrades (instead of simply buying new ones) such as tires (less skidding), engine (improves acceleration and top speed), suspension (allows better control while landing after jumps) and body (bike takes more hits before turning into smoking metal). Instead on relying on simple motorbike patrols, the police now has helicopters at their disposal (which try to land on the player) and patrol cars, which attempt to block the path of the bike, forcing it to stop or collide to get a bust. To make things easier (or harder), new weapons were added, some of which allow the carrier to stun an opponent for a few seconds, making him the perfect victim for an incoming vehicle. Also new, if the player finishes the race with a weapon, carries it to the next race.

Each track has it's own features: in the UK, cars drive left on a rainy day, in Australia and Kenya animals wander into the road, in Brazil bikers can get themselves a close-encounter with a car on a crossing, in Italy the hills allow a lot of air-time for light and speedy bikes, Germany, where the icy roads and sharp turns make a deadly combination and finally in Japan the race goes during the night under the neon lights.
Road Rash 3 (USA, Europe).desc:
繼前兩場 Road Rash 比賽之後，該選手又奪得了美國非法摩托車錦標賽冠軍。但當一個人能夠接管世界時，為什麼要滿足於此呢？在英國寧靜的街道上馳騁，在肯尼亞躲避動物，在日本的夜色中馳騁，還是在意大利的丘陵賽道上跳躍？

秉承前兩款遊戲的精神，Road Rash 3 添加了全新的數字化精靈（基於一年前發布的 32 位重製版）、自行車升級、更多武器和更卑鄙的警察。遊戲的大多數其他方面保持不變：玩家從最低級別開始，擁有少量現金和一輛緩慢且難以操控的自行車。為了獲得更多的錢（並獲得更快的自行車），玩家必須使用一切可能的手段，擊敗盡可能多的其他 15 名賽車手到達終點線，甚至用腳踢、拳打他們將他們擊倒。通過清除一個關卡中的所有五場比賽（獲得前三名），玩家將進入下一個關卡，對手更快更強，警察更積極，比賽時間更長。

至於為世嘉 16 位遊戲機發布的系列最終作品中的新遊戲元素，自行車也可以通過選擇更便宜的升級（而不是簡單地購買新的）來改進，例如輪胎（減少打滑）、發動機（提高加速度和最高速度）、懸掛（允許在跳躍後著陸時更好的控制）和車身（自行車在變成冒煙的金屬之前承受更多的撞擊）。警方現在不再依賴簡單的摩托車巡邏，而是擁有可供使用的直升機（試圖降落在玩家身上）和巡邏車，它們試圖阻擋自行車的路徑，迫使其停下來或發生碰撞以進行逮捕。為了讓事情變得更容易（或更困難），添加了新武器，其中一些武器可以讓航母擊暈對手幾秒鐘，使他成為來襲車輛的完美受害者。還有一個新功能，如果玩家帶著武器完成比賽，則將其帶到下一場比賽。

每條賽道都有自己的特色：在英國，汽車在雨天靠左行駛；在澳大利亞和肯尼亞，動物徘徊在道路上；在巴西，騎自行車的人可能會在十字路口與汽車近距離接觸；在意大利，山上的山丘為輕型和快速自行車提供了充足的飛行時間；在德國，結冰的道路和急轉彎形成了致命的結合；最後在日本，比賽在霓虹燈下的夜晚進行。

Mortal Kombat 3 (USA).name: 卡斯柏·范狄恩
Mortal Kombat 3 (USA).original_desc:
Shao Kahn has won. The Earthrealm is no more. In order to revive his Queen Sindel, the emperor Shao Kahn used the Outworld Tournament from Mortal Kombat 2 as a diversion while his Shadow Priests revive his fallen Queen on Earth. Once enacted, the dimensional bridge between the two realms connects, allowing Kahn's extermination squads to invade and destroy Earth, and enslave the population's souls.

A small team of Raiden's "Chosen Warriors" survives the attack: Mortal Kombat champion Liu Kang and his ally Kung Lao, Special Forces agents Sonya Blade and Jax, the shaman Nightwolf, the riot cop Stryker, the nomadic Kabal, and former Lin Kuei warrior Sub-Zero, who has gone rogue from his clan. Facing the warriors are the mercenary Kano, cyber-ninjas Smoke, Sektor and Cyrax, Sheeva, a female Shokan, the sorcerer Shang Tsung, and Queen Sindel herself.

Mortal Kombat 3 brings new elements to the 2D fighting series: multi-level playfields, "Dial-A-Combo" attacks, a "Run" button to speed up the battles, and "Vs." codes, which unlock new powers and abilities once both players enter a code sequence in pre-match-up screens. Also included are more stage fatalities and finishing moves as each warrior attempts to go one-on-one with the Centaurian enforcer Motaro, and Shao Kahn himself.

Mortal Kombat 3 is the last traditional one-on-one fighting game game in the series to feature motion-captured digitized graphics for its kombatants, and introduces online network play to the PC version.
Mortal Kombat 3 (USA).desc:
紹康贏了。地球領域已不復存在。為了復活他的女王辛德爾，紹康皇帝利用《真人快打 2》中的異星錦標賽作為消遣，而他的暗影牧師則在地球上復活了他死去的女王。一旦頒布，兩個領域之間的維度橋樑就會連接起來，允許卡恩的滅絕小隊入侵並摧毀地球，並奴役人們的靈魂。

雷電的“天選戰士”小隊在襲擊中倖存下來：真人快打冠軍劉康和他的盟友空佬、特種部隊特工索尼婭·刀鋒和賈克斯、薩滿夜狼、防暴警察史賽克、游牧的卡巴爾，以及從部落中叛變的前林鬼戰士零號。面對戰士們的是僱傭兵卡諾、網絡忍者斯莫克、塞克托和西拉克斯、希瓦、女性 Shokan、巫師尚宗和辛德爾女王本人。

《真人快打 3》為 2D 格鬥系列帶來了新元素：多層戰場、“Dial-A-Combo”攻擊、加速戰鬥的“Run”按鈕以及“Vs.”。代碼，一旦雙方玩家在賽前屏幕中輸入代碼序列，即可解鎖新的力量和能力。還包括更多的階段死亡和終結動作，因為每個戰士都試圖與半人馬執法者莫太羅和紹康本人進行一對一的對抗。

《真人快打 3》是該系列中最後一款採用動作捕捉數字化圖像的傳統一對一格鬥遊戲，並在 PC 版本中引入了在線網絡遊戲。

Rolling Thunder 3 (USA).name: Now Production
Rolling Thunder 3 (USA).original_desc:
The events in the third game in the series are synchronous with RT2. At the end of the twentieth century, satellites around the globe are being shot down, disrupting communications. Secret agency Rolling Thunder discovers the organization behind the terror: Geldra. While agents Leila and Albatross are fighting the leader Gimdo (RT2), agent Jay is instructed to bring down Dread, the second-in-command.

There are many improvements to the gameplay: Jay can shoot while jumping and shoot diagonally upwards with certain weapons. At the beginning of each mission, you can pick a special weapon such as a laser rifle, bazooka, flamethrower or grenades. You have to choose carefully as they cannot be reused in later missions. You can still hide in doorways and recharge your weapons behind special doors. The mission timer from the previous game has been replaced by a sniper that targets you with a crosshair when you don't move fast enough. The brutal difficulty from the previous games has been toned down: there are more life marks at the start and you now resurrect where you died, rather than returning to the last checkpoint. Unlike the previous game, you can only choose one character to play with.

After completing a mission, a password is provided to continue playing. There are ten levels in total, with a few hidden areas.

Landstalker (USA).name: Mega Drive游戏列表
Landstalker (USA).original_desc:
A jovial fantasy yarn, Landstalker is the title that put Climax Entertainment on the map.  Following the exploits of elvish treasure hunter, Nigel, and his pixie friend, Friday, they travel to a distant island to find the long lost treasure of King Nole.

The game can draw many parallels to the Zelda series, due to the game’s mostly whimsical style and emphasis on item collecting.  However, Landstalker is more meticulous, moving at a slower and more developed rate, with an abundance of towns and NPCs rounding out the cast.
Landstalker (USA).desc:
《Landstalker》是一部歡樂的奇幻故事，讓 Climax Entertainment 名聲大噪。跟隨精靈寶藏獵人奈傑爾和他的小精靈朋友星期五的事蹟，他們前往一個遙遠的島嶼尋找諾爾國王失落已久的寶藏。

由於遊戲大多異想天開的風格和對物品收集的重視，該遊戲與塞爾達系列有很多相似之處。然而，《Landstalker》則更加細緻，移動速度更慢，開發速度也更快，還有大量的城鎮和 NPC 來完善演員陣容。

Psycho Pinball (Europe) (En,Fr,De,Es,It).name: Take-Two Interactive游戏列表
Psycho Pinball (Europe) (En,Fr,De,Es,It).original_desc:
Psycho Pinball is another pinball game in the style first introduced in Pinball Dreams and later popularized in Pinball Fantasies.  
Standard features of these types of pinball simulations include an animated backglass display, multiple bonuses including a multi-ball, extra ball, etc., and background music that changes based on active specials.

There are three main tables:

1. The Abyss (Aquatic theme)
Trick or Treat (Horror theme)
Wild West (Western theme)

An additional gimmick is a fourth Psycho Pinball table (circus theme) that has bonuses that can launch you to the other three tables, leading to massively high scores (and very long gameplay times).
Psycho Pinball (Europe) (En,Fr,De,Es,It).desc:
《Psycho Pinball》是另一款彈球遊戲，其風格首次在《Pinball Dreams》中引入，後來在《Pinball Fantasies》中流行起來。
這些類型的彈球模擬的標準功能包括動畫後玻璃顯示、多種獎勵（包括多球、額外球等）以及根據活動特價而變化的背景音樂。

主要有三個表：

1. 深淵（水生主題）
Trick or Treat（恐怖主題）
狂野西部（西部主題）

另一個噱頭是第四張心理彈球桌（馬戲團主題），它有獎金可以讓你進入其他三張桌子，從而獲得極高的分數（以及很長的遊戲時間）。

Mega Turrican (USA).name: 世嘉訴Accolade案
Mega Turrican (USA).original_desc: After many generations of peace, the Dark Forces have assembled again, and as a member of the USS Freedom Forces, it is your job to defeat them once again. This means you will have to complete numerous large levels always searching for secrets to pick up and enemies to shoot. To do this, you can pick up three different, upgradeable shots: a multiple, a laser and a rebound. You can also go into wheel-mode (as long as you have enough special energy) or use a rope. In wheel-mode, you are invincible and can lay mines or explore previously unreachable areas.
Mega Turrican (USA).desc: 經過幾代人的和平之後，黑暗勢力再次集結，作為美國自由軍的一員，你的任務就是再次擊敗他們。這意味著你必須完成許多大型關卡，不斷尋找可拾取的秘密和可射擊的敵人。為此，您可以選擇三種不同的、可升級的射擊：多重射擊、激光射擊和反彈射擊。你也可以進入輪子模式（只要你有足夠的特殊能量）或使用繩子。在車輪模式下，你是無敵的，可以埋設地雷或探索以前無法到達的區域。

Devil Crash MD (Japan).name: Xbox 360游戏列表
Devil Crash MD (Japan).original_desc: Imagine an adventure game in the format of pinball, and you get Dragon's Fury. Your hero is a small silver ball, and your battlefield is a three-tiered pinball machine. Using your ball, you can defeat monsters, rack up points, and enter bonus stages. If you play with enough skill, you can trigger all sorts of point-accumulating bonuses. If you get one billion points, you get to fight the final boss and view the ending to the game.
Devil Crash MD (Japan).desc: 想像一下彈球形式的冒險遊戲，你會得到《龍之怒》。你的英雄是一個小銀球，你的戰場是一個三層彈球機。使用你的球，你可以擊敗怪物、積累積分並進入獎勵階段。如果你玩得足夠熟練，你可以觸發各種累積積分的獎勵。如果你獲得了 10 億分，你就可以與最終的 Boss 戰鬥並查看遊戲的結局。

Target Earth (USA).name: PlayStation Portable游戏列表
Target Earth (USA).original_desc:
Space shooting game set in the future with Earth under attack by robots.

You are the pilot of a mech robot which can either walk on planet surfaces or fly in space.  There are two types of levels in the game.  Surface levels take place on planets or moons and allow the mech to run and jump to the end of the level while fighting enemies, as in a side scrolling game.  Space levels have no gravity and allow the mech to move in any direction.  The mech can be equipped with a large assortment of machine guns, lasers, and grenades.
Target Earth (USA).desc:
太空射擊遊戲以未來地球受到機器人攻擊為背景。

你是一個機甲機器人的飛行員，它可以在行星表面行走或在太空飛行。遊戲中有兩種類型的關卡。地表關卡發生在行星或衛星上，允許機甲在與敵人戰鬥時奔跑和跳躍到關卡的末尾，就像在橫向捲軸遊戲中一樣。太空層沒有重力，允許機甲向任何方向移動。該機甲可以配備各種機槍、激光和手榴彈。

Marvel Land (USA).name: 漫威电影宇宙
Marvel Land (USA).original_desc:
In the land of Coni, its inhabitants lived in harmony. At its center lies a mountain called "Peace", in which an amusement park known as "Marvel Land" resides. This park is well-protected by the Fairies. Later, King Mole became rule of the under dwellers and sent his minions to take over Marvel Land, imprisoning the Fairies inside crystal balls.

A young lad named Talmit is called upon to rescue Wondra the princess, and free the Fairies from King Mole. Marvel Land consists of five worlds with seven stages each, and the game plays in platform style, in which you need to run through the level, killing enemies, and find the exit door. More often than not, you have to go through a bullseye to reach it. If you hit the bullseye at its center, you are awarded more points than you do by hitting it above or below.

You kill enemies by either jumping on their heads or attacking them with clones, which trail your movement unless you use them to attack enemies or collect food. The clones have a limited life and disappear one by one as you use them. 

During the game, you can open any treasure chests that you may find along the way, and release power-ups which include boots that make you increase your speed, dragon wings that enable you to jump higher and giving you the ability to glide to a soft landing, and giving you the use of the "clone" attack. Hidden throughout the sections are warp doors that can either take your backwards or forwards, anywhere within the park. Each section of a world has you riding a roller coaster, in which you must stay on the cars while avoiding signs and enemies.

The last section of each world has Talmit going through the castle to reach the end-of-world boss. Unlike other platform games where you must defeat bosses with weapons, you are challenged to various mini-games starting from "rock, paper, scissors" through to the Musical Chairs variant. If you win one of the mini-games, you are able to free one of the Fairies, and obtain a crystal ball that you need to defeat King Mole. You then proceed to the Bonus Stage where you must collect shooting stars for points. If you lose a mini-game, you are transported back to the start of the last section.
Marvel Land (USA).desc:
在科尼的土地上，居民和睦相處。其中心有一座名為“和平”的山，山上有一座名為“漫威樂園”的遊樂園。這個公園受到仙女們的精心保護。後來，鼴鼠王成為地下居民的統治者，並派他的爪牙佔領漫威樂園，將仙女們囚禁在水晶球內。

一個名叫塔爾米特的小伙子奉命營救公主旺德拉，並從鼴鼠王手中解救仙女們。Marvel Land由五個世界組成，每個世界有七個階段，遊戲採用平颱風格，你需要跑過關卡，殺死敵人，並找到出口。通常情況下，你必須穿過靶心才能到達目標。如果您擊中靶心的中心，您將獲得比擊中靶心上方或下方更多的分數。

你可以通過跳到敵人頭上或用克隆人攻擊他們來殺死敵人，克隆人會跟踪你的移動，除非你用它們來攻擊敵人或收集食物。克隆體的壽命是有限的，當你使用它們時，它們就會一一消失。

在遊戲過程中，你可以打開沿途可能找到的任何寶箱，並釋放能量道具，包括讓你提高速度的靴子、讓你跳得更高並讓你能夠滑行軟著陸的龍翼，以及讓你使用“克隆”攻擊的能力。各個部分都隱藏著扭曲門，可以帶您在公園內的任何地方向後或向前。世界的每個部分都讓你乘坐過山車，在其中你必須留在車上，同時避開標誌和敵人。

每個世界的最後一部分都有塔爾米特穿過城堡到達世界末日的老闆。與其他平台遊戲不同的是，你必須用武器擊敗頭目，而你會面臨各種迷你游戲的挑戰，從“石頭、剪刀、布”到音樂椅變體。如果您贏得其中一場迷你游戲，您就可以釋放其中一名仙女，並獲得擊敗鼴鼠王所需的水晶球。然後您進入獎勵階段，您必須收集流星以獲得積分。如果您輸掉了一場迷你游戲，您將回到最後一部分的開始處。

Fatal Labyrinth (USA, Europe).name: SEGA Meganet
Fatal Labyrinth (USA, Europe).original_desc: Dragonia, the castle of doom, has come upon the world and its minions have stolen the Holy Goblet. Without it, the world will be in darkness forever. You play as Trykaar, who must enter the castle and traverse its thirty levels to retrieve the Holy Goblet. There is no other storyline; its dungeons are generated randomly each time you play, like the Rogue-type games which originated on the PC.
Fatal Labyrinth (USA, Europe).desc: 末日城堡 Dragonia 降臨人間，它的爪牙偷走了聖杯。沒有它，世界將永遠處於黑暗之中。你扮演特萊卡爾，他必須進入城堡並穿過三十層才能取回聖杯。沒有其他故事情節；它的地下城是在每次玩時隨機生成的，就像起源於 PC 的 Rogue 類型遊戲一樣。

Technocop (USA).name: 技術警察
Technocop (USA).original_desc:
"I OPERATE ALONE" the D.O.A. Punks are out to stop me, but I've got orders to bring them in or drop ?em dead.

To entice their cooperation, my VMAX TWIN-TURBO Interceptor is equipped with APACHE Side-Mounted cannons and PULSE long-range nuclear torpedoes.

Packing a .95 AutoMag, designed for internal explosion of human targets and a TONARI snare gun. "I play to win." - TECHNOCOP
Technocop (USA).desc:
“我獨自行動”D.O.A.朋克們想要阻止我，但我接到命令，要么把他們帶進來，要么把他們殺死。

為了吸引他們的合作，我的 VMAX TWIN-TURBO 攔截機配備了 APACHE 側裝炮和 PULSE 遠程核魚雷。

包裝有一把 .95 AutoMag（專為人類目標進行內部爆炸而設計）和一把 TONARI 軍鼓。“我打球就是為了贏。” - 技術警察

Phelios (USA).name: 1988年电子游戏界
Phelios (USA).original_desc:
Set in the world of Greek mythology, Phelios tells the story of a young prince called Apollo, who sets out to rescue his beloved Artemis who was seized by the demon Typhon while exploring the skies with the winged horse, Pegasus. In Typhon's temple, Artemis gets locked in a dungeon where Medusa turns her into stone.

Phelios consists of seven chapters, and in each, you must defeat Typhon's minions using your sword which can emit fireballs at them. However, holding the fire button down for a few seconds will charge the sword; and upon releasing it, it shoots a larger fireball that does a fair amount of damage. During the game, you collect items that increases your speed and give you more firepower.

At the end of each chapter, you have to destroy a boss in order to proceed to the next one. Between each chapter, you can watch an intermission that details what is happening at the temple.
Phelios (USA).desc:
《菲利浦斯》以希臘神話世界為背景，講述了年輕的阿波羅王子與飛馬珀伽索斯探索天空時，出發去營救被惡魔提豐抓住的心愛的阿耳忒彌斯的故事。在提豐的神廟中，阿爾忒彌斯被鎖在地牢裡，美杜莎將她變成了石頭。

菲利俄斯由七個章節組成，在每一章中，你必須使用可以向提豐發射火球的劍來擊敗提豐的爪牙。然而，按住開火按鈕幾秒鐘就會給劍蓄力；釋放它後，它會發射一個更大的火球，造成相當大的傷害。在遊戲過程中，您收集可以提高速度並提供更多火力的物品。

在每一章的結尾，你必須消滅一個老闆才能進入下一章。在每一章之間，您可以觀看一段幕間休息，詳細介紹寺廟中發生的事情。

Flicky (USA, Europe).name: SEGA Meganet
Flicky (USA, Europe).original_desc: The premise of Flicky is dramatically simple: the chick has to face a succession of fixed boards (which form an infinite loop around themselves) full of platforms. The other inhabitants of the board are a variable number of tiny chicks, a kitten called Tiger and an iguana called Iggy. The objective is of course to collect all the chicks and get them to the exit while avoiding Tiger and Iggy. Once taken under your wing, the chicks will follow you in single file. If Tiger or Iggy manage to hit one of the chicks, it will stop following you and you will have to retrieve it. If the two predators catch Flicky, they eat him, simple as that. The only way Flicky can get rid of his feline and reptilian pursuers is by picking up certain items lying around the levels and sending them into Tiger's vibrissae or Iggy's scales.
Flicky (USA, Europe).desc: 《Flicky》的前提非常簡單：小雞必鬚麵對一系列裝滿平台的固定板（它們圍繞自身形成無限循環）。棋盤上的其他居民是數量不等的小雞，一隻名叫“Tiger”的小貓和一隻名叫“Iggy”的鬣蜥。目標當然是收集所有小雞並讓它們到達出口，同時避開老虎和伊基。一旦被帶到你的翅膀下，小雞們就會排成一列跟隨你。如果老虎或伊基成功擊中了其中一​​​​隻小雞，它就會停止跟隨你，你將不得不把它找回來。如果這兩個掠食者抓住了弗利基，他們就會吃掉他，就這麼簡單。Flicky 擺脫貓科動物和爬行動物追捕者的唯一方法是撿起關卡周圍的某些物品並將它們送入 Tiger 的觸鬚或 Iggy 的鱗片中。

Shinobi III - Return of the Ninja Master.key: Shinobi III - Return of the Ninja Master (USA)
Shinobi III - Return of the Ninja Master.original_name: Shinobi III : Return of the Ninja Master
Shinobi III - Return of the Ninja Master.name: 喷神James节目列表
Shinobi III - Return of the Ninja Master.original_desc:
Shinobi III involves a ninja named Joe "Shinobi" Musashi (you) going and kicking some bad guy butt, in this case his old enemy "Neo Zeed".

In normal Shinobi style, you are presented with side-scrolling playfields which you must slash and shuriken your way through, to meet the end boss of each round.
Shinobi III - Return of the Ninja Master.desc:
《忍者 III》涉及一位名叫喬“忍者”武藏的忍者（你）去踢一些壞人的屁股，在這種情況下，他的老敵人“Neo Zeed”。

在正常的忍者風格中，你會看到橫向捲軸的遊戲場，你必須砍伐和手裡拿著你的方式，以滿足每輪的最終老闆。

Bonanza Bros. (USA, Europe, Korea) (Rev.name: 富礦兄弟
Bonanza Bros. (USA, Europe, Korea) (Rev.original_desc:
Mobo and Robo Bonanza are enjoying their favorite television show when the picture crackles and a shadowy figure of a mysterious stranger appears on screen. This figure asks them to collect certain items that he has placed inside various buildings to test his security force. If they return the items successfully, Mobo and Robo will be rewarded. The two of them state that they will get the job done in just three minutes. However, little do they know that each building is packed with security guards who will raise the alarm if they are caught red-handed. Fortunately both Mobo and Robo are equipped with bullets that can knock the guards unconscious for a few seconds. An $100 reward will be given out if Mobo and Robo are apprehended.

As either Mobo or Robo, you must collect all the treasures before leaving the ten buildings and shoot any security guards that get in your way. Remember that you are under a time limit. An in-game map will help you locate the treasures. There is a bonus stage after three buildings, where the object is to collect the gold bars in a limited amount of time without  one of the three spotlights shining on you. If it is possible, hide behind open doors. If you manage to get all the gold bars, 10,000 points is added to your score. There are three of these bonus stages, but each of them varies.
Bonanza Bros. (USA, Europe, Korea) (Rev.desc:
Mobo 和 Robo Bonanza 正在欣賞他們最喜歡的電視節目，這時畫面劈啪作響，屏幕上出現了一個神秘陌生人的影子。這個人物要求他們收集他放置在各個建築物內的某些物品，以測試他的安全部隊。如果他們成功歸還物品，Mobo和Robo將獲得獎勵。兩人表示只要三分鐘就能完成工作。然而，他們不知道的是，每棟大樓都擠滿了保安，如果被當場抓住，他們就會發出警報。幸運的是，莫博和機器人都配備了子彈，可以將守衛擊昏幾秒鐘。如果Mobo和Robo被捕，將懸賞100美元。

作為 Mobo 或 Robo，您必須在離開十座建築物之前收集所有寶藏，並射殺任何妨礙您的保安人員。請記住，您有時間限制。遊戲中的地圖將幫助您找到寶藏。在三座建築物之後有一個獎勵階段，目標是在有限的時間內收集金條，而不要讓三盞聚光燈之一照射到你身上。如果可能的話，躲在敞開的門後面。如果您成功獲得所有金條，您的分數將增加 10,000 分。這些獎勵階段共有三個，但每個階段都各不相同。

Devilish - The Next Possession (USA).name: Mega Drive游戏列表
Devilish - The Next Possession (USA).original_desc:
Genki's first game is a paddle/pong game with a background story. Once upon a time there were a prince and a princess who loved each other. But the evil jealous demon named "Y" turn them both into stone paddles. Suddenly, a blue sphere fell from the sky, becoming the ball which the paddles can now push forwards, overcoming obstacles and defeating demons.

"Devilish" is different from other paddle games by letting you play with two paddles. The lower one behaves just like a usual paddle - you use it to prevent the ball from dropping down. The upper one can move and turn, allowing you to hit the ball from different angles and from different parts of the screen. You advance through levels by destroying bricks and enemies, going up until the level boss enemy appears.
Devilish - The Next Possession (USA).desc:
Genki 的第一款遊戲是一款帶有背景故事的槳/乒乓球遊戲。從前，有一位王子和一位公主，他們彼此相愛。但邪惡嫉妒的惡魔“Y”將他們倆變成了石槳。突然，一個藍色的球體從天而降，變成了槳可以向前推動的球體，克服障礙，擊敗惡魔。

《Devilish》與其他槳遊戲不同，它讓你用兩個槳來玩。下部的球拍就像普通的球拍一樣 - 您可以用它來防止球掉落。上面的那個可以移動和轉動，讓你可以從不同的角度和屏幕的不同部分擊球。你可以通過摧毀磚塊和敵人來推進關卡，直到關卡頭目敵人出現。

Great Circus Mystery Starring Mickey & M.key: Great Circus Mystery Starring Mickey & Minnie, The (USA)
Great Circus Mystery Starring Mickey & M.original_name: The Great Circus Mystery Starring Mickey & Minnie
Great Circus Mystery Starring Mickey & M.name: Super Nintendo Entertainment System游戏列表
Great Circus Mystery Starring Mickey & M.original_desc: Starring Mickey and Minnie Mouse, the two plan to spend the day at the Circus only to find that it's deserted. Believing that someone is responsible, you must dress up in different outfits such as Safari and Western, as you try to find clues to solve the mystery behind the disappereance of the performers, including your pals Donald Duck and Pluto.
Great Circus Mystery Starring Mickey & M.desc: 由米奇和米妮主演的兩人計劃在馬戲團度過一天，卻發現這裡空無一人。相信有人對此負有責任，你必須穿上不同的服裝，如狩獵裝和西部裝，嘗試尋找線索來解開表演者（包括你的好朋友唐老鴨和冥王星）失踪背後的謎團。

Revenge of Shinobi, The (USA, Europe) (R.key: Revenge of Shinobi, The (USA, Europe) (Rev B)
Revenge of Shinobi, The (USA, Europe) (R.name: The Best
Revenge of Shinobi, The (USA, Europe) (R.original_desc:
You are Musashi, master ninja. You are a mystic warrior, who sees and know all things. You are deadly! Now you must destroy the vicious army of Neo Zeed, or Naoko, their beautiful prisoner, dies!
Attack with a ninja sword and shurikens! Somersault over fences while hurling deadly knives! Ward off bullets, death stars and junked cars by leaping, twisting and kicking!
Stalk ninjas, musclemen, Kung Fu gangs and armies of machine gunners through 24 treacherous scenes. The Neo Zeed are masters of disguise. But you are Shinobi, a master in the art of stealth. And you have a secret weapon - ninja magic!
Revenge of Shinobi, The (USA, Europe) (R.desc: 本電子遊戲列表列舉了索尼PlayStation 2的電子遊戲。

General Chaos (USA, Europe).name: 普遍混亂
General Chaos (USA, Europe).original_desc:
General Chaos is an arcade-style squad RTS where the player controls a team of five soldiers in a limited battleground, in a classic Red (General Havoc, headquarters in Viceria) vs Blue (General Chaos, in Moronica) all out war. The goal of the game is to push the frontline to the enemy headquarters, by winning individual battles and then beat them in their own capital.

There are five kinds of soldiers, each with their weapon of choice and range of attack: the Gunner (machine gun, medium range and wide arc), Launcher (rocket launcher, long range), Chucker (grenades that can be thrown over barricades), Scorcher (flame-thrower, close combat) and Blaster (dynamite sticks, close range). Before each battle, players can choose the composition of their team from one out of four choices: Assault team, Brute Force, Commandos (a team of just two soldiers which have different controls) and Demolition.

Gameplay is simple to learn, with the A button being used to fire at the nearest enemy, B to move to a the pointer location and C to cycle through soldiers. Using the commando team changes the controls, with the directional pad controlling a soldier directly, with B being used to call the other soldier nearby. While basic commands are simple, the player must deal with things such as distance from target and angle of attack to succeed.
If two opposing soldiers face-off during battle, they engage in a brawl (indicated by a cloud of dust). When that happens, the battle stops and the players are in direct control of the soldiers: A punches, B kicks and C blocks. Every downed soldier can can be rescued if there are enough medics available, earned at the end of each battle depending on how well the player did. 

Up to four players can play, cooperatively or against each other.
General Chaos (USA, Europe).desc:
General Chaos 是一款街機風格的小隊即時戰略遊戲，玩家在有限的戰場上控制一支由五名士兵組成的小隊，進行經典的紅隊（General Havoc，總部位於維塞里亞）與藍隊（General Chaos，位於莫羅尼卡）的全面戰爭。遊戲的目標是通過贏得個人戰鬥，將前線推進到敵人的總部，然後在自己的首都擊敗他們。

有五種士兵，每種都有自己選擇的武器和攻擊範圍：槍手（機槍，中程和寬弧），發射器（火箭發射器，遠距離），Chucker（可以投擲路障的手榴彈），Scorcher（火焰噴射器，近戰）和Blaster（炸藥棒，近距離）。在每次戰鬥之前，玩家可以從四種選擇中選擇一種隊伍的組成：突擊隊、蠻力隊、突擊隊（只有兩名士兵的隊伍，具有不同的控制方式）和爆破隊。

遊戲玩法簡單易學，A 按鈕用於向最近的敵人開火，B 按鈕用於移動到指針位置，C 按鈕用於循環選擇士兵。使用突擊隊改變控制方式，方向鍵直接控制士兵，B 用於呼叫附近的其他士兵。雖然基本命令很簡單，但玩家必須處理諸如與目標的距離和攻擊角度等問題才能成功。
如果兩名敵方士兵在戰鬥中對峙，他們就會發生爭吵（由一團灰塵表示）。當這種情況發生時，戰鬥就會停止，玩家可以直接控制士兵：A 拳，B 踢，C 格擋。如果有足夠的醫療人員，那麼每個倒下的士兵都可以獲救，醫療人員在每場戰鬥結束時獲得，具體取決於玩家的表現。

最多四名玩家可以合作或相互對抗。

Midnight Resistance (USA).name: PlayStation Portable游戏列表
Midnight Resistance (USA).original_desc:
The Midnight Resistance fighters are up against the awesome powers of mad scientist King Crimson and his Crimson Corps. Crimson has kidnapped your scientist grandfather and five more of your relatives, and aims to put his advanced plans to evil use.

Take control of a Resistance fighter in this scrolling shoot 'em up consisting of nine platform-based levels, each ending with a Boss to defeat. Your enemies appear on foot and in vehicles, and Crimson has also planted machine gun bays en route. 

Dead enemies release keys, which can be traded in at shop points for weapons. These weapons include machine guns and flamethrowers, for which ammunition must be bought - weapons are discarded when you have no suitable ammo. The control system is unusual - you can shoot in different directions and crawl along low ledges.
Midnight Resistance (USA).desc: 以下是2025年的電子遊戲業中將預定面世眾多新電子遊戲。

Atomic Runner (USA).name: Game Boy游戏列表
Atomic Runner (USA).original_desc:
One windy day, there was an explosion at a nuclear power station, causing heavy doses of radiation to be poured over many people. One of these people was a young scientist named Chelnov. When he survived the deadly accident, he was possessed with abnormal powers. Having realized this, he decided to act in the cause of justice. He is determined to escape the Eastern Bloc country he called home and run and jump across the world to finish in the US.

What distinguishes Chelnov from other platform games is its use of forced scrolling. This occurs when the screen moves continuously from left to right, forcing players to negotiate the game's many obstacles and enemies without controlling Chelnov's speed of progress. Enemies attack from left, right, above, and below, and Chelnov can switch the direction he's facing to attack enemies that are behind him. Some enemies in the game carry different types of weapons and power-ups, and when they are shot at, the power-ups drop to the ground and can be picked up.
Atomic Runner (USA).desc:
一個大風天，一座核電站發生爆炸，導致大量輻射照射到許多人身上。其中一位是一位名叫切爾諾夫的年輕科學家。當他從致命事故中倖存下來時，他就擁有了異常的力量。意識到這一點後，他決定為正義事業而行動。他決心逃離他稱之為家鄉的東歐集團國家，跑跳跨越世界，最終到達美國。

Chelnov 與其他平台遊戲的區別在於它使用強制滾動。當屏幕從左向右連續移動時，就會發生這種情況，迫使玩家在不控制切爾諾夫前進速度的情況下應對遊戲中的許多障礙和敵人。敵人從左、右、上、下攻擊，切爾諾夫可以改變他面對的方向來攻擊他身後的敵人。遊戲中的一些敵人攜帶不同類型的武器和強化道具，當他們被射擊時，強化道具會掉到地上並可以撿起。

Castle of Illusion Starring Mickey Mouse.key: Castle of Illusion Starring Mickey Mouse (USA, Europe)
Castle of Illusion Starring Mickey Mouse.original_name: Castle of Illusion Starring Mickey Mouse
Castle of Illusion Starring Mickey Mouse.name: Feral Interactive
Castle of Illusion Starring Mickey Mouse.original_desc:
This is the first Mickey Mouse game for Sega consoles. In this game the famous Disney character must face the dangers of weird fantasy lands such as an enchanted forest and a toy world. Mickey must rescue his girlfriend Minnie who's been kidnapped by the evil witch Mizrabel.

The game play follows the traditional 2D hop 'n' bop platform style in both 8-bit and 16-bit versions. Apart from the story and the music, which is the same, all the rest (including controls, moves, stages and, obviously, graphics), are totally different.
Castle of Illusion Starring Mickey Mouse.desc:
這是世嘉遊戲機上的第一款米老鼠遊戲。在這款遊戲中，著名的迪士尼角色必鬚麵對奇怪的奇幻世界（例如魔法森林和玩具世界）的危險。米奇必須營救被邪惡女巫米茲拉貝爾綁架的女友米妮。

8 位和 16 位版本的遊戲玩法都遵循傳統的 2D hop 'n' bop 平颱風格。除了相同的故事和音樂之外，其餘所有（包括控制、動作、舞台，顯然還有圖形）完全不同。

James Pond 3 (USA, Europe).name: 纳拉维特·勒拉格苏
James Pond 3 (USA, Europe).original_desc: Unlike the  first game of the series, that was a mission-based game, and the  second one, where your character had unique abilities such as observing the whole level and growing to unlimited height, "James Pond 3" is a standard jump and run platform game. Pond can run very quickly (by holding down the A button) through large levels, which often contain steep mountain sides and other tricky areas. Once again, he has to oppose the evil scientist Maybe and his minions.
James Pond 3 (USA, Europe).desc:
《火影忍者疾風傳 終極風暴4》（日版名：NARUTO －ナルト－疾風伝 ナルティメットストーム4，英文版名：Naruto Shippuden: Ultimate Ninja Storm 4）, 是由CyberConnect2開發，萬代南夢宮遊戲於2016年在PlayStation 4、Xbox One與Windows發售的對戰動作遊戲，作為《火影忍者疾風傳 終極風暴革命》的續篇。在PlayStation 4與Xbox One進行開發，制定了為期兩年的開發計劃。
收錄追加下載內容《ROAD TO BORUTO》的《火影忍者疾風傳 終極風暴4 慕留人傳》於2017年2月2日發售。2020年4月23日在Nintendo Switch發售《火影忍者疾風傳 終極風暴4 慕留人傳》，追加下載內容《NEXT GENERATIONS》更新發佈可遊玩角色大筒木桃式與大筒木金式，. 這是為了慶祝《火影忍者 終極忍者》系列在全球銷量超過2000萬片。

Ghouls'n Ghosts (Japan, USA).name: Game Boy游戏列表
Ghouls'n Ghosts (Japan, USA).original_desc:
Three years have passed since Arthur defeated the Demon King Astaroth and rescued his beloved Princess Prin-Prin (see Ghosts 'N Goblins). A new villain, the Great Demon King Lucifer (Loki in some versions) has become the new leader of Ghoul Realm. While returning from a journey, Arthur sees the Princess' castle and her village under attack by Lucifer's forces. While rushing towards her beloved knight, the Princess is struck by one of Lucifer's laser beams.

Now, Arthur must venture back to the Lucifer's palace and destroy the demon in order to rescue the Princess' soul and bring her back to life! And it won't matter whether he fights in his shining armor or in his underwear alone...the bravest Knight in the land isn't going to be stopped by some monsters! Although the game starts with graveyard and marsh territory familiar from the first game, later levels are set in a tower, a mass of skeletons, and a castle.

Players progress from left to right (from bottom to top in level 3), and have to hack down the aforementioned monsters with a sword. The journey includes ledges, ladders, lava pits and slippery slopes. Different weapons can be collected, by finding suits of armor inside chests. Each of the five stages has its own setting and a final boss.
Ghouls'n Ghosts (Japan, USA).desc:
自從亞瑟擊敗魔王阿斯塔羅斯並救出他心愛的公主普林-普林（見鬼怪）以來，三年過去了。新的反派大魔王路西法（部分版本為洛基）成為了食屍鬼領域的新領袖。旅途歸來時，亞瑟看到公主的城堡和村莊遭到路西法軍隊的攻擊。當公主沖向她心愛的騎士時，她被路西法的一束激光擊中。

現在，亞瑟必須冒險回到路西法的宮殿，消滅惡魔，拯救公主的靈魂，讓她復活！無論他是穿著閃亮的盔甲還是只穿著內衣戰鬥都沒關係……這片土地上最勇敢的騎士不會被一些怪物阻止！雖然遊戲開始時是第一款遊戲中熟悉的墓地和沼澤地區，但後來的關卡設置在一座塔、大量骷髏和一座城堡中。

玩家從左到右（第3關中從下到上）前進，並且必須用劍砍倒上述怪物。旅程包括壁架、梯子、熔岩坑和滑坡。通過在箱子裡找到盔甲套裝可以收集不同的武器。五個階段​​中的每一個都有自己的設置和最終老闆。

Undead Line (Japan) (Translated).name: PlayStation Portable游戏列表
Undead Line (Japan) (Translated).original_desc:
Undead Line is a top-down arcade shooter with scrolling screens, like Commando and other games. The player controls a character (from a selection of three on the MSX 2 version) that shoots projectiles at enemy monsters.

The six levels available are presented in a menu and can be selected and played in any order. There is a boss battle at the end of each one.

Chests with power-ups are scattered throughout the levels. They open when shot, and in the Genesis version it is possible to cycle through the available power-ups by keeping firing at them. The power-ups include armor and speed boosts, and several types of projectiles.
Undead Line (Japan) (Translated).desc:
Undead Line 是一款自上而下的街機射擊遊戲，帶有滾動屏幕，就像突擊隊和其他遊戲一樣。玩家控制一個角色（在 MSX 2 版本中從三個角色中選擇）向​​敵方怪物發射射彈。

六個可用級別顯示在菜單中，可以按任何順序選擇和播放。每場比賽的最後都會有一場 Boss 戰。

裝有能量道具的箱子分散在各個關卡中。它們在射擊時打開，在創世紀版本中，可以通過不斷向它們射擊來循環使用可用的能量提升。能量提升包括裝甲和速度提升，以及幾種類型的射彈。

Sub-Terrania (USA).name: 有生之年非玩不可的1001款游戏
Sub-Terrania (USA).original_desc:
Aliens have invaded a vital subterranean mining colony. Use light-speed reflexes and total concentration to fly your prototype fighter through impossible caverns rescuing miners and blast those aliens into the darkest pits of space!

The game consists of 10 missions. Each mission takes place in a vast cavern, with interesting weather conditions. You must explore it and complete the mission objectives -- usually collecting sub parts, rescuing trapped miners, or destroying giant, epic bosses. You can also explore the levels, but keep an eye on your fuel gauge and beware the many hazards!
Sub-Terrania (USA).desc:
外星人入侵了一個重要的地下採礦殖民地。利用光速反應和全神貫注，駕駛你的原型戰鬥機穿過不可能的洞穴，營救礦工，並將那些外星人炸入太空最黑暗的深坑！

遊戲由 10 個任務組成。每個任務都發生在一個巨大的洞穴中，有著有趣的天氣條件。你必須探索它並完成任務目標——通常是收集子零件，營救被困的礦工，或摧毀巨大的史詩首領。您還可以探索關卡，但請留意電量計並提防許多危險！

Splatterhouse 3 (USA).name: Now Production
Splatterhouse 3 (USA).original_desc:
It has been a while since the escape in Splatterhouse 2 and Rick is slowly regaining his sanity. At night, he is still haunted by nightmares from the place. Rick has married Jennifer and they have a son, David. In the final chapter of this horror trilogy, Rick finds out that an entity called The Evil One has kidnapped his beloved family members. He has no choice but to wear the demon mask with the supernatural powers to save Jennifer and David from the demon-infested Splatterhouse.

The third title in the series builds upon the gameplay of its predecessors. The game consists of six consecutive levels in a huge mansion. In a race against time, you have to wipe the demons from each room and find the quickest path to the boss area. After clearing a room, you can use an in-game map to decide upon the quickest route. Improvements over the second title include moving between rooms in multiple directions, multiple endings based on your performance, special moves for Rick and crisper graphics.

It still has a horror theme and maintains the same level of gore and violence. You can collect weapons such as a skull-smashing baseball bat, an ax and cement blocks. If you get knocked down, a ghost will try to snatch your weapon and drop it in another room of the house. Other collectible items include extra lives, health meat or orbs. These orbs build up a power meter. Upon completion, you have the ability to transform into a berserk mutant for a short time. The cutscenes feature real actors who act out the characters.
Splatterhouse 3 (USA).desc:
距離 Splatterhouse 2 中的逃亡已經有一段時間了，瑞克正在慢慢恢復理智。到了晚上，他仍然被那個地方的噩夢所困擾。瑞克與詹妮弗結婚，育有一子大衛。在這部恐怖三部曲的最後一章中，瑞克發現一個名為“邪惡之人”的實體綁架了他心愛的家人。他別無選擇，只能戴上具有超自然力量的惡魔面具，從惡魔出沒的潑濺屋中拯救詹妮弗和大衛。

該系列的第三款遊戲以其前作的遊戲玩法為基礎。遊戲由一座巨大宅邸中的六個連續關卡組成。在與時間的賽跑中，你必須消滅每個房間中的惡魔，並找到通往boss區域的最快路徑。清理完房間後，您可以使用遊戲中的地圖來決定最快的路線。相對第二款遊戲的改進包括在多個方向的房間之間移動、根據你的表現提供多種結局、瑞克的特殊動作和更清晰的圖形。

它仍然具有恐怖主題，並保持相同水平的血腥和暴力。你可以收集武器，如粉碎頭骨的棒球棒、斧頭和水泥塊。如果你被擊倒，鬼魂會試圖搶走你的武器並將其扔到房子的另一個房間裡。其他收藏品包括額外的生命、健康肉或球體。這些球體構成了一個功率計。完成後，你有能力在短時間內轉變成狂暴的變種人。過場動畫由真人演員扮演角色。

Wonder Boy III - Monster Lair (Japan, Eu.key: Wonder Boy III - Monster Lair (Japan, Europe)
Wonder Boy III - Monster Lair (Japan, Eu.name: Game Source Entertainment
Wonder Boy III - Monster Lair (Japan, Eu.original_desc:
Wonder Boy III: Monster Lair is a quite different game to most of the games in the Wonder Boy series. You play a green-haired dude who must attack the invaders that attempt to collect weapons and use them to destroy the land. The game starts out like a simple platform game, but it's just when Wonder Boy enters the skull further on that the game is transformed into a shoot 'em up, so basically the gameplay consists of action and shooter scenes.

In the action scenes, your vitality decreases as you make your way towards the skull, but this can be restored by collecting fruit. A wide variety of weapons can be picked up, and not only does these allow you to use the weapons for a limited amount of time, but they also increase your vitality. 

In the shooter scenes, you ride your pink friend as you make your way through the scene. Here, your vitality remains static unless you are hit by an enemy passing by. As usual, there is a boss waiting for you at the end which you must defeat. Every boss changes color to show how much damage has been done to it. You have to defeat some bosses in two stages.

If your vitality gets low in each scene, you'll lose a life. You can also choose to have Wonder Girl join you, as two players can play the game.
Wonder Boy III - Monster Lair (Japan, Eu.desc:
Wonder Boy III: Monster Lair 是一款與 Wonder Boy 系列中的大多數遊戲截然不同的遊戲。你扮演一個綠頭髮的傢伙，他必須攻擊那些試圖收集武器並使用它們來摧毀土地的入侵者。遊戲一開始就像一個簡單的平台遊戲，但當 Wonder Boy 進一步進入頭骨時，遊戲就變成了射擊遊戲，所以基本上游戲玩法由動作和射擊場景組成。

在動作場景中，當你走向頭骨時，你的活力會降低，但這可以通過收集水果來恢復。可以拾取的武器種類繁多，不僅可以讓你在有限的時間內使用武器，還可以增加你的生命力。

在射擊場景中，你騎著你的粉紅色朋友穿過場景。在這裡，你的生命力保持靜止，除非你被路過的敵人擊中。像往常一樣，最後有一個老闆在等著你，你必須擊敗它。每個 Boss 都會改變顏色來顯示對其造成的傷害。你必須分兩個階段擊敗一些老闆。

如果你的活力在每個場景中變低，你就會失去生命。您還可以選擇讓 Wonder Girl 加入您，因為可以兩個玩家一起玩遊戲。

Killing Game Show, The (Japan).name: 最後生還者
Killing Game Show, The (Japan).original_desc:
This is a vertical platformer with horizontal wrap-around. For the entertainment of the futuristic masses, you play a criminal that has been inserted into a mechanical body with the promise that if you succeed in surviving through all the levels (there are many and they are hard), you will be set free.
   You start each level at the bottom, near pooling liquid which will soon rise, at your immediate peril. Navigate the level from bottom to the exit at the top before the liquid rises and kills you. There are many other foes that fly around, causing you damage and basically annoying you to spit.
   Most levels must be navigated through a series of keyed gates, doors, or portals. These shaped keys are scattered around the map and must by picked up and used only on the gates they match individually.
   Twist: You can only carry one special weapon (triple shot, laser beam, or vertical shot) and one tool (key, liquid-freeze, or a red herring) at a time.
   This game requires a lot of memorization of enemy movement patterns and optimum routes.
   A unique feature is that when you die, you can watch a replay and take over at any point to continue your game.
   You can also hit the HELP button at the start of each level to view a map, helping you plan your route.
Killing Game Show, The (Japan).desc:
這是一款水平環繞的垂直平台遊戲。為了娛樂未來大眾，你扮演一個被插入機械身體的罪犯，並承諾如果你成功地通過所有級別（有很多而且很難），你將被釋放。
你從底部開始每一層，靠近很快就會上升的池液體，你會面臨立即的危險。在液體上升並殺死你之前，從底部導航到頂部的出口。還有許多其他敵人在周圍飛來飛去，對你造成傷害，並且基本上會煩你吐口水。
大多數關卡都必須通過一系列帶鑰匙的大門、門或門戶。這些形狀的鑰匙分散在地圖周圍，必須拾取並僅在它們單獨匹配的門上使用。
扭曲：你一次只能攜帶一件特殊武器（三連發、激光束或垂直射擊）和一件工具（鑰匙、液體凍結物或紅鯡魚）。
這個遊戲需要大量記住敵人的移動模式和最佳路線。
一個獨特的功能是，當你死亡時，你可以觀看重播並隨時接管以繼續你的遊戲。
您還可以點擊每個級別開始處的“幫助”按鈕來查看地圖，幫助您規劃路線。

Gain Ground (USA).name: 基地组织
Gain Ground (USA).original_desc:
Gain Ground is an arcade style action game with a bit of strategy thrown in. The goal is get all of the soldiers to the opposite side of the screen or to kill all of the enemies. Each soldier in the army has a unique specialization, from among 20 types. Each soldier can attack in two different ways, using either a normal weapon or a special weapon. The strategy comes from deciding which soldier would do best in which situation. Some weapons are better at dealing with certain enemies and obstacles than other weapons.

Players start with only three soldiers but can encounter other soldiers that can be rescued, by touching them. If the new solider survives long enough to reach the exit, they can be added to the soldier inventory. The number of possible soldier in a player's army is over 30 soldiers. There are 50 stages total, divided into rounds of 10. At the end of each round, players encounter an enemy boss.
Gain Ground (USA).desc:
《Gain Ground》是一款帶有策略元素的街機風格動作遊戲。目標是將所有士兵帶到屏幕的另一側或殺死所有敵人。軍隊中的每位士兵都有 20 種獨特的專長。每個士兵都可以使用普通武器或特殊武器以兩種不同的方式進行攻擊。該策略來自於決定哪個士兵在哪種情況下表現最好。有些武器比其他武器更擅長對付某些敵人和障礙。

玩家一開始只有三名士兵，但可以通過觸摸其他士兵來拯救他們。如果新士兵存活足夠長的時間到達出口，他們就可以被添加到士兵庫存中。玩家軍隊中可能的士兵數量超過 30 名。總共有 50 個階段，分為 10 輪。在每輪結束時，玩家都會遇到敵方 Boss。

Garfield - Caught in the Act (USA, Europ.key: Garfield - Caught in the Act (USA, Europe)
Garfield - Caught in the Act (USA, Europ.name: 維基解密
Garfield - Caught in the Act (USA, Europ.original_desc:
As lazy cartoon cat Garfield, you're somehow trapped in your TV, that's what happens with too much TV watching. Go and find all remote-control pieces to get out of that box, and check the fridge for a change. The player advances through levels and bonus rounds in his attempt to escape.

Unlike most other platform games of its time, Garfield boasted completely unique art on each of its six levels, both for tile art and character costumes. The levels are inspired by classic movies, but given a Garfield twist, like "Catsablanca" and "The Curse of Cleofartra.
Garfield - Caught in the Act (USA, Europ.desc:
作為懶惰的卡通貓加菲貓，你不知何故被困在電視裡，這就是看太多電視會發生的情況。去找到所有可以從盒子裡拿出來的遙控部件，然後檢查冰箱是否有變化。玩家在嘗試逃脫的過程中通過關卡和獎勵回合前進。

與當時大多數其他平台遊戲不同，《加菲貓》在六個關卡中的每一關都擁有完全獨特的藝術，無論是瓷磚藝術還是角色服裝。這些關卡的靈感來自於經典電影，但又融入了加菲貓的風格，例如“卡薩布蘭卡”和“克利奧法特拉的詛咒”。

Ghostbusters (USA, Europe).name: 魔鬼剋星2
Ghostbusters (USA, Europe).original_desc:
Set after the events of the first movie, Sega's "Ghostbusters" follows the further adventures of Peter, Ray and Egon, as the make their way through six cases in an attempt to piece together a mysterious stone tablet.

Completely different than the Activision title of the same name, the Genesis "Ghostbusters" is a side-scrolling platformer that has the boys in gray running through houses, apartments, a burning house and a high-rise for starters as they battle a myriad of ghosts with their proton blasters.  When the Ghostbusters face off against a boss ghost, they have the ability to trap them the traditional way.

Peter, Ray and Egon, each have different abilities, and can purchase weapon and life upgrades from shops throughout the levels.  Other familiar faces make an appearance, as Slimer offers power-ups, and the Stay-Puft Marshmallow Man returns to settle the score from the movie.  

Solve the mystery of the tablet, and the Ghostbusters have to face off against Jenna, the Goddess of Death and Destruction.  Can the boys save New York one more time?
Ghostbusters (USA, Europe).desc:
世嘉的《捉鬼敢死隊》以第一部電影的事件為背景，講述了彼得、雷和埃貢的進一步冒險，他們穿過六個案件，試圖拼湊出一塊神秘的石碑。

與動視公司的同名遊戲完全不同，《創世紀》《捉鬼敢死隊》是一款橫向捲軸平台遊戲，首先，灰衣男孩跑過房屋、公寓、燃燒的房子和高層建築，用質子爆能槍與無數鬼魂戰鬥。當捉鬼敢死隊面對 Boss 幽靈時，他們有能力以傳統方式將其困住。

彼得、雷和埃貢各自擁有不同的能力，可以從各個關卡的商店購買武器和生命升級。其他熟悉的面孔也出現了，史萊默提供了能量，而呆呆的棉花糖人則回來了，以解決電影中的問題。

解開石板之謎，捉鬼敢死隊必須對抗死亡與毀滅女神珍娜。男孩們能再次拯救紐約嗎？

Herzog Zwei (USA, Europe).name: 1989年电子游戏界
Herzog Zwei (USA, Europe).original_desc: The premise is that two opposing forces are in combat with one another. Each player controls a jet airplane which zooms across the screen and may turn into a ground based soldier. These ground soldiers can hurt enemy units, but can not affect bases. To take over bases scattered across the map (and ultimately, the enemy base), players must purchase new units and transport them to certain positions. In this way, the player acts more like a transport and management for different types of units rather than a combat character themselves. If the plane is ever destroyed, it restarts at the player's base location. As previously mentioned, a level is complete when either side's base is lost to the opposing forces.
Herzog Zwei (USA, Europe).desc: 前提是兩支敵對勢力正在互相戰鬥。每個玩家控制一架噴氣式飛機在屏幕上變焦，並可能變成地面士兵。這些地面士兵可以傷害敵方單位，但不能影響基地。要佔領分散在地圖上的基地（最終是敵方基地），玩家必須購買新單位並將其運送到特定位置。這樣，玩家的行為更像是不同類型單位的運輸和管理，而不是戰鬥角色本身。如果飛機被摧毀，它會在玩家的基地位置重新啟動。如前所述，當任何一方的基地被敵方軍隊佔領時，關卡就完成了。

Road Rash II (USA, Europe) (RR206).name: Greatest Hits
Road Rash II (USA, Europe) (RR206).original_desc:
A motorcycle racing game with an attitude. You race in varying environments for ever increasing sums of money. With that money you can buy faster and better bikes. There are many objects on the road to watch out for, from cars to rocks to signs, if you hit one you'll go flying and loose valuable time. If you crash too often your bike can get wrecked. You can also attack other racers. The default attack is a punch, but some racers have weapons, which you can steal and use 
against them. The police patrol the various courses, so if you're not careful you can get busted. Road Rash II is not just a racing game but also a fighting game.
Road Rash II (USA, Europe) (RR206).desc:
一款有態度的摩托車賽車遊戲。你可以在不同的環境中進行比賽，以獲得不斷增加的金錢。用這筆錢你可以購買更快更好的自行車。路上有很多物體需要注意，從汽車到岩石再到標誌，如果你撞到一個，你就會飛起來並浪費寶貴的時間。如果您經常發生碰撞，您的自行車可能會被毀壞。您還可以攻擊其他賽車手。默認攻擊是一拳，但有些賽車手有武器，你可以偷走並使用它們
反對他們。警察在各個球場巡邏，所以如果你不小心，你可能會被抓。Road Rash II 不僅是一款賽車遊戲，也是一款格鬥遊戲。

Mutant League Football (USA, Europe).name: 喷神James节目列表
Mutant League Football (USA, Europe).original_desc:
Futuristic, intergalactic war disguised as American Football, Mutant League Football was one of the most unique football games ever to hit the gaming market. It's a unique blend of sports and sci-fi, and the actual football is the good ol' smash-mouth kind, literally.

Dynamite throwing running backs, blitzing trolls, robots that bleed oil, it's all here. Opposing quarterback connecting on too many passes? Blitz him 'til he's dead. Suspect the ref's been bribed by the other side? Call a Kill Ref audible; it's a 5 yard penalty though. 

Take your pick from nineteen teams, including three All-Star teams. There are five difficulty levels and a slow/fast game speed toggle. A tournament mode awaits those who want something more than a quick game versus the computer or a friend.

There are nineteen different fields to play on, all with there own special quirks. The Hellfield is littered with mines and fire pits to put an end to a careless runner, while The Pen is a slippery sheet of ice.
Mutant League Football (USA, Europe).desc:
偽裝成美式足球的未來星際戰爭，《變種人聯盟足球》是遊戲市場上最獨特的足球遊戲之一。這是體育和科幻的獨特結合，而真正的足球是真正的精彩足球。

投擲炸藥的跑衛、閃電般的巨魔、會流油的機器人，一切都在這裡。對方四分衛傳球過多？閃電戰他直到他死。懷疑裁判被對方賄賂？呼叫 Kill Ref 聲音；但這是5碼的處罰。

從十九支球隊中挑選，其中包括三支全明星球隊。有五個難度級別和慢/快遊戲速度切換。錦標賽模式等待著那些想要與電腦或朋友進行快速遊戲之外的東西的人。

有十九個不同的場地可供比賽，每個場地都有自己的特殊之處。地獄原野佈滿了地雷和火坑，可以終結粗心的跑步者，而圍欄則是一片光滑的冰面。

Beyond Oasis (USA).name: 2016年电子娱乐展
Beyond Oasis (USA).original_desc: In 'Beyond Oasis' a character by the name of Prince Ali is your protagonist, who wields a golden armlet with the power of fire, water, plant and shadow. You must travel your lands in search of the holder of the silver armlet, which had been hidden for generations. Recently unearthed it holds the power of chaos and destruction. You must stop them before it's too late.
Beyond Oasis (USA).desc: 在《超越綠洲》中，阿里王子是你的主角，他揮舞著帶有火、水、植物和陰影力量的金色臂章。你必須走遍你的土地，尋找銀臂章的持有者，它已經被隱藏了好幾代人。最近出土的它擁有混亂和毀滅的力量。你必須阻止他們，以免為時已晚。

Gauntlet IV (USA, Europe) (En,Ja).name: 艾薇·瓦倫汀
Gauntlet IV (USA, Europe) (En,Ja).original_desc:
This port of the arcade original has some extra modes available. Choose again from Thor the Warrior,  Thyra the Valkyrie,  Merlin the Wizard and Questor the Elf (each with their own advantages/disadvantages) and 1 to 4 players(supports Sega's four-player adapter).

Alongside the standard arcade mode, there are the Quest, Battle and Record modes.
Quest Mode: Defeat the four towers and solve the mystery of the ancient castle;  weapons can be bought with collected gold from merchants in the main hub area,  where you can also choose which tower to take on next. Experience points are good for increasing your stats.
Battle Mode: Fight your fellows to the death. Maps can include teleporters/monsters/items etc. Avoid exits(or you'll be out of the round).
Record Mode: Arcade mode with some variations such as a password continue,  also you can't die - although points will be lost for every 500 health lost.
Gauntlet IV (USA, Europe) (En,Ja).desc:
街機原版的這個端口有一些額外的模式可用。再次選擇戰士托爾、女武神塞拉、巫師梅林和精靈奎斯特（各有優缺點）和 1 至 4 名玩家（支持世嘉的四人適配器）。

除了標準街機模式外，還有任務、戰鬥和記錄模式。
任務模式：擊敗四座塔樓，解開古城堡之謎；  武器可以用從主樞紐區域的商人那裡收集的黃金購買，在那裡你也可以選擇接下來要攻克的塔樓。經驗值有利於增加你的統計數據。
戰鬥模式：與你的同伴戰鬥至死。地圖可以包括傳送器/怪物/物品等。避免出口（否則你將出局）。
記錄模式：街機模式有一些變化，例如密碼繼續，而且你也不會死 - 儘管每損失 500 點生命值就會失去分數。

Advanced Busterhawk Gleylancer (Japan) (.name: 高級巴斯特霍克·格利槍騎兵
Advanced Busterhawk Gleylancer (Japan) (.original_desc:
A side-scrolling sci-fi shooter, Gleylancer casts you as Lucia, a young pilot in the Space Fleet of starfighters that hijacks the experimental Gleylancer fighter to go explore the outer borders of known space in search of her missing father. Along the way Lucia will have to shoot down dozens of enemies in standard shooter fashion, while avoiding destruction and collecting power-ups that extend her ship's energy, upgrade weapons and gather screen-clearing bombs.

The Gleylancer comes equipped with two hovering satellites that can receive weapon upgrades of their own, and can lock their positions at specific angles to increase your firepower and protect the player from enemy attacks. Features only a single-player campaign with two different endings depending on how the final stages are completed (e.g. if Lucia's father is rescued or not).
Advanced Busterhawk Gleylancer (Japan) (.desc:
在一款橫向捲軸科幻射擊遊戲《Gleylancer》中，你將扮演露西婭 (Lucia)，一名星際戰鬥機太空艦隊的年輕飛行員，她劫持了實驗型 Gleylancer 戰鬥機，前往探索已知太空的外部邊界，尋找她失踪的父親。一路上，露西亞必須以標準射擊遊戲的方式擊落數十名敵人，同時避免破壞並收集能量提升裝置來擴展她的飛船的能量，升級武器並收集清屏炸彈。

Gleylancer 配備了兩顆懸停衛星，它們可以接收自己的武器升級，並可以將其位置鎖定在特定角度以增強火力並保護玩家免受敵人攻擊。僅具有單人戰役，有兩個不同的結局，具體取決於最後階段的完成方式（例如露西亞的父親是否獲救）。

ToeJam & Earl (USA, Europe, Korea).name: 肉鸽游戏
ToeJam & Earl (USA, Europe, Korea).original_desc:
Toejam and Earl are two hip aliens from the planet Funkotron. One day, they are cruisin' their galaxy in the sweet spaceship ride. Unfortunately, Earl wasn't paying enough attention to where he was driving, and ran the ship into an asteroid.  The ship crash landed onto the most bizarre planet in the galaxy: Earth.

Toejam and Earl must travel from level to level on Earth and collect the 10 scattered pieces of the ship. But the various Earthlings, such as Nerd Herds, Giant Hamsters, Phantom Ice Cream Trucks and the Bogeyman will make that difficult.

The power up items that TJ and E can pick up come in the form of wrapped presents. You never really know what a power up is until you open it. What's more, randomized levels and item locations make it a different game every time.

The game features a dynamic screen splitting - screen joining 2-player mode.
Players start the game close to each other. If one gets away from the other, the screen vertically splits to allow each player to move freely. When players are close again, the screens join together to become one single screen.
ToeJam & Earl (USA, Europe, Korea).desc:
Toejam 和 Earl 是來自 Funkotron 星球的兩個時髦的外星人。有一天，他們乘坐甜蜜的宇宙飛船巡遊銀河系。不幸的是，厄爾沒有足夠注意自己駕駛的方向，結果導致飛船撞上了小行星。飛船失事降落在銀河系中最奇異的星球：地球。

Toejam 和 Earl 必須在地球上從一個平面移動到另一個平面，並收集散落的 10 個飛船碎片。但各種各樣的地球人，比如書呆子群、巨型倉鼠、幽靈冰淇淋車和妖怪會讓這一切變得困難。

TJ 和 E 可以拾取的強化物品以包裝好的禮物的形式出現。在打開電源之前，您永遠不會真正知道什麼是電源。更重要的是，隨機的關卡和物品位置使其每次都是不同的遊戲。

該遊戲採用動態屏幕分割 - 屏幕加入 2 人模式。
玩家開始遊戲時彼此距離很近。如果一個人離開另一個人，屏幕就會垂直分開，讓每個玩家都能自由移動。當玩家再次靠近時，屏幕會合併在一起成為一個屏幕。

Super Fantasy Zone (Europe).name: 最终幻想V
Super Fantasy Zone (Europe).original_desc: Super Fantasy Zone is the next-generation sequel to Fantasy Zone. After Opa-Opa's father, O-Papa, is killed in a surprise attack by the Menon empire, Opa-Opa sets out to destroy the enemy and avenge him. The gameplay follows the classic formula: navigate freely through scrolling stages, destroy all enemy generators, and defeat the boss. Coins collected during levels can be spent on upgrades in the shop. The game adds more weapons and items, removes the automatic orientation system from the Game Gear version, and uses the Mega Drive's expanded controls for improved gameplay.
Super Fantasy Zone (Europe).desc:
《泰拉瑞亞》（英語：Terraria）為沙盒類的動作冒險遊戲，由Re-Logic開發、505遊戲發行，於2011年面世。遊戲未設有劇情，自由度高，無最終目標。其採用像素風格，玩家將在程式生成的二維世界中探索地圖、對抗敵人、收集物品、製作裝備。該作可單人或多人遊玩，支援模組化擴展。
安德魯·斯平克斯於2011年創辦Re-Logic後，旋即開始本作開發。2011年5月，遊戲上架Steam平台，隨後被移植至家用機、掌機、行動端等設備。遊戲發布後，除2012年中斷外，一直都在持續更新；2020年，本作發布了「最終更新」，但後續開發仍在繼續。
本作獲業界普遍好評，以其探索體驗、可重複遊玩性、內容獲讚，使用者介面因雜亂而受批評，遊戲教程與高自由度評價兩極。截至2025年，本作銷量已突破6400萬份，躋身暢銷電子遊戲之列。Re-Logic曾於2015年至2018年間開發衍生作品《泰拉瑞亞：來世》，但最終取消。遊戲還推出周邊產品，並與其他遊戲聯動。

Yu Yu Hakusho - Makyou Toitsusen (Japan).name: Mega Drive游戏列表
Yu Yu Hakusho - Makyou Toitsusen (Japan).original_desc: Yusuke Urameshi and his friends are invited to a tournament by Makyou Toitsusen, a mysterious martial arts society. In this tournament they are gonna face again some demons who fought them in the past, and decide who are the strongest.
Yu Yu Hakusho - Makyou Toitsusen (Japan).desc: 浦飯佑介和他的朋友們受邀參加神秘武術社團魔京鬥拳的錦標賽。在這次比賽中，他們將再次面對過去與他們戰鬥的惡魔，並決出誰是最強者。

Arcus Odyssey (USA).name: 亞克斯奧德賽
Arcus Odyssey (USA).original_desc:
Long time ago, an evil sorceress Castomira decided to conquer the world. But a good princess revolted against her, and in a great fight defeated the sorceress. But in order to completely seal the sorceress' powers, the princess had to forge a magic sword. For a long time this sword guarded the peace of the citizens of Arcus. But now the followers of Castomira stole it, and the world is facing a great peril...

This is a  Gauntlet-like game: lots of action and magic, with items to collects, and many dungeons to free from monsters. The game is also viewed from an isometric perspective, typical for the genre. Choose one of four characters to battle your way through dungeons and castles, or play with a friend in a 2-player mode.
Arcus Odyssey (USA).desc:
很久以前，邪惡的女巫卡斯托米拉決定征服世界。但一位善良的公主反抗了她，並在一場大戰中擊敗了女巫。但為了徹底封印女巫的力量，公主必須打造一把魔劍。長期以來，這把劍守護著阿庫斯公民的和平。但現在卡斯托米拉的追隨者偷走了它，世界面臨著巨大的危險……

這是一款類似於《挑戰》的遊戲：大量的動作和魔法，有可以收集的物品，還有許多可以擺脫怪物的地下城。該遊戲也是從等距視角觀看的，這是該類型的典型特徵。選擇四個角色之一，在地下城和城堡中戰鬥，或者在 2 人模式中與朋友一起玩。

Rocket Knight Adventures (USA).name: Game Source Entertainment
Rocket Knight Adventures (USA).original_desc:
Rocket Knight Adventures is the first side-scrolling action game starring Sparkster.  He lives in the kingdom of Zebulos, and is the bravest of all the Rocket Knights.  One day, an army of pigs comes down to invade the kingdom and capture the princess.  It is up to Sparkster to set things right again.

Most of the gameplay in Rocket Knight Adventures involves using Sparkster's rocket pack and sword.  Sparkster has to fight off many bosses and survive many precarious situations.  The levels are interspersed with a variety of elements, like shooting stages, and giant robot combat.
Rocket Knight Adventures (USA).desc:
《火箭騎士歷險記》是第一款由 Sparkster 主演的橫向捲軸動作遊戲。居住在澤布洛斯王國，是火箭騎士中最勇敢的一個。有一天，一支豬大軍入侵王國並俘虜了公主。Sparkster 有責任讓事情重新回到正軌。

Rocket Knight Adventures 中的大部分遊戲玩法都涉及使用 Sparkster 的火箭包和劍。斯帕克斯特必須對抗許多老闆並在許多危險的情況下生存。關卡中散佈著各種元素，例如射擊階段和巨型機器人戰鬥。

OutRun (USA, Europe).name: 超越 (游戏)
OutRun (USA, Europe).original_desc:
Race across varied terrain in this conversion of one of the most famous arcade racing games. Your Ferrari is at the ready, complete with female passenger, over a series of short tracks.

Gameplay is viewed form just above and behind the car, so you can see it. The roads are full of sharp bends and hazards, contact with which can cause the car to roll and lose you time. On each section of track there is a fork in the road, allowing you to choose which direction you go in. You have to complete 5 track sections in total, out of the 15 in the game.
OutRun (USA, Europe).desc:
在這款最著名的街機賽車遊戲之一的改版中，穿越不同的地形。您的法拉利已準備就緒，並載有女性乘客，在一系列短跑道上行駛。

遊戲玩法是從汽車的上方和後面觀看的，所以你可以看到它。道路上充滿了急彎和危險，接觸它們可能會導致汽車滾動並浪費您的時間。每段賽道上都有一個岔路口，您可以選擇前進的方向。遊戲共有 15 個賽道段，總共需要完成 5 個賽道段。

Vectorman 2 (USA).name: 任天堂Switch Online
Vectorman 2 (USA).original_desc: This is a sequel to  Vectorman. This time, the super-powerful little robot was attacked while coming back to earth in his spaceship. He falls down on the earth only to discover dark locations full of hostile creatures and to participate in a platformer full of fast and furious action. Fight your enemies, collect photons, jump over obstacles, find weapons, morph into other creatures, and climb walls as the green "orbot" Vectorman.
Vectorman 2 (USA).desc: 這是《Vectorman》的續集。這一次，超強小機器人在乘坐飛船返回地球時遭到襲擊。他墜落到地球上，卻發現了充滿敵對生物的黑暗地點，並參加了充滿快速和激烈動作的平台遊戲。與你的敵人戰鬥，收集光子，跳過障礙，尋找武器，變身為其他生物，並以綠色“orbot”矢量人的身份爬牆。

Mystical Fighter (USA).name: 有生之年非玩不可的1001款游戏
Mystical Fighter (USA).original_desc:
A kabuki warrior steps into a time portal to go back to the Shogun dynasty to defeat the evil lord Kabuki. The game is basically a side-scrolling beat-em up game, with the player controlling the kabuki warrior. The player can deliver kicks and punches to hordes of enemy minions throughout each stage.
