Other moves at the the players disposal are jump kicks, the ability to lift enemies and throw them, and the ability to grab enemies and spin them like a tornado.
The player can also use a special magic power that gets charged by picking up scrolls throughout the level. The player can also find life bar refills throughout a stage also.

Each section of a stage must be defeated within a certain time limit. At the end of a stage the player must defeat a boss enemy to advance to the next stage.
Mystical Fighter (USA).desc:
一名歌舞伎武士踏入時間之門，回到將軍王朝，打敗邪惡的歌舞伎領主。該遊戲基本上是一款橫向捲軸格鬥遊戲，玩家控制歌舞伎武士。在每個階段，玩家都可以對成群的敵方小兵拳打腳踢。玩家可以使用的其他動作包括跳踢、舉起敵人並將其扔出的能力以及抓住敵人並像龍捲風一樣旋轉它們的能力。
玩家還可以使用特殊的魔法力量，通過拾取整個關卡中的捲軸來充電。玩家還可以在整個階段找到生命條補充。

階段的每個部分都必須在一定的時間內被擊敗。在一個階段結束時，玩家必須擊敗頭目敵人才能進入下一階段。

Shining Force II (USA).name: 光明與黑暗續戰篇II 古代的封印
Shining Force II (USA).original_desc:
Shining Force II is a strategy/RPG hybrid with cartoon-like graphics. The game is comprised of two modes: exploration, in which the hero and his companions engage in the role-playing game standard of talking to townspeople, exploring new lands, and furthering the plot; and battle mode, in which the combat is resolved from a tactical point of view, with individual combats being resolved from a close-up view with animated characters.

The plot consists of such quests as saving a princess from the clutches of demons, rebuilding the hero's hometown, and uniting the various forces of good together against the hero's nemesis. Along the way, the hero will be joined by many characters who seek to aid him in his journey. Several of these characters can only be obtained by completing side quests. In addition, random battles can occur between the programmed scenarios, giving the hero's party a chance to obtain experience and gain levels outside of the set scenarios.

There are several difficulty levels in the game, selectable when starting a new game. In addition, there is a configuration code that allows cheats to be activated, including the ability to control the enemy units.
Shining Force II (USA).desc:
Shining Force II 是一款策略/角色扮演遊戲，具有卡通般的畫面。遊戲由兩種模式組成：探索，英雄和他的同伴參與角色扮演遊戲標準，與城鎮居民交談，探索新的土地，並推進情節；戰鬥模式從戰術角度解決戰鬥，個人戰鬥從動畫角色的特寫視角解決。

故事情節包括從惡魔手中拯救公主、重建英雄的家鄉、聯合各種正義力量共同對抗英雄的宿敵等任務。一路上，英雄會遇到許多尋求幫助他的角色。其中一些角色只能通過完成支線任務來獲得。此外，在編程的場景之間可以發生隨機戰鬥，讓英雄的隊伍有機會獲得設定場景之外的經驗和等級。

遊戲中有多個難度級別，可以在開始新遊戲時選擇。此外，還有一個配置代碼可以激活作弊功能，包括控制敵方單位的能力。

Light Crusader (USA).name: Game Source Entertainment
Light Crusader (USA).original_desc:
In Light Crusader, you play the role of Sir David, a knight in the service of King Frederick. You are sent to the town Green Row to help your king's brother, King Weeden, to discover what has caused the mysterious disappearance of his town people. You must enter and explore huge dungeons in order to find out about an ancient story that has happened many years ago, and to face evil forces who threaten the land.

Light Crusader is an isometric action/puzzle adventure with RPG elements, along the lines of Landstalker. You can talk to townspeople, buy weapons and items, etc. You spend most of the game in dungeons, which are populated by enemies (whom you fight in real-time combat), and which are full of various types of traps and puzzles. You'll often have to jump to access higher levels or platforms, push switches and other objects to help you advance, and solve various physical puzzles.
Light Crusader (USA).desc: 本電子遊戲列表列舉了索尼 PlayStation的電子遊戲。索尼PlayStation最早於1994年12月3日在日本推出，之後於1995年9月9日在北美推出。

Golden Axe (World) (Rev A).name: 1989年电子游戏界
Golden Axe (World) (Rev A).original_desc:
In the past, a terrible war raged between the Gods, the creators of the world, and the Titans. The Titans were defeated thanks to a super-powerful weapon forged by the Gods, called the Golden Axe. Thanks to this weapon, the Titans were banished, and the Gods bequeathed the Earth to humans. However, one Titan had survived: Death Adder. He seized the Golden Axe and used it to lay waste to the world. He kidnapped the king of Yuria and his daughter and threatened to execute them if the inhabitants did not submit unconditionally. Three heroes, determined to take revenge on Death Adder, set out to find him.
Each character has a special magical ability that can be charged by kicking small creatures that drop a potion.
Golden Axe (World) (Rev A).desc:
過去，世界的創造者諸神與泰坦之間爆發了一場可怕的戰爭。泰坦們被眾神鑄造的超強大武器金斧頭打敗了。多虧了這件武器，泰坦被驅逐，眾神將地球遺贈給了人類。然而，有一位泰坦倖存下來：死亡蝰蛇。他奪取了金斧頭，並用它來毀滅世界。他綁架了尤里亞國王和他的女兒，並威脅如果居民不無條件屈服就處決他們。三位英雄決心向死亡蝰蛇報仇，出發尋找他。
每個角色都有一種特殊的魔法能力，可以通過踢掉掉落藥水的小生物來充電。

Shadowrun (USA).name: 賽博朋克作品列表
Shadowrun (USA).original_desc:
Welcome to 2050, chummer.

Shadowrun is an action RPG of epic proportions. You take on the role of Joshua, a Shadowrunner out to discover who murdered his brother. 

Along the way you get into street brawls, deadly gunfights, run the Matrix, slip into and out of the MegaCorps, explore the wild wilderness and deal with every low-life mage and high-tech cyber Street Samurai in Seattle.

Shadowrun was based on the FASA RPG of the same name, and while real-time, modeled every rule from the paper system, from character stats to experience to combat to weapons and equipment.

The game used an overhead view for physical combat, and a third person "POV" when on Matrix runs. It allowed two other characters to join your party either temporarily or "for life" however long that may be...
Shadowrun (USA).desc:
歡迎來到 2050 年，朋友。

Shadowrun 是一款史詩般的動作角色扮演遊戲。你扮演約書亞（Joshua）的角色，一名暗影狂奔者，前去調查誰謀殺了他的兄弟。

一路上，你會陷入街頭鬥毆、致命槍戰、運行黑客帝國、潛入和潛出巨型軍團、探索荒野並對付西雅圖的每一個低等法師和高科技網絡街頭武士。

《Shadowrun》基於同名的 FASA RPG，在實時的同時，對紙質系統中的每條規則進行建模，從角色統計數據到經驗，再到戰鬥，再到武器和裝備。

遊戲使用俯視視角進行物理戰鬥，並在矩陣運行時使用第三人稱“POV”。它允許另外兩個角色暫時或“終身”加入你的隊伍，無論時間有多長......

DEcapAttack (USA, Europe, Korea).name: 解密攻擊
DEcapAttack (USA, Europe, Korea).original_desc:
In this game you play as Chuck D. Head, the product of a mad, but benevolent, scientist.  Chuck looks a lot like a mummy, except he is missing an important part: a head.  Fortunately, he is equipped with a set of eyes and a weird punching appendage in the middle of his chest. 

Chuck's weird features come in handy when, one day, this evil guy named Max D. Cap emerges from the underworld.  Max quickly takes over our world, and only Chuck can stop him.

The gameplay in Decapattack is of the side-scrolling platformer variety.  You play through several colorful worlds, collect useful power up potions, and deliver a beat down to the ugly bosses.
DEcapAttack (USA, Europe, Korea).desc:
在這款遊戲中，你扮演查克·D·海德 (Chuck D. Head)，他是一位瘋狂但仁慈的科學家的產物。查克看起來很像木乃伊，只是他缺少一個重要的部分：頭。幸運的是，他有一雙眼睛，胸口中央有一個奇怪的拳擊附肢。

有一天，這個名叫馬克斯·D·卡普的邪惡傢伙從地下世界出現，查克的怪異特徵派上了用場。麥克斯很快佔領了我們的世界，只有查克可以阻止他。

《Decapattack》的遊戲玩法屬於橫向捲軸平台遊戲。你在幾個色彩繽紛的世界中玩耍，收集有用的能量藥水，並擊敗醜陋的老闆。

Earthworm Jim 2 (USA).name: 1994年电子游戏界
Earthworm Jim 2 (USA).original_desc:
An ordinary average earthworm named Jim goes about his normal daily life, cruising around avoiding crows and doing other general worm-like things. Jim is suddenly struck by a very large ultra- high- tech- indestructible- super- space- cyber- suit. Through sheer luck, Jim rests safely in the neck ring of the suit. 

Suddenly, the ultra-high-tech space particles of the suit begin interacting with Jim's soft wormy flesh. A radical light-speed evolution takes place.

Jim soon realizes he is in control of the suit.

Gameplay is similar to the first game, with Jim jumping and running through the levels. There are 5 weapons more than the original game to collect. Characters like Princess Whats-Her-Name and Psy-Crow appear.
Earthworm Jim 2 (USA).desc:
一隻名叫吉姆的普通蚯蚓過著正常的日常生活，四處遊蕩，躲避烏鴉，並做其他類似蠕蟲的事情。吉姆突然被一件巨大的超高科技、堅不可摧的超級太空賽博服所震驚。純粹是運氣好，吉姆安全地靠在套裝的頸環上。

突然，宇航服中的超高科技太空粒子開始與吉姆柔軟的蠕蟲肉體相互作用。一場激進的光速進化正在發生。

吉姆很快意識到他掌控著這件衣服。

遊戲玩法與第一款遊戲類似，吉姆在關卡中跳躍和奔跑。比原版遊戲多了 5 種可供收集的武器。諸如“什麼名字的公主”和“精神病烏鴉”等角色出現。

Master of Monsters (USA).name: PocketStation
Master of Monsters (USA).original_desc: Master of Monsters is a turn-based strategy game in which you choose one of five different wizards and fight the other wizards for domination of the land that stands without a ruler after the master wizard's death. You can play in two campaigns against the computer which requires you to defeat the enemy wizards on all maps and allows you to take all units that have survived a battle into the next one. You can also play all maps individually with up two four human players. In battles, you can summon different monsters and cast spells. Which monsters you can summon and which spells you can use depends on which wizard you have chosen. Your aim in every battle is to defeat all other wizards and thus conquering the land (In the campaigns you only have a limited number of turns to do so). Your wizard and monsters gain experience from fighting and your monsters' abilities differ largely from one-another.
Master of Monsters (USA).desc:
《機動戰士鋼彈》（機動戦士ガンダム）或簡稱鋼彈（ガンダム），是由富野由悠季與矢立肇為日升工作室創作的日本動畫系列，始於1979年。作為機甲題材作品，它包含太空戰爭、科技先進世界等科幻經典元素，但通過敘事與技術細節追求現實主義而實現創新。這一系列首次將巨型機器人——機甲題材的核心——降格為大規模量產武器。這一革新理念反映了動畫傳統受眾向成年群體的拓展，由此誕生了日本科幻的子類型「真實系機器人」。

儘管起步艱難，鋼彈在1980年代初取得成功並持續至今；該系列已推出約30部動畫、OVA及電影，另有數十部漫畫、小說、電子遊戲乃至通過SD鋼彈衍生的惡搞作品。雖視聽作品構成系列核心，但鋼彈系列實際依託衍生產品（特別是鋼普拉）作為第二支柱。從經濟角度看，該系列是萬代南夢宮最盈利的IP，年收入約5000億日元。多數批評聚焦於擔憂經濟需求可能壓倒創作需求。
鋼彈系列的成功首要體現在文化層面：鋼彈在中文文化圈裡有一定的知名度，在法語區幾近無名，但在日本卻是一個深刻的社會現象。多數學術研究者明確認定鋼彈系列對日本動畫與流行文化影響重大，常將系列與西方的《星球大戰》相比。這種影響具象化於日本日常生活的方方面面，無論是廣告、專賣店、藝術展覽，還是在東京附近建造的18米高立像。然而鋼彈系列未能稱霸全球，海外推廣有限且常與超時空要塞系列、新世紀福音戰士系列等作品競爭。

Streets of Rage (World) (Rev A).name: 怒之鐵拳II 死鬥的鎮魂歌
Streets of Rage (World) (Rev A).original_desc: Streets of Rage is the first game in what would become a classic brawler series across the early Sega systems. Clearly inspired by the success of Capcom's Final Fight, but with innovations of its own. Choose from three different fighters, all ex-cops, and each with their own strengths, weaknesses, and moveset - then go out on the raging streets and knock some sense into the multitudes of criminal ne'er-do-wells!
Streets of Rage (World) (Rev A).desc: 《怒之鐵拳》是早期世嘉系統中經典格鬥系列的第一款遊戲。顯然受到了 Capcom 的《Final Fight》的成功啟發，但也有自己的創新。從三名不同的戰士中進行選擇，他們都是前警察，每個人都有自己的優點、弱點和動作 - 然後走出憤怒的街道，給眾多犯罪分子敲響警鐘！

Rings of Power (USA, Europe).name: 顽皮狗
Rings of Power (USA, Europe).original_desc:
For a long time, our world was in darkness. The sun shone as always, but our souls were dark and lacked the true enlightenment. Then the holy Nexus arrived, and changed everything. With his Rod of Creation, he blessed the people with the gift of the six Arts. The Red Priests - the people he chose among the others - established an order of the six Guilds. The world entered the era of prosperity. But the evil demon Void stole the Rod of Creation and drove the world to chaos again. In a cosmic battle, Nexus faced Void. None was victorious, and the Rod of Power was broken during the battle. It was divided into eleven rings, known as the Rings of Power. The young sorcerer Buc is now sent on a quest to retrieve those rings, and to unite the Rod of Power that will eventually banish Void forever!

"Rings of Power" is quite different from traditional console RPGs gameplay-wise, and is more similar to Western-style games such as  Ultima series. You can freely wander through the huge isometric world, and are not obliged to follow any storyline except the main quest for the eleven rings. You can talk to NPCs about many topics, choose whom to fight, bribe people, etc. There is a day/night cycle which affects the behavior of characters. Unlike most RPGs, there are no weapons and armor in this game. The turn-based combat is entirely dependent on magic spells. On your journey you will encounter characters from several guilds, each proficient in his own type of magic, and make them join your party.
Rings of Power (USA, Europe).desc:
網際網路特有的社會和文化現象包括的網路迷因，像是流行主題、流行語、圖像、網路爆紅短片和笑話。當這種時尚和感覺在網路上出現時，它們往往會迅速增長並變得更加普遍，因為即時通信促進了口耳相傳的傳播。
以下部分列表更側重於不受地區網際網路法律限制的網際網路現象；其他國家，例如中國或巴基斯坦，確實存在不受地區法律禁止的特定網際網路現象。 這些都包含在中國大陸網路熱點事件列表和巴基斯坦網路熱點事件列表中。

Aero the Acro-Bat 2 (USA).name: Game Boy Advance游戏列表
Aero the Acro-Bat 2 (USA).original_desc: In the sequel to Aero the Acro-Bat you have to defeat evil industrialist Edgar Ektor once again. He is back and again with bad ideas, so you -  in the role of Aero - have to find and destroy him before he carries out his diabolical "Plan B". Like in the last installment, you have to jump, escape lethal obstacles and progress in time. This game features more moves for Aero, more mechanisms to use and more items to collect.
Aero the Acro-Bat 2 (USA).desc: 在《Aero the Acro-Bat》的續集中，你必須再次擊敗邪惡的實業家埃德加·埃克托 (Edgar Ektor)。他一次又一次地帶著糟糕的想法回來，所以你 - 扮演 Aero 的角色 - 必須在他執行他邪惡的“B 計劃”之前找到並摧毀他。就像上一部一樣，你必須跳躍、逃離致命的障礙並及時取得進展。該遊戲具有更多的 Aero 動作、更多的使用機制和更多的物品可供收集。

Splatterhouse 2 (USA).name: Now Production
Splatterhouse 2 (USA).original_desc:
It has been three months since your escape from the Splatterhouse in the first game. Having been unable to save Jennifer, you keep having the recurring dream where she is begging you to come and rescue her. The mask from the Splatterhouse appears and promises that there is still a chance to save her. There is a downside to it, though. Wearing the mask of terror will fill you with feral rage and an insatiable hunger for blood.

Heavily influenced by films such as Evil Dead 2, the game takes you through eight, side-scrolling stages. Rick has a basic set of punches, kicks and flying kicks, but he can pick up additional weapons such as a lead pipes, bones, bombs, a shotgun and a chainsaw for the ultimate bloodfest, while fighting skulls, razor fish and giant demons. A boss, requiring a specific pattern of moves, awaits you at the end of each stage.
Splatterhouse 2 (USA).desc:
距離你在第一款遊戲中逃離 Splatterhouse 已經過去了三個月。由於無法拯救詹妮弗，你不斷地做夢，夢見她懇求你來救她。潑濺屋的面具出現並承諾仍有機會拯救她。但它也有一個缺點。戴上恐怖面具會讓你充滿野性的憤怒和對鮮血無法滿足的渴望。

該遊戲深受《Evil Dead 2》等電影的影響，將帶您經曆八個橫向捲軸關卡。瑞克擁有一套基本的拳擊、踢腿和飛踢，但他可以拿起額外的武器，如鉛管、骨頭、炸彈、霰彈槍和電鋸，以進行終極血戰，同時與頭骨、剃刀魚和巨型惡魔戰鬥。需要特定移動模式的老闆在每個階段結束時等待著您。

Columns III (USA).name: Game Gear
Columns III (USA).original_desc: Third game in the Columns series. In this fast-paced puzzle mayhem, your goal is to arrange three or more jewels of the same colour horizontally, vertically or diagonally to remove them from the playing screen. While the jewels are falling, you can change the order of their colours. In the Arcade, Versus, and Time Trial modes, you can test your skills against an opponent, a clock, or a specific task such as removing a particular jewel. New features include a rising bar that can be used to annoy opponents and magical items that have strategic value to alter the outcome mid-game.
Columns III (USA).desc: 專欄系列的第三款遊戲。在這款快節奏的益智混亂遊戲中，您的目標是水平、垂直或對角排列三個或更多相同顏色的寶石，將它們從遊戲屏幕上移除。當珠寶掉落時，您可以更改其顏色的順序。在街機、對戰和計時賽模式中，您可以與對手、時鐘或特定任務（例如移除特定珠寶）測試您的技能。新功能包括可用於惹惱對手的上升條和具有戰略價值以改變遊戲中期結果的魔法物品。

Taz in Escape from Mars (USA).name: 雅达利2600游戏列表
Taz in Escape from Mars (USA).original_desc:
You play as Taz, the famous cartoon-character. Taz is captured by Marvin the Martian and transfered to his intergalactic Zoo! Now it is your job to aid Taz in his great escape from the Zoo-prison and also find a way back home to Earth. To make the escape a little easier, there are items placed here and there, such as cakes which make regain your health. You also find gas tanks, which you can eat and then breath fire.

You will travel trough the Zoo, and a big wasteland and many other hostile zones with lots of weird enemies and bizarre bosses.
Taz in Escape from Mars (USA).desc:
你扮演著名的卡通人物塔茲。塔茲被火星人馬文捕獲並轉移到他的星際動物園！現在你的任務是幫助塔茲逃離動物園監獄並找到返回地球的方法。為了讓逃生變得更容易，到處都放置著一些物品，例如可以恢復健康的蛋糕。你還可以找到煤氣罐，你可以吃掉它然後噴火。

你將穿越動物園、大片荒地和許多其他敵對區域，那裡有許多奇怪的敵人和奇怪的老闆。

Ooze, The (Japan, USA).name: Genesis Nomad
Ooze, The (Japan, USA).original_desc:
The Ooze is quite a little known (and bizzarre) game that was released towards the end of the Genesis's lifecycle. The story goes that you are a scientist with an experiment that went wrong resulting in you turning into a puddle of green ooze. You are washed down the sink and must make your way back to the lab (by completing a series of puzzles, etc.) to stop your boss taking over the world.

The game is played from top-down perspective and you move around the level fighting enemies and solving puzzles. You can pick up more ooze and other items as you go which can help you get through each level.
Ooze, The (Japan, USA).desc:
Ooze 是一款鮮為人知（而且很奇怪）的遊戲，它是在 Genesis 生命週期即將結束時發布的。故事是這樣的，你是一位科學家，他的實驗出了問題，導致你變成了一灘綠色的軟泥。你被沖下水槽，必須返回實驗室（通過完成一系列謎題等）以阻止你的老闆接管世界。

遊戲是從自上而下的角度進行的，你在關卡中移動，與敵人戰鬥並解決謎題。你可以一邊走一邊撿起更多的軟泥和其他物品，這可以幫助你通過每個關卡。

Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles - The Hyper.key: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles - The Hyperstone Heist (USA)
Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles - The Hyper.original_name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles : The Hyperstone Heist
Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles - The Hyper.name: Mega Drive游戏列表
Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles - The Hyper.original_desc:
The Turtles' nemesis Shredder has acquired the HyperStone from Dimension X, and is using its powers to shrink down the city buildings. He threatens to take over the world and challenges the Turtles to deny him, and so the turtles head out to beat the guy once more.

A standard Ninja Turtles beat-em-up action game.
Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles - The Hyper.desc:
海龜隊的宿敵碎紙機從 Dimension X 獲得了 HyperStone，並利用其力量縮小了城市建築。他威脅要統治世界，並挑戰海龜們拒絕他，於是海龜們再次出發去打敗這個傢伙。

標準的忍者神龜格鬥動作遊戲。

Streets of Rage 3 (USA).name: Game Source Entertainment
Streets of Rage 3 (USA).original_desc: Streets of Rage 3 takes the series to the next level – faster, more complex, and more brutal than ever. With longer stages, branching storylines, and interactive environments featuring deadly traps, the game packs serious variety. New dash and dodge moves add speed, weapons break after use, and can now be integrated into combos. Team attacks return, and enemies use them too, showing smarter behavior – some even steal your health pickups! Blitz moves are now upgradeable but reset on death, though holding a button allows access at a cost. Special attacks no longer drain health but use a regenerating bar. Secret characters await those who meet hidden conditions. It's an intense street brawler with serious depth.
Streets of Rage 3 (USA).desc: 《怒之鐵拳 3》將該系列提升到了一個新的水平——比以往更快、更複雜、更殘酷。遊戲擁有更長的關卡、分支故事情節和帶有致命陷阱的互動環境，因此具有豐富的多樣性。新的衝刺和閃避動作增加了速度，武器在使用後會損壞，現在可以整合到連擊中。團隊攻擊回歸，敵人也使用它們，表現出更聰明的行為 - 有些甚至會竊取你的生命值！閃電戰動作現在可以升級，但在死亡時會重置，儘管按住按鈕可以付費進入。特殊攻擊不再消耗生命值，而是使用再生條。秘密角色等待著滿足隱藏條件的人。這是一款具有深度的激烈街頭鬥毆遊戲。

Gadget Twins (USA).name: KILL la KILL
Gadget Twins (USA).original_desc:
Late one night, the malevolent Thump enters the Gadget Kingdom's castle and steals the Gadget King's gem. The king wakes up the next morning to find that his gem was stolen. The king then summons Bop and Bump to reclaim his stolen possession from Thump.

Gameplay consists of flying through six air and water levels: Gadget Bay, Zeppelin Attack, The Lost City, Sub Attack, The Crystal Lake and Thump's World. Although the game continually scrolls throughout its stages, the player can fly in all directions on the screen. Bop and Bump come equipped with a spring glove mechanism that lets the player punch either up, down, right or left, which is used to defeat enemies.

Defeated enemies drop coins. There are also chests littered throughout the stages which contain coins also. These coins can be spent at a shop where the player can purchase upgrades.

The game also contains bonus stages where the objective is to open all the chests in a limited amount of time.
Gadget Twins (USA).desc:
一天深夜，惡毒的桑普進入了小玩意兒王國的城堡，偷走了小玩意王的寶石。國王第二天早上醒來，發現他的寶石被偷了。國王隨後召喚波普和邦普從桑普手中奪回被盜的財產。

遊戲玩法包括飛越六個空中和水面：Gadget Bay、Zeppelin Attack、The Lost City、Sub Attack、The Crystal Lake 和 Thump's World。儘管遊戲在整個階段中不斷滾動，但玩家可以在屏幕上向各個方向飛行。Bop 和 Bump 配備了彈簧手套機制，可以讓玩家向上、向下、向右或向左擊打，用於擊敗敵人。

擊敗敵人會掉落金幣。各個階段還散佈著一些箱子，裡面也裝有硬幣。這些硬幣可以在玩家可以購買升級的商店中使用。

遊戲還包含獎勵階段，目標是在有限的時間內打開所有寶箱。

Elemental Master (USA).name: 龙与地下城
Elemental Master (USA).original_desc:
Elemental Master's gameplay is similar to a top-down space shooter (i.e Raptor & Raiden), but what makes it unique is the fact you play as a human instead of space-ship.

There are different kinds of weapons which you can use. Like other games in the genre you also have tons of strange enemies to destroy.
Elemental Master (USA).desc:
西方電子角色扮演遊戲是指包括美洲和歐洲在內的西方世界開發的電子角色扮演遊戲（RPG），起源於20世紀70年代的大型大學電腦系統，在80年代前中期由創世紀系列和巫術系列遊戲推廣，並在現代繼續在個人電腦和電子遊戲機系統上開發。角色扮演遊戲於20世紀80年代中後期進入「黃金時代」，後來由於開發商努力不讓自己在硬體更新中脫隊，導致遊戲開發成本增加，因此在20世紀90年代中期走向低谷。Interplay Productions和暴雪娛樂後來發行的一系列等距角色扮演遊戲經歷了更長的開發周期，並樹立了新的品質標準。
電腦角色扮演遊戲（CRPG）再次受到歡迎。BioWare的質量效應系列和貝塞斯達軟體的上古卷軸系列為主機系統開發，並行行了多平台版本，而獨立開發的遊戲經常是個人電腦獨占。角色扮演遊戲的開發者不斷嘗試各種畫面視角和遊戲風格，如即時制和回合制計時系統、軸測投影和第一人稱圖像投影以及單一角色或多角色派系。遊戲子類包括動作角色扮演遊戲、Roguelike遊戲和戰略角色扮演遊戲。

Granada (Japan, USA) (Rev A).name: The Great Escape
Granada (Japan, USA) (Rev A).original_desc: Granada is a free-roaming scrolling shooter set in 2016, where rival factions in Africa fight over rare metals using “maneuver cepters.” A mysterious cepter called Granada, piloted by Leon Todo, begins destroying weapons on all sides. Players control Granada across nine stages, using a map to locate and eliminate targets before facing a boss. The machine is equipped with a standard cannon, a powerful recoil blaster, and assist pickups that redirect shots toward enemies. A key feature is the fixed-cannon mode, allowing players to lock their firing direction while moving freely. The game includes three difficulty levels.
Granada (Japan, USA) (Rev A).desc: 《格拉納達》是一款以 2016 年為背景的自由漫遊捲軸射擊遊戲，非洲的敵對派系使用“機動權杖”爭奪稀有金屬。一架名為“格拉納達”的神秘艦艇，由萊昂·托多駕駛，開始摧毀各方的武器。玩家在九個階段控制格拉納達，在面對老闆之前使用地圖定位並消除目標。該機器配備了標準加農炮、強大的反沖爆能器以及將射擊方向瞄準敵人的輔助拾音器。一個關鍵功能是固定火砲模式，允許玩家在自由移動的同時鎖定射擊方向。該遊戲包括三個難度級別。

Altered Beast (USA, Europe).name: Game Boy Advance游戏列表
Altered Beast (USA, Europe).original_desc:
In this coin-op conversion, you are a hero raised from the dead by the god Zeus to rescue his daughter Athena. With a scenery inspired by Ancient Greece, you have to fight hordes of undead and demons, with a boss at the end of each level until you meet the god Neff, who holds the girl captive.

The title refers to your shapeshifting abilities. In this platformer, you can collect spirit balls by defeating two-headed wolves, allowing you to mutate into different beasts such as a werewolf, a dragon, a tiger, a bear and others depending on the version. Each form, tied to a level, comes with special abilities such as flight and powerful attacks, easily superseding the basic set of punches and kicks in your human form.

The game can be played in singleplayer mode, or in same-screen multiplayer co-op mode.
Altered Beast (USA, Europe).desc:
在這款投幣遊戲中，你是一位被宙斯復活的英雄，拯救他的女兒雅典娜。在受古希臘啟發的場景中，你必須與成群的不死族和惡魔戰鬥，每個關卡的最後都有一個 Boss，直到你遇到囚禁女孩的內夫神。

標題指的是你的變形能力。在這個平台遊戲中，你可以通過擊敗雙頭狼來收集靈球，讓你根據版本變異成不同的野獸，如狼人、龍、虎、熊等。每種形態都與等級相關，都具有特殊能力，例如飛行和強大的攻擊，可以輕鬆取代人類形態中的基本拳打腳踢。

該遊戲可以在單人模式下進行，也可以在同屏多人合作模式下進行。

Cannon Fodder (Europe).name: 有生之年非玩不可的1001款游戏
Cannon Fodder (Europe).original_desc:
Guide a team of up to four soldiers through 72 levels of combat in this innovative top-down action/strategy hybrid, best thought of as Lemmings crossed with Commando crossed with Dune 2. The characters are controlled indirectly using the mouse, as you activate each soldier or group of them by highlighting them, click the left button to move them to a particular spot, and the right button for them to fire guns at an enemy. You can also pick up grenades, which can be used to destroy groups of enemies or buildings (by pressing both buttons at once). 

Each mission has a specific objective, and some feature vehicles such as tanks to make things easier. Your troops can cross water but can't shoot within it, so finding and controlling bridges is often crucial. You can use the arrangement of trees to find hiding places to shoot from, and should watch out for CPU soldiers also doing so.
Cannon Fodder (Europe).desc:
在這款創新的自上而下的動作/策略混合遊戲中，引導一支最多四名士兵的團隊完成 72 個關卡的戰鬥，最好將其視為《旅鼠》、《突擊隊》和《沙丘 2》的結合。使用鼠標間接控制角色，通過突出顯示每個士兵或一組士兵來激活他們，單擊左側按鈕將他們移動到特定位置，單擊右側按鈕讓他們向敵人開槍。你還可以拿起手榴彈，它可以用來摧毀一群敵人或建築物（通過同時按下兩個按鈕）。

每個任務都有一個特定的目標，有些任務還配有坦克等車輛，讓任務變得更容易。你的部隊可以穿過水域，但不能在水中射擊，因此尋找和控制橋樑通常至關重要。你可以利用樹木的排列來尋找隱藏的地方進行射擊，並且應該注意CPU士兵也這樣做。

Battle Mania Daiginjou (Japan, Korea) (T.name: 戰鬥狂熱大吟釀
Battle Mania Daiginjou (Japan, Korea) (T.original_desc:
The Trouble Shooters, Mania Otorii and Maria Haneda, are a pair of bounty hunters who will take any job that involves lots of trouble and plenty of shooting. Their last job saw them saving the Crown Prince Denka from the evil military mastermind Don Morguestein, presumably ending his evil plans. However, three days later, Morguestein has returned once more to take revenge upon the Trouble Shooters. Mania and Maria, never wanting to miss out on the action, head off to take care of him once and for all.

Battle Mania Daiginjo is a comical anime-themed scrolling shooter, and the sequel to Trouble Shooter. The player controls the Dirty Pair-esque Mania and Maria simultaneously, with Maria following closely behind Mania, and also able to turn around and fire to the rear. Unlike most shooters, Mania has a health meter which can be replenished via pickups. There are a variety of weapons to choose from at the start of each stage, and during the game, weapons can be powered up. There is also a screen-clearing bomb attack, but it must be allowed to charge back up each time it is used.

The game includes a standard single-player mode with three difficulty settings. There is also a score attack mode which challenges the player to earn the most points possible in two minutes on a set stage.
Battle Mania Daiginjou (Japan, Korea) (T.desc:
麻煩射手，Mania Otorii 和 Maria Haneda，是一對賞金獵人，他們願意接受任何涉及大量麻煩和大量射擊的工作。他們的上一份工作是從邪惡的軍事策劃者唐·莫格斯坦手中拯救登卡王儲，大概結束了他的邪惡計劃。然而三天后，莫格斯坦再次回來向麻煩射手報仇。馬尼亞和瑪麗亞不想錯過這一行動，於是出發去徹底照顧他。

《Battle Mania Daiginjo》是一款滑稽的動漫主題捲軸射擊遊戲，也是《Trouble Shooter》的續作。玩家同時控制臟對式的馬尼亞和瑪麗亞，瑪麗亞緊隨馬尼亞身後，也可以轉身向後方開火。與大多數射擊遊戲不同的是，Mania 有一個生命值計，可以通過拾取來補充。每個階段開始時都有多種武器可供選擇，並且在遊戲過程中可以對武器進行強化。還有一種清屏炸彈攻擊，但每次使用時都必須允許其重新充電。

該遊戲包括具有三種難度設置的標准單人遊戲模式。還有得分攻擊模式，挑戰玩家在指定舞台上的兩分鐘內獲得盡可能多的分數。

QuackShot Starring Donald Duck (World) (.name: 任天堂GameCube游戏列表
QuackShot Starring Donald Duck (World) (.original_desc:
Donald and his three nephews get their hands on a treasure map and set out to hunt the big prize. Donald travels throughout the world, to places like Egypt, India, South Pole and even Transylvania, while his nephews fly an airplane.

As a weapon Donald uses plungers that can freeze the enemies or stick to walls which can then be used for climbing. Other wacky weapons are popcorn and bubblegum!
This is a steady Disney run-and-jump platformer, with a little puzzle-solving element.

Characters are mostly based on Disney's cartoon series "Duck Tales"
QuackShot Starring Donald Duck (World) (.desc:
唐納德和他的三個侄子拿到了一張藏寶圖，並開始尋找大獎。唐納德環遊世界，去過埃及、印度、南極甚至特蘭西瓦尼亞等地，而他的侄子們則駕駛飛機。

唐納德使用柱塞作為武器，可以凍結敵人或粘在牆上，然後用於攀爬。其他古怪的武器是爆米花和泡泡糖！
這是一款穩定的迪士尼跑跳平台遊戲，帶有一點解謎元素。

角色大多取材於迪士尼卡通系列“鴨子故事”

Ranger X (USA).name: 第一世代寶可夢列表
Ranger X (USA).original_desc:
Ranger X was released fairly late in the lifetime of the megadrive. Coming from an unknown developer it was released with little fanfare and advertising but has become one of the best demonstrations of what the genesis/megadrive is capable of.

The game is a side scrolling shooter of sorts. You control a large mech (robot) which has a smaller side-kick mech which is a bit like a car. The two can join together providing an alternate shooting mode. Whilst controlling just the main mech however, the player can shoot both forward and back by using different buttons. The mech can also use it's rocket pack to boost off of the ground and hover for a short while. Levels are not necessarily left to right moving (although for the most part they are) and the game is an interesting blend of platform game and shoot-em-up.

The game features innovative graphics given the hardware limitations - there is a 3D introduction to most levels (remembering that the console had no 3D capability and a tile-based renderer) and some levels use a line-based scrolling effect to give the impression of 3D backgrounds.
Ranger X (USA).desc:
Ranger X 在 Megadrive 的生命週期中相當晚才發布。它來自一個不知名的開發商，發佈時沒有大張旗鼓和廣告，但已成為創世/超級驅動能力的最佳展示之一。

該遊戲是一款橫向捲軸射擊遊戲。你控制一個大型機甲（機器人），它有一個較小的側踢機甲，有點像汽車。兩者可以結合在一起提供替代的拍攝模式。然而，在僅控制主機械的同時，玩家可以使用不同的按鈕向前和向後射擊。該機甲還可以使用其火箭包從地面升空並懸停一段時間。關卡不一定是從左到右移動的（儘管在大多數情況下是這樣），並且該遊戲是平台遊戲和射擊遊戲的有趣結合。

鑑於硬件限制，該遊戲具有創新的圖形 - 大多數關卡都有 3D 介紹（請記住，控制台沒有 3D 功能和基於圖塊的渲染器），並且某些關卡使用基於線條的滾動效果來給人 3D 背景的印象。

Air Buster (USA).name: 日本成人遊戲
Air Buster (USA).original_desc: Air Buster is a fast side-scrolling shooter. The player controls a small craft through different levels with many enemies. Every level ends with a boss and some section speed up the gameplay, offering fast obstacle courses both horizontally and vertically scrolling. Flying orange pods release many power-ups at once, enhancing the ships with new or more powerful lasers, wing men and shields. The player can also hold the fire key to charge a blast that removes all enemy bullets from the screen and deals damage to all enemies. With an unforgiving difficulty, every hit is fatal, but the game can be continued from any points as long as there are lives and credits left. The game can be played with two players cooperatively.
Air Buster (USA).desc: Air Buster 是一款快速橫向捲軸射擊遊戲。玩家控制一艘小型飛船通過不同的關卡，與許多敵人進行戰鬥。每個關卡都以頭目結束，某些部分可以加快遊戲速度，提供水平和垂直滾動的快速障礙路線。飛行的橙色吊艙會立即釋放許多能量，用新的或更強大的激光、僚機和護盾來增強飛船。玩家還可以按住開火鍵進行爆炸，將屏幕上所有敵人的子彈清除並對所有敵人造成傷害。由於難度難以忍受，每次擊中都是致命的，但只要還剩下生命和積分，遊戲就可以從任何點繼續。該遊戲可以由兩名玩家合作進行。

Phantasy Star II (USA, Europe) (Rev A).name: 梦幻之星II 不归的终点
Phantasy Star II (USA, Europe) (Rev A).original_desc:
The people on a technically advanced planet Mota make experiments to create biomechanical creatures. But one day, a creature was created that appeared to be dangerous to the humans themselves. No signal came to the capital city from the experimental labs... You, a nameless young man living in Paleo, Mota's capital, are commanded to go to the labs and check the issue. Your friend Nei, a semi-human girl, goes with you, and other brave adventurers join you on what starts with a simple mission but develops into saving the entire world...

This is the first Phantasy Star game for the Genesis, set in a futuristic world. The turn-based combat allows you to choose between "fight", where the characters simply attack physically for one turn, and "strategy", where you can choose from several sub-commands, to defend, to use a special technique, or to run from the battle. Instead of magic there are "techniques", that require the usage of TP (technique points).
Phantasy Star II (USA, Europe) (Rev A).desc:
技術先進的莫塔星球上的人們進行實驗來創造生物力學生物。但有一天，一種似乎對人類本身構成危險的生物被創造出來。實驗實驗室沒有信號傳到首都……你，一個生活在莫塔首都帕雷奧的無名年輕人，奉命前往實驗室檢查問題。你的朋友 Nei，一個半人類女孩，和你一起去，其他勇敢的冒險家和你一起從一個簡單的任務開始，但發展到拯救整個世界......

這是 Genesis 的第一款《夢幻之星》遊戲，背景設定在未來世界。回合製戰鬥允許你在“戰鬥”和“策略”之間進行選擇，“戰鬥”是角色在一個回合中進行物理攻擊，而“策略”是你可以從多個子命令中進行選擇，進行防禦、使用特殊技術或逃離戰鬥。除了魔法之外還有“技術”，需要使用TP（技術點）。

Fire Shark (USA).name: Greatest Hits
Fire Shark (USA).original_desc: Fire Shark is a vertical aerial shooter with ten levels in which you pilot a modified biplane equipped with lasers and bombs. You face waves of ground, air, and naval enemies, collect power-ups and weapon upgrades, and receive bonuses between missions as you progress across a South Pacific island.
Fire Shark (USA).desc: Fire Shark 是一款具有十個關卡的垂直空中射擊遊戲，您將駕駛一架配備激光和炸彈的改裝雙翼飛機。當你在南太平洋島嶼上前進時，你將面對一波又一波的地面、空中和海上敵人，收集能量提升和武器升級，並在任務之間獲得獎勵。

Aero the Acro-Bat (USA).name: Game Boy Advance游戏列表
Aero the Acro-Bat (USA).original_desc: You play as bat Aero, who have to stop the mad scientist Edgar Ektor, who is trying to rid the world of amusement and fun. So you jump through the circus-style levels, using different kinds of machines such as catapults, cannons, bubble machines, platforms, etc., collecting various power-ups such as cheese, soda, keys, clocks, etc. and avoiding lethal obstacles.
Aero the Acro-Bat (USA).desc: 你扮演蝙蝠 Aero，他必須阻止瘋狂科學家埃德加·埃克托 (Edgar Ektor)，他正試圖消除世界上的娛樂和樂趣。所以你要跳過馬戲團風格的關卡，使用不同種類的機器，如彈射器、大砲、泡泡機、平台等，收集各種能量道具，如奶酪、蘇打水、鑰匙、時鐘等，並避開致命的障礙。

Trouble Shooter (USA).name: 2025年遊戲大獎
Trouble Shooter (USA).original_desc: King Frederick's son and heir to the throne, Prince Eldon, has been kidnapped by Blackball, an evil military weapons genius.  Just as international disaster seems imminent, Colonel Patch calls in the "Trouble Shooter" to take care of Blackball and his evil robot minions.  Play as Madison and her faithful sidekick Crystal in this action side-scrolling adventure which takes you through 5 levels of Blackball's domain to the very mastermind himself.  Will Madison be able to defeat Blackball and rescue Prince Eldon in time?
Trouble Shooter (USA).desc: 腓特烈國王的兒子、王位繼承人埃爾登王子被邪惡的軍事武器天才布萊克鮑綁架了。就在國際災難即將來臨之際，帕奇上校召喚了“麻煩射手”來照顧黑球和他邪惡的機器人爪牙。在這款橫向捲軸動作冒險遊戲中，扮演 Madison 和她忠實的伙伴 Crystal，帶您穿過 Blackball 領地的 5 個關卡，最終找到主謀本人。麥迪遜能否及時擊敗黑球並營救埃爾登王子呢？

Aladdin (USA).name: 华特迪士尼动画工作室电影列表
Aladdin (USA).original_desc:
The game from Virgin based on the 1992 animated Disney film is a side-scrolling platformer.

The player controls Aladdin, who must make his way through several levels based on locations from the movie: from the streets and rooftops of Agrabah, the Cave of Wonders and the Sultan's dungeon to the final confrontation in Grand Vizier Jafar's palace. The Sultan's guards and also animals of the desert want to hinder Aladdin in his way. He can defend himself with his sword or by throwing apples. Next to apples, Aladdin can also collect gems which can be traded for lives and continues with a traveling trader. Finding Genie or Abu icons enables bonus rounds. The Genie bonus round is a game of luck played for apples, gems or extra lives. In Abu's bonus round, the player controls the little monkey who has to catch bonus items that fall from the sky, but without touching any of the unwanted objects like rocks and pots.

The game's humorous animations were created by Walt Disney Feature Animation.
Aladdin (USA).desc:
Virgin 的這款遊戲改編自 1992 年的迪士尼動畫電影，是一款橫向捲軸平台遊戲。

玩家控制阿拉丁，他必鬚根據電影中的地點穿過幾個關卡：從阿格拉巴的街道和屋頂、奇蹟洞穴和蘇丹的地牢，到大維齊爾賈法爾宮殿的最後對峙。蘇丹的衛兵和沙漠中的動物都想阻止阿拉丁。他可以用劍或扔蘋果來保護自己。除了蘋果之外，阿拉丁還可以收集可以用生命交換的寶石，並繼續與旅行商人一起。找到精靈或阿布圖標可以開啟獎勵回合。精靈獎勵回合是一種運氣遊戲，贏取蘋果、寶石或額外生命。在阿布的獎勵回合中，玩家控制小猴子，它必須抓住從天上掉下來的獎勵物品，但不能接觸任何不需要的物體，例如岩石和罐子。

遊戲的幽默動畫由華特迪士尼動畫製作。

Phantasy Star IV (USA).name: 白金版遊戲
Phantasy Star IV (USA).original_desc:
The Algo star system is in troubled times...

Many thousands of years ago, the Algo Star System was a peaceful system. Three planets surrounded the peaceful Algo star and were in perfect harmony: Palma, a lush green planet, where its citizens devoted their lives to arts and the sciences. Motavia, a desert planet, inhabited by humans and native Motavians, and the enigmatic Dezolis, a harsh ice planet, where the citizens were just as unknown as the planet itself. Unfortunately, the harmony and balance was not to last. Palma had exploded, and with it, 90% of the population of Algo died. Motavia had fallen into horrible conditions from the explosion, turning almost into a total wasteland. The Darkness spread its hand over the land...

Now, 1,000 years had passed. Motavia had healed somewhat, and life was beginning to return to the way it once was thousands of years ago. The Hunter's Guild on Motavia helped to keep things steady. But now, a dark evil once thought to be long dead is beginning to stir once again, and the young Hunter, Chaz, is about to begin his ultimate adventure - and all of it started with one simple routine assignment...

The gameplay of the fourth entry in the  Phantasy Star is similar to that of the  second installment, sharing notable features such as the ability to equip two weapons at once, different healing items for humans and androids, most of the "techniques" (equivalent to magic spells in comparable games), etc. As before, leveling up and technique-learning is automatic. There are a few segments in the game with vehicle combat, which mostly follows the same turn-based formula as the regular battles. Side quests are present in form of hunter assignments for Chaz and his friends.
Phantasy Star IV (USA).desc:
Algo 星系統正陷入困境……

數千年前，阿爾戈恆星系統是一個和平的系統。三顆行星圍繞著和平的阿爾戈星，完美和諧：帕爾馬，一顆鬱鬱蔥蔥的綠色行星，其公民將一生奉獻給藝術和科學。莫塔維亞是一顆沙漠星球，居住著人類和當地的莫塔維亞人，而神秘的德佐利斯是一顆嚴酷的冰雪星球，那裡的居民和星球本身一樣不為人知。不幸的是，這種和諧與平衡並沒有持續多久。帕爾馬發生了爆炸，阿爾戈 90% 的人口因此喪生。莫塔維亞因爆炸而陷入了可怕的境地，幾乎變成了一片荒地。黑暗將其手掌伸向大地……

如今，一千年過去了。莫塔維亞已經痊癒了一些，生活開始恢復到幾千年前的樣子。莫塔維亞的獵人公會幫助維持了穩定。但現在，曾經被認為早已死亡的黑暗邪惡勢力再次開始蠢蠢欲動，年輕的獵人查茲即將開始他的終極冒險——而這一切都始於一項簡單的例行任務……

《夢幻之星》第四部的遊戲玩法與第二部類似，具有相同的顯著特徵，例如能夠同時裝備兩種武器、人類和機器人的不同治療物品、大部分“技術”（相當於同類游戲中的魔法咒語）等。和以前一樣，升級和技術學習是自動的。遊戲中有一些車輛戰鬥部分，大部分遵循與常規戰鬥相同的回合製公式。支線任務以查茲和他的朋友們的獵人任務的形式出現。

Mega Bomberman (USA).name: 世嘉土星
Mega Bomberman (USA).original_desc:
Mega Bomberman is a top down strategy game. Control your Bomberman through various levels defeating multiple enemies and plenty of bosses. Each level consist of blocks for exploding and some blocks that don't explode. At times you will need the non-exploding blocks as shelter. The blocks that do explode reveal power-ups and eggs. 

The eggs are the unique twist to this version of Bomberman. When you get a egg, it hatches into a kangaroo. There are multiple kangaroo types, each with their own unique ability. You hop on the back of the kangaroo and utilize it's ability. If you happen to walk into an explosion the kangaroo takes the damage and dies and you continue to live. 

Another unique feature in multiplayer is you can choose your character. Pick one of 9 such as Miner, Tiny, Fat, Cop, Punk(On cover), Lady, Old man, Robot and the original Bomberman.

After selecting your character get ready for battle as you are placed in 1 of the 4 corners of the arena. Now just blow your way through the blocks and attack some opponents. Watch out for their bombs and remember to dodge your own. There are also many arena's to choose from. Each arena has it's own twist such as trap doors, an igloo to hide in, conveyor belts and more.
Mega Bomberman (USA).desc:
超級炸彈人是一款自上而下的策略遊戲。控制你的炸彈人通過不同的關卡，擊敗多個敵人和大量的頭目。每個級別都包含可爆炸的塊和一些不爆炸的塊。有時你需要非爆炸方塊作為庇護所。爆炸的方塊會顯示能量和雞蛋。

雞蛋是這個版本的炸彈人的獨特之處。當你得到一個蛋時，它會孵化成袋鼠。袋鼠有多種類型，每種都有自己獨特的能力。你跳到袋鼠的背上並利用它的能力。如果你碰巧走進爆炸，袋鼠會受到傷害並死亡，而你則繼續生活。

多人遊戲的另一個獨特功能是你可以選擇你的角色。從礦工、小小、胖子、警察、朋克（封面上）、女士、老人、機器人和原始炸彈人等 9 種中選擇一種。

選擇角色後，您將被放置在競技場 4 個角落之一，準備戰鬥。現在只需炸開障礙物並攻擊一些對手即可。小心他們的炸彈，並記住躲避自己的炸彈。還有很多競技場可供選擇。每個競技場都有自己的特色，例如活板門、可以躲藏的冰屋、傳送帶等等。

Punisher, The (USA).name: 惩罚者 (2004年电影)
Punisher, The (USA).original_desc:
Join Frank Castle's crusade for justice and revenge in this port of the arcade beat 'em up. Based on the Marvel comic of the same name, you play as the cold blooded vigilante or his pal Nick Fury (from S.H.I.E.L.D.) with your mission being to tear through the many rackets and underground criminal hotspots to cripple the Kingpin's criminal empire, and finally take down the man himself and bring peace to New York.

The game plays as a standard side-scrolling beat 'em up with your objective being to clear all stages of enemies by attacking them with your arsenal of attacks or whatever weapons you can find. Features single and 2-player cooperative gameplay.
Punisher, The (USA).desc:
加入弗蘭克·卡斯爾 (Frank Castle) 的正義與復仇十字軍，在這個街機港口擊敗他們。改編自同名漫威漫畫，你將扮演冷血的義務警員或他的朋友尼克·弗瑞（來自神盾局），你的任務是剷除眾多的犯罪團伙和地下犯罪熱點，削弱金併的犯罪帝國，最終幹掉這個人，為紐約帶來和平。

該遊戲是一款標準的橫向捲軸清版遊戲，你的目標是用你的攻擊武器或任何你能找到的武器來攻擊他們，清除所有階段的敵人。具有單人和兩人合作遊戲玩法。

Wonder Boy in Monster World (USA, Europe.key: Wonder Boy in Monster World (USA, Europe)
Wonder Boy in Monster World (USA, Europe.name: Game Source Entertainment
Wonder Boy in Monster World (USA, Europe.original_desc:
"Monster World was once a peaceful region. Then, the peace was shattered by an invading army of monsters. A young man named Shion vowed to defeat them and make his land peaceful again."

Wonder Boy In Monster World puts you in control of Shion in his quest to save Monster World from the evil hands of BioMeka.  It controls like your standard platform game - run, jump, and kill enemies.  The game is filled with RPG elements such as talking to townsfolk, collecting money to buy items, upgrading your life, and equipping a variety of armor and weapons - staying very close to the "Zelda format".  You can save your game to continue your quest at a later time.

Wonder Boy In Monster World is the third game in the Monster World spin-off series.  In Japan the game is called Wonder Boy 5: Monster World 3.
Wonder Boy in Monster World (USA, Europe.desc:
“怪物世界曾經是一個和平的地區。後來，和平被入侵的怪物大軍打破了。一個名叫紫苑的年輕人發誓要打敗他們，讓他的土地恢復和平。”

《怪物世界裡的神奇男孩》讓你控制 Shion，從 BioMeka 的邪惡手中拯救怪物世界。它的控制方式就像標準平台遊戲一樣——奔跑、跳躍和殺死敵人。遊戲充滿了 RPG 元素，例如與城鎮居民交談、收集金錢購買物品、升級你的生活以及裝備各種盔甲和武器 - 非常接近“塞爾達格式”。您可以保存遊戲以便稍後繼續您的任務。

怪物世界中的神奇男孩是怪物世界衍生系列的第三款遊戲。在日本，該遊戲稱為 Wonder Boy 5：怪物世界 3。

Nadia - The Secret of Blue Water (Japan).key: Nadia - The Secret of Blue Water (Japan) (Translated)
Nadia - The Secret of Blue Water (Japan).name: 红白机游戏列表
Nadia - The Secret of Blue Water (Japan).original_desc:
This is one of the several games based on the animé series The Secret of Blue Water. The series (and the game) are loosely based on the stories by the famous French science fiction author Jules Verne. The game is set in 1889, a time of great inventions and technology progress unseen before. You play as Jean, a young genius scientist. In Paris he meets Nadia, an African circus performer. Nadia wears a pendant that contains magical powers, and that is why the evil Gargoyle is after her - this pendant is just the item she needs to build the ultimate weapon, the Tower of Babel. Jean will do anything to protect Nadia, and hope that his love to her, his adventurer spirit, and the power of science will eventually defeat Gargoyle!

Unlike most Japanese adventures, "Fushigi no Umi no Nadia" is a top-down, third-person perspective game, in which you actually move your character around. Nadia and other friends join Jean in a RPG-like fashion (although there is no combat in the game, different characters have their own item-based abilities you should use at certain points). There are no real puzzles in the game, but you'll often have to use your inventory items to make the game progress.

Not to confuse with other Fushigi no Umi no Nadia games (for NES, Turbo CD, etc.)!
Nadia - The Secret of Blue Water (Japan).desc:
這是基於動漫系列《藍水的秘密》的幾款遊戲之一。該系列（和遊戲）大致改編自法國著名科幻小說作家儒勒·凡爾納的故事。遊戲背景設定在 1889 年，這是一個充滿了前所未見的偉大發明和技術進步的時代。你扮演吉恩，一位年輕的天才科學家。在巴黎，他遇到了非洲馬戲團演員納迪亞。娜迪亞戴著一個蘊含魔法力量的吊墜，這就是邪惡石像鬼追捕她的原因 - 這個吊墜正是她建造終極武器巴別塔所需的物品。吉恩會不惜一切代價保護娜迪亞，並希望他對她的愛、他的冒險精神和科學的力量最終能打敗石像鬼！

與大多數日本冒險遊戲不同，“Fushigi no Umi no Nadia”是一款自上而下的第三人稱視角遊戲，您可以在其中實際移動角色。納迪亞和其他朋友以類似於角色扮演遊戲的方式加入吉恩（雖然遊戲中沒有戰鬥，但不同的角色有自己的基於物品的能力，你應該在某些時候使用）。遊戲中沒有真正的謎題，但您通常必須使用庫存物品來推動遊戲進度。

不要與其他 Fushigi no Umi no Nadia 遊戲（適用於 NES、Turbo CD 等）混淆！

Flashback - The Quest for Identity (USA).name: CD-i游戏列表
Flashback - The Quest for Identity (USA).original_desc: Planet Titan: Brave mutants, robots, anti-matter fields and the primitive inhabitants as you find your way through the jungle. New Washington: First recover your memory, then go undercover to earn money. Finally, buy a false ID if you want to sneak back on Earth. Death Tower: Climb the 8 floors of the Death Tower labyrinth. Avoid the deadly Replicants and win a free ticket to Earth. Earth: Big trouble! The authorities have discovered your false ID and send robot cops to capture you. Paradise Club: You discovered the aliens' plans, but somehow end up being captured and mysteriously transported through space. Planet Morphs: You materialized on their home planet. Now all you have to do is destroy the Morphs and live to tell about it!
Flashback - The Quest for Identity (USA).desc: 泰坦星球：勇敢的變種人、機器人、反物質場和原始居民，當你在叢林中尋找出路時。新華盛頓：先恢復記憶，然後臥底賺錢。最後，如果你想偷偷溜回地球，請購買假身份證。死亡塔：爬上死亡塔迷宮的 8 層。避開致命的複制人並贏得一張前往地球的免費機票。地球：大麻煩了！當局發現了你的假身份證，並派出機器人警察來抓捕你。天堂俱樂部：你發現了外星人的計劃，但不知何故最終被捕獲並神秘地傳送到太空。行星變形：你在他們的母星上顯現。現在你所要做的就是消滅變形者並活著講述它！

Red Zone (USA, Europe).name: CD Projekt
Red Zone (USA, Europe).original_desc:
Red Zone is a helicopter action shooter in which you pilot an AH-64B Apache into the heart of enemy territory to thwart the plans of a nuclear armed dictator.  Under threat of global nuclear war the dictator has begun to annex his neighbor countries, with plans to continue his territorial expansion, so three special operatives are covertly sent in with a lone gunship to remove his ability to wage war.

The majority of the game consists of air-to-ground attack while flying in the Apache, using its hefty loadout of rockets, guided missiles, built-in 30 mm cannon and defensive infrared air-to-air missiles in order to eliminate the hostiles from the air, land and sea.  Fuel drums, repair kits and ammunition depletion are both factors to keep in mind, and careful planning of where the pickups are located so that the chopper is able to stay in the air and is able to keep fighting, elements that are very similar in implementation to the Strike series.  Differences between the games include the fact that as your systems get damaged, your helicopter becomes harder to control and the weapon and radar systems become affected.

Interspersed with the plentiful in-chopper combat, there are numerous mission-oriented sequences in which the occupants of the helicopter disembark and perform missions on-foot inside of buildings.  Each of the three characters have a unique set of weapons, and the player can choose from either of the three to use, so long as none of them have been killed during previous on-foot missions.

Red Zone bears many gameplay similarities to the early entries of the Strike series of games, though while the first three games of that series had a fixed isometric point-of-view, Red Zone has a straight-down POV that rotates along with the helicopter.  Red Zone is also highly reminiscent of Zyrinx's earlier and similarly technologically advanced Genesis game Sub-Terrania, with the most notable similarities being in the relative difficulty of the games, and in the manipulation of the Genesis' hardware into providing visual effects not seen in other games, such as simulated video.
Red Zone (USA, Europe).desc:
Red Zone 是一款直升機動作射擊遊戲，您將駕駛 AH-64B 阿帕奇進入敵方領土的中心，挫敗核武裝獨裁者的計劃。在全球核戰爭的威脅下，獨裁者開始吞併鄰國，併計劃繼續擴張領土，因此三名特工帶著一架武裝直升機被秘密派往，以消除他發動戰爭的能力。

遊戲的大部分內容是駕駛阿帕奇飛行時進行空對地攻擊，使用其大量火箭、制導導彈、內置 30 毫米機砲和防禦性紅外空對空導彈，從空中、陸地和海上消滅敵方。油桶、修理包和彈藥耗盡都是需要牢記的因素，並仔細規劃皮卡的位置，以便直升機能夠留在空中並能夠繼續戰鬥，這些元素在實施上與《Strike》系列非常相似。遊戲之間的差異包括，當你的系統受到損壞時，你的直升機會變得更難控制，武器和雷達系統也會受到影響。

大量的直升機內戰鬥穿插其中，還有許多以任務為導向的序列，其中直升機的乘客下機並在建築物內步行執行任務。三個角色中的每一個都有一套獨特的武器，玩家可以選擇使用這三個角色中的任何一個，只要他們在之前的徒步任務中沒有被殺死。

《Red Zone》與《Strike》系列遊戲的早期作品在遊戲玩法上有許多相似之處，儘管該系列的前三款遊戲具有固定的等距視角，但《Red Zone》具有隨直升機旋轉的直下 POV。Red Zone 也很容易讓人想起 Zyrinx 早期且技術同樣先進的 Genesis 遊戲 Sub-Terrania，最顯著的相似之處在於遊戲的相對難度，以及對 Genesis 硬件的操作，以提供其他遊戲中未見的視覺效果，例如模擬視頻。

Dick Tracy (World).name: 喷神James节目列表
Dick Tracy (World).original_desc:
This is one of the games based on the Dick Tracy movie. You are Dick Tracy, a police detective who enjoys a peaceful life with his wife. But his wife's father is murdered by a local gangster named Big Boy Caprice, and Dick Tracy is now out for revenge. The game doesn't follow the exact plot of the movie, but simply lets Dick Tracy fight his way through several levels until he faces his archenemy.

This is a platform shooter/"beat-'em-up" game. Plenty of gunmen will attack our hero from all the sides. Dick can only move to the right or to the left. He can use his pistol gun to take out enemies who are in front or behind him. Since he can't approach enemies who attack from the depth of the screen, he can dispose of them using his machine gun. When the enemy is too close, Dick will punch him instead of shooting.
Dick Tracy (World).desc:
《探險活寶》（英語：Adventure Time）是一部美國科學奇幻動畫劇集，由卡通頻道以及弗雷德瑞特工作室製作；這部動畫作品在美國的分級為TV-PG。主要故事為人類阿寶（Finn the Human）和一隻擁有能夠任意變化自己身體的魔力，是他最好的朋友、同時也是繼兄的狗老皮（Jake the Dog）展開的探險旅程，他們生活在「蘑菇戰爭」結束約一千年後的哇賽秘境；劇中其他的主要角色包括：泡泡糖公主、冰霸王以及吸血鬼女王艾薇爾。
這部作品基於為尼克卡通和弗雷德瑞特工作室的「隨意！卡通」動畫培養計劃所製作的短片。在網路掀起一陣爆紅熱之後，被卡通頻道挑選並發展為完整動畫；於2010年3月11日試播、2010年4月5日正式首播，並於2018年9月3日播出最後一集〈跟我一起來〉。這部作品深受奇幻角色扮演遊戲「龍與地下城」以及電玩啟發，並以傳統動畫方式製作；其製作團隊同時製作多集，每集皆是經由分鏡程序創作，一集花大約八至九個月完成。探險活寶的配音團隊，以團體錄音方式錄下音軌，而非分別錄製每名配音的對談，也經常有客座演員配音劇中配角。
探險活寶每集長約11分鐘，為了滿足半小時的電視時段，通常兩集成對播出。首播後，一直是卡通頻道的收視保證。到了2013年3月，每週大約有兩三百萬人收看節目。本作廣受讚譽，以原創性以及建立虛構世界的手法最受肯定，也在成年觀眾間蔚為風潮，其中許多人是受到它的動畫、故事吸引。探險活寶贏得3個安妮獎、8個黃金時段艾美獎、2個英國學院兒童獎，以及皮博迪獎和Kerrang!音樂獎各1個；其外傳漫畫也獲得一次艾斯納獎和兩項哈維獎。

Psy-O-Blade (Japan) (Translated).name: PewDiePie
Psy-O-Blade (Japan) (Translated).original_desc: In 21th century, there are three main powers on the Earth. The free world and the communist block carried over from the 20th century; the third power is the New Communist Federation. Since a program of denuclearizing was supported by all those powers, the New Communist Federation developed a devastating non-nuclear weapon: the satellite "Raiden". The two other powers competed with the New Communist Federation, developing their own killer satellites, and the danger of total annihilation became once again an issue. Seeing no future for the Earth, humans started to colonize other planets. In 22th century, they sent an experimental ship "Septemius 1" to a star six light years far away from the Solar System. The ship's main computer, "Racoon", sent a strange message before stopping any communication. You are Keith McDonnell, a seventeen-year-old crew member of the ship "Septemius 2" that was sent to investigate the strange disappearance.
Psy-O-Blade (Japan) (Translated).desc:
《冰與火之歌：權力遊戲》（英語：Game of Thrones，中國大陸譯《權力的遊戲》，香港譯《權力遊戲》）是一部美國中世紀奇幻史詩劇情類型的電視連續劇。該系列連續劇由大衛·貝尼奧夫和D·B·魏斯替HBO創作。劇情改編自喬治·R·R·馬丁的奇幻小說系列《冰與火之歌》。該影集於貝爾法斯特及英國他處拍攝和製作，拍攝地點還包括加拿大、克羅埃西亞、冰島、馬耳他、摩洛哥和西班牙。該系列的影集於2011年4月17日在HBO開播，至2019年5月19日完結，播出了八季，共73集。在2011年4月19日，第一季第一集首播後，電視台隨即簽約拍攝該劇的第二季。
《冰與火之歌：權力遊戲》遵循著幾個故事線發展，因此有多個情節和一個大型演員劇組。該劇設定於虛構的維斯特洛與厄斯索斯大陸上，其中一段有關維斯特洛與七個王國的鐵王座的故事線，是隨著貴族朝代中合縱連橫之脈絡，一方面爭奪王位、另一方爭取獨立。劇情另一面聚焦於該被廢除的統治王朝之末裔，他被流放並計劃重奪王位；另一故事線則沿著守夜人，捍衛領土免受北方兇猛民族和傳奇生物侵害的兄弟手足之情。
《冰與火之歌：權力遊戲》在HBO上獲得創紀錄的收視率，並擁有著廣泛、活躍且國際化的粉絲群。該系列因其演技、複雜的角色、故事和範圍，以及生產價值而得到評論家的好評，然而，該系列影集經常使用裸露和暴力（包括性暴力）內容而獲致批評，最後一季影集亦因其濃縮故事及創造性的決定，而進而大受撻伐，許多人認為這是令人失望的結論。
獎項方面，該影集獲得58項《黃金時段艾美獎》，這是連續劇系列中最多的一個，包括2015年、2016年、2018年和2019年的傑出影集系列。該劇的其他獎項和提名包括三項《雨果獎最佳戲劇表演獎》（2012年至2014年）、2011年的《皮博迪獎》，以及《金球獎最佳電視連續劇—劇情片》的五項提名（2012年及2015年至2018年）。在2019年，該影集的最後一季創下了當年任何常規系列影集所獲得最多的艾美獎提名的新紀錄，達到32項，打破了1994年由《霹靂警探》長達25年的26項提名紀錄，同時，使《冰與火之歌：權力遊戲》成為獲得最多艾美獎提名的電視連續劇，總數達到161項。
在劇組演員中，彼得·汀克萊傑於《黃金時段艾美獎》中贏得四次傑出影集男配角（2011、2015、2018及2019年），並憑藉提利昂·蘭尼斯特的角色表現獲得2012年金球獎影集系列、迷你影集或電視電影最佳男配角獎。而阿爾菲·阿倫、關朵琳·克莉絲蒂、艾蜜莉亞·克拉克、尼古拉·高斯達-華竇、琳娜·海蒂、基特·哈靈頓、蘇菲·特納、黛安娜·瑞格、卡莉絲·范·荷登、麥斯·馮·西度及梅西·威廉斯也因其表現獲得《黃金時段艾美獎》的提名。

Speedball 2 - Brutal Deluxe (USA).name: 有生之年非玩不可的1001款游戏
Speedball 2 - Brutal Deluxe (USA).original_desc:
Brutal Deluxe doesn't live up to their name - in fact they're the worst team Speedball has ever seen. As their manager, it is your job to transform their fortunes. As well as the league system, which consists of 2 8-team divisions and challenges you to advance to the top, there are also 2 cup tournaments, one of which is played out over 2 'legs' with the aggregate score deciding who progresses.

You can play the matches as well, which is the real meat of the game. They consist of 2 90-second periods, and the gameplay is futuristic, fast and frantic, with heavy tackling encouraged to retrieve the ball. Power-ups and tokens appear on the pitch, including ones to make your players extra-tough or freeze the opponents.
Speedball 2 - Brutal Deluxe (USA).desc:
Brutal Deluxe 名副其實——事實上，他們是 Speedball 見過的最差的球隊。作為他們的經理，你的工作就是改變他們的命運。除了聯賽系統（由 2 個 8 支球隊組成的分區組成並挑戰你晉級頂級聯賽）之外，還有 2 場杯賽，其中一場比賽分為 2 個“賽段”，總得分決定誰晉級。

你也可以參加比賽，這是遊戲的真正內容。它們由 2 個 90 秒的時段組成，遊戲玩法充滿未來感、快速而瘋狂，鼓勵大力搶斷以奪回球。球場上會出現能量提升和令牌，包括讓你的球員變得更強硬或凍結對手的東西。

Mortal Kombat (World).name: 真人快打11
Mortal Kombat (World).original_desc: Five Hundred years ago, an ancient and well respected Shaolin fighting tournament, held every 50 years, was corrupted by an evil and elderly sorcerer by the name of Shang Tsung.  Shang was accompanied by Prince Goro, a warrior of the Shokan race (a four armed half-human/half-dragon). Knowing that if ten tournaments in a row were won by the Outworld champion, the Earth Realm would be conquered by evil and fall into darkness, Shang entered Goro in the tournament and had him defeat the great Kung Lao. Goro has been  reigning supreme as the undefeated fighting champion for five hundred years now. As the last tournament required draws near, Raiden, Thunder God and protector of the Earth Realm, enacts a plan to tip the scales in the humans favor, Seven fighters step into the arena on Shang Tsung's mysterious island: Shaolin warrior Liu Kang, Special Forces operative Sonya Blade, the mercenary thug Kano, fame-seeking actor Johnny Cage, the ice wielding Lin Kuei warrior Sub-Zero and his undead adversary Scorpion, and Raiden himself.
Mortal Kombat (World).desc: 五百年前，每五十年舉行一次的古老而受人尊敬的少林格鬥比賽被一位名叫尚宗的邪惡年長巫師所腐蝕。尚由五郎王子陪同，他是一名 Shokan 種族的戰士（四臂半人/半龍）。商知道如果外星冠軍連續贏得十場比賽，地球王國就會被邪惡征服並陷入黑暗，於是讓戈羅參加比賽並讓他擊敗了偉大的空佬。五郎作為五百年來不敗的格鬥冠軍一直統治著至高無上的地位。隨著最後一場比賽的臨近，雷神和地界的保護者雷電制定了一項計劃，讓天平向人類有利的方向傾斜。七名戰士踏入尚宗神秘島嶼的競技場：少林武士劉康、特種部隊特工索尼婭·刀片、僱傭兵暴徒卡諾、追名逐利的演員約翰尼·凱奇、揮舞冰霜的林鬼武士零號和他的不死對手蝎子，還有雷登本人。

Rolling Thunder 2 (USA).name: Now Production
Rolling Thunder 2 (USA).original_desc:
A follow up to the original rolling thunder, this game is your basic shot-the-bad-guys-and-save-the-world game.

A terrorist group has taken out the world information flow and, as either a guy named Albert Ross or a woman named Leila, you must stop them. You can also get cool weapons that pack more of a punch than your ordinary hand gun.

Also RT2 is a password supported game, so in other words you get a password at the end of each round so if you loss all your lives, you can continue from the end of that round, very handy.
Rolling Thunder 2 (USA).desc:
該遊戲是原版滾雷的後續作品，是射擊壞人並拯救世界的基本遊戲。

一個恐怖組織已經破壞了世界信息流，無論是作為一個名叫艾伯特·羅斯的男人還是一個名叫萊拉的女人，你必須阻止他們。您還可以獲得比普通手槍更具威力的炫酷武器。

另外RT2是一個支持密碼的遊戲，也就是說，你在每一輪結束時都會得到一個密碼，所以如果你失去了所有的生命，你可以從該輪結束時繼續，非常方便。

Lost Vikings, The (USA) (October, 1995).name: 夺宝奇兵
Lost Vikings, The (USA) (October, 1995).original_desc:
Three Vikings, Eric the Swift, Olaf the Stout and Baleog the Fierce, were kidnapped by the alien Tomator, the evil Croutonian ruler, who is collecting unique life forms to display in his gallery. The three Vikings will have to combine their unique skills to defeat Tomator, as well as a vast array of aliens, robots, giant snails, big lizards and more.

The Lost Vikings is a side-scrolling platform puzzle game with a twist. Instead of one character who can jump, run, shoot, collect items, flip switches and so on, there are three different characters, each with his own skills. Eric the Swift can jump, run and bash through walls with his tough helmet. Olaf the Stout has a shield which can block attacks, function as an air glider or as a step to stand on. Baleog the Fierce can shoot things with his arrows (including switches) or kill things with his sword. The player has to use the three Vikings as a team if he wants to get past the increasingly difficult levels and puzzles.
Lost Vikings, The (USA) (October, 1995).desc:
三個維京人：迅捷的埃里克、粗壯的奧拉夫和兇猛的巴萊奧格，被邪惡的克魯頓統治者外星番茄綁架了，番茄正在收集獨特的生命形式並在他的畫廊中展示。三個維京人必須結合他們獨特的技能來擊敗番茄，以及大量的外星人、機器人、巨型蝸牛、大蜥蜴等等。

《失落的維京人》是一款帶有特色的橫向捲軸平台益智遊戲。不再是一個可以跳躍、奔跑、射擊、收集物品、翻轉開關等的角色，而是三個不同的角色，每個角色都有自己的技能。迅捷的埃里克可以跳躍、奔跑，還可以戴著堅固的頭盔衝破牆壁。粗壯奧拉夫擁有一面盾牌，可以阻擋攻擊，可以用作空中滑翔機或站立的台階。兇猛的巴雷奧格可以用他的箭（包括開關）射擊物體或用他的劍殺死物體。如果玩家想要通過越來越困難的關卡和謎題，就必須將三個維京人作為一個團隊。

Ultimate Mortal Kombat 3 (USA).name: 艾爾馬克
Ultimate Mortal Kombat 3 (USA).original_desc:
Ultimate Mortal Kombat 3 combines the best of all the Mortal Kombats into a single cartridge. 23 playable characters are immediately available, such as Reptile, Cyrax, Scorpion, Sub-Zero, Jax, Katana, Sonya, and more. There are two bosses that are unlockable, as well as additional characters.

There is a variety of new levels, some of which are interactive. Characters can uppercut someone, causing them to hit the ground hard and crash through to the bottom floor, or they can knocked someone off a bridge, landing in a pit of spikes.

Players can go against the computer one-on-one, two-on-two, or take part in the 8-fighter tournament.

The DS version has a wireless one-one-one multiplayer mode and includes the Puzzle Kombat mini-game from Mortal Kombat: Deception.
Ultimate Mortal Kombat 3 (USA).desc:
《終極真人快打 3》將所有真人快打中最好的部分整合到一個卡帶中。23 個可玩角色立即可用，如 Reptile、Cyrax、Scorpion、Sub-Zero、Jax、Katana、Sonya 等。有兩個可解鎖的頭目以及其他角色。

有多種新關卡，其中一些是交互式的。角色可以用上勾拳攻擊某人，使他們重重地撞到地面並墜落到底層，或者他們可以將某人從橋上撞下來，落在尖刺坑中。

玩家可以與電腦進行一對一、二對二的對抗，或者參加八人錦標賽。

DS 版本具有無線一對一多人遊戲模式，並包括《真人快打：欺騙》中的 Puzzle Kombat 迷你游戲。

Ecco the Dolphin (USA, Europe, Korea).name: Dreamcast
Ecco the Dolphin (USA, Europe, Korea).original_desc:
Travel through time along with Ecco the dolphin, in the only game that could call itself a "dolphin simulator". Indeed, you can do pretty much everything a typical dolphin does, including eating fish, surfacing in order to breathe, using your biological sonar and of course, jumping out of the water to amaze your friends.

The storyline is actually deeper that one may think by looking at the box illustration. As Ecco, you are the only dolphin who managed to escape from a giant whirlpool which sucked down your entire pod. The five shining stars on your forehead show that you are the chosen one to save them. But that task will be not be an easy one, as you will have to travel through time and space with the Atlantean time machine, and meet the mystical Asterite in order to defeat the Vortex Queen.
Ecco the Dolphin (USA, Europe, Korea).desc:
與海豚艾科一起穿越時空，這是唯一一款可以稱為“海豚模擬器”的遊戲。事實上，你幾乎可以做典型海豚所做的一切，包括吃魚、浮出水面呼吸、使用生物聲納，當然還有跳出水面讓你的朋友們驚嘆不已。

故事情節實際上比看盒子插圖所想像的要深刻。作為艾科，你是唯一一隻設法從巨大漩渦中逃脫的海豚，漩渦將你的整個群體吸了下來。你額頭上的五顆閃亮的星星表明你是被選中來拯救他們的人。但這項任務並不容易，因為你必須乘坐亞特蘭蒂斯時間機器穿越時空，並遇到神秘的星石才能擊敗漩渦女王。

RoboCop Versus The Terminator (USA).name: 網路爆紅列表
RoboCop Versus The Terminator (USA).original_desc:
The Dark Horse comic book crossover of the two famous 80s cyborgs spawned various different game adaptations. RoboCop versus The Terminator on the Genesis is only loosely based on the comic.

The player controls RoboCop who during his duty of policing the streets of Detroit is lured into a trap by Terminators sent from the future. By uploading himself into the computer network, he becomes the seed from which the malevolent Skynet grows. Years later, in the post-apocalyptic future, RoboCop is reactivated and must help the human resistance by attacking and defeating Skynet once and for all.

The game is a platformer with heavy shooting elements and consists of 10 levels. Many enemies stand in RoboCop's way and must be destroyed via 8 different weapons. RoboCop begins the game with only a basic pistol, but other weapons can be found, including flame and grenade throwers, laser guns, self-seeking missiles and others. While all guns have unlimited ammo, only two can be carried at the same time and being killed means the currently equipped gun is lost.

The game is evenly split between present and future levels. Enemies in present Detroit include mostly street punks and other criminal elements while the future is of course populated by deadly machines: Terminators, robotic dogs and spiders and many automated guns. Each level ends with a boss battle, featuring Terminators, heavy tanks and RoboCop's famous adversaries ED-209 and Cain (aka RoboCop 2).

Some levels feature optional goals besides getting to the exit, like freeing hostages or destroying security cameras.
RoboCop Versus The Terminator (USA).desc:
兩個 80 年代著名的機器人的黑馬漫畫交叉產生了各種不同的遊戲改編。《創世紀》中的《機械戰警》與《終結者》只是大致基於漫畫。

玩家控制機械戰警，在底特律街頭執行治安任務時，被來自未來的終結者引誘落入陷阱。通過將自己上傳到計算機網絡，他成為惡意天網生長的種子。多年後，在後世界末日的未來，機械戰警重新啟動，必須​​一勞永逸地攻擊並擊敗天網，幫助人類抵抗運動。

該遊戲是一款帶有大量射擊元素的平台遊戲，共有 10 個關卡。許多敵人阻礙了機械戰警的前進，必須使用 8 種不同的武器將其消滅。機械戰警在遊戲開始時只有一把基本的手槍，但也可以找到其他武器，包括火焰和手榴彈投擲器、激光槍、自尋導彈等。雖然所有槍支都有無限彈藥，但只能同時攜帶兩把，被殺死意味著當前裝備的槍支丟失。

遊戲在當前關卡和未來關卡之間平分。目前底特律的敵人主要包括街頭朋克和其他犯罪分子，而未來當然充滿了致命的機器：終結者、機器狗和蜘蛛以及許多自動槍。每個關卡都以一場 Boss 戰結束，其中包括終結者、重型坦克以及機械戰警的著名對手 ED-209 和該隱（又名機械戰警 2）。

除了到達出口之外，有些關卡還具有可選目標，例如釋放人質或摧毀安全攝像頭。

Alisia Dragoon (USA).name: Mega Drive游戏列表
Alisia Dragoon (USA).original_desc:
The pace is intense. Enemies come at Alisia from everywhere. And nowhere. Battle hordes of crazed barbarians, mow down mobs of poisonous centipedes, and slay squadrons of winged gargoyles. Blast enemies in waves or one by one with multi-directional, auto-targeting laser fire.

Recruit killer companions like the DragonFrye, Ball O'Fire, Thunder Raven and Boomerang Lizard. Use them to hurl blistering boomerangs, fireballs, and electrical attacks. With Alisia's super-tough fighting skills, fry enemies to a crisp. And prove once and for all that you can go hand-to-hand with evil and come out the champion!
Alisia Dragoon (USA).desc:
節奏很激烈。敵人從四面八方湧向 Alisia。無處可去。與瘋狂的野蠻人大軍作戰，消滅成群的有毒蜈蚣，殺死成群的帶翼石像鬼。使用多方向、自動瞄準的激光火力一波又一波地轟炸敵人。

招募殺手夥伴，如龍弗萊、火球、雷霆烏鴉和迴旋鏢蜥蜴。用它們投擲起泡的迴旋鏢、火球和電攻擊。憑藉艾莉西亞超強的戰鬥技巧，將敵人炸成脆餅。並一勞永逸地證明你可以與邪惡並肩作戰並成為冠軍！

Streets of Rage 2 (USA).name: 怒之鐵拳II 死鬥的鎮魂歌
Streets of Rage 2 (USA).original_desc:
After Axel Stone, Blaze Fielding and Adam Hunter destroyed the evil Syndicate leader, Mr. X, the city became a peaceful place to live, and each one of them followed their own paths. One year later, after their reunion, Adam's brother Sammy returned from school to find their apartment in a mess, and Adam nowhere to be seen, and after calling his two friends, one of them notices a photo of Adam chained to a wall, next to someone they knew very well - Mr. X, who returned to turn the peaceful city once again into a war zone. Now, Axel, Blaze, Sammy, and Axel's good friend Max, a pro wrestler, must head out to stop Mr. X once again...hopefully for good...

Streets of Rage 2 differs from the previous title in several ways. There are changes in both graphics (characters now are bigger, more detailed and with more animation frames, and scenarios are less grainy) and gameplay (the rocket move was replaced by a special move that doubles in offense and defense along several new moves), along other new features such as life bars (and names) for all enemies and the radically different new characters.
Streets of Rage 2 (USA).desc:
在阿克塞爾·斯通、布萊茲·菲爾丁和亞當·亨特消滅了邪惡的辛迪加頭目 X 先生之後，這座城市變成了一個和平的居住地，他們每個人都走著自己的道路。一年後，他們重聚後，亞當的哥哥薩米從學校回來，發現他們的公寓一片狼藉，而亞當卻不見踪影，在給他的兩個朋友打電話後，其中一個人注意到一張亞當被鎖在牆上的照片，旁邊是他們非常熟悉的人——X先生，他的回來將這座和平的城市再次變成了戰區。現在，阿克塞爾、布萊茲、薩米和阿克塞爾的好朋友麥克斯（一名職業摔跤手）必須再次出發阻止 X 先生……希望是永遠的……

《怒之鐵拳 2》與前作在多個方面有所不同。圖形（角色現在更大，更詳細，有更多動畫幀，場景更少顆粒感）和遊戲玩法（火箭移動被一個特殊移動所取代，在幾個新移動中進攻和防禦加倍）以及其他新功能，例如所有敵人的生命條（和名稱）以及完全不同的新角色都發生了變化。

Warsong.name: 夺旗
Warsong.original_desc: Warsong is the only title of a series of famous strategy games, known as Langrisser in Japan, to ever see an official release outside of Japan. It is set in a typical medieval fantasy setting and features traditional turn-based combat. The player controls several generals who can command up to eight different units ranging from ordinary soldiers and archers to more exotic creatures like mermen or lizards.The generals fight alongside their units, however they are much more powerful and are able to use more diverse commands than just moving and attacking, like recovering a small amount of HP or casting spells. Each unit has certain strengths and weaknesses; for example soldiers are good against archers but weak against cavalry etc. Combat is also influenced heavily by terrain types. When two units engage in combat a small animation, similar to those seen in Advance Wars or Fire Emblem, is shown.
Warsong.desc: 《戰歌》是一系列著名策略遊戲（在日本稱為 Langrisser）中唯一在日本以外地區正式發行的遊戲。它以典型的中世紀奇幻背景為背景，並以傳統的回合製戰鬥為特色。玩家控制幾名將軍，他們可以指揮多達八個不同的單位，從普通士兵和弓箭手到更奇特的生物，如人魚或蜥蜴。將軍與他們的單位並肩作戰，但他們更強大，並且能夠使用更多樣的命令，而不僅僅是移動和攻擊，例如恢復少量生命值或施展法術。每個單位都有一定的優勢和劣勢；例如，士兵擅長對抗弓箭手，但對抗騎兵等較弱。戰鬥也很大程度上受地形類型的影響。當兩個單位進行戰鬥時，會顯示一個小動畫，類似於《高級戰爭》或《火焰紋章》中的動畫。

Contra - Hard Corps (USA, Korea).name: Mega Drive游戏列表
Contra - Hard Corps (USA, Korea).original_desc: While the original arcade games, as well as a few computer conversions under the Gryzor title, were released unchanged in Europe, subsequent console installments of the Contra were released under the Probotector title in Europe.
Contra - Hard Corps (USA, Korea).desc:
網際網路特有的社會和文化現象包括的網路迷因，像是流行主題、流行語、圖像、網路爆紅短片和笑話。當這種時尚和感覺在網路上出現時，它們往往會迅速增長並變得更加普遍，因為即時通信促進了口耳相傳的傳播。
以下部分列表更側重於不受地區網際網路法律限制的網際網路現象；其他國家，例如中國或巴基斯坦，確實存在不受地區法律禁止的特定網際網路現象。 這些都包含在中國大陸網路熱點事件列表和巴基斯坦網路熱點事件列表中。

Adventures of Batman & Robin, The (USA).name: 特羅伊·貝克
Adventures of Batman & Robin, The (USA).original_desc:
Based on the award-winning TV series, The Adventures of Batman and Robin pits the player against the diabolical Mr. Freeze who wants to free Gotham with a huge ice cannon and his hired help of other Gotham super villains: The Joker, Mad Hatter, and Two-Face. The player can take the role of either Batman or Robin but this choice doesn't make a difference regarding gameplay. 

This is a side-scrolling action game. The player basically walks from left to right while fighting numerous foes in hand-to-hand combat. Weapons which are found during the levels are used to shoot enemies from a greater distance. These weapons can also be upgraded by picking up the corresponding symbols. 

There are overall four areas (one for each villain) with three levels each, including a film studio or the Gotham University. While most stages are typical fighting levels with occasional 3D effects there are also a few flying ones where the player uses the Batwing or a jet pack.
Adventures of Batman & Robin, The (USA).desc:
改編自獲獎電視劇《蝙蝠俠與羅賓歷險記》，玩家將對抗邪惡的急凍人，他想要用巨大的冰炮解放哥譚，並僱用其他哥譚超級惡棍的幫助：小丑、瘋帽匠和兩張臉。玩家可以扮演蝙蝠俠或羅賓的角色，但這種選擇對遊戲玩法沒有影響。

這是一款橫向捲軸動作遊戲。玩家基本上從左向右行走，同時與眾多敵人進行肉搏戰。在關卡中發現的武器可用於從更遠的距離射擊敵人。這些武器還可以通過拾取相應的符號來升級。

總共有四個區域（每個惡棍一個），每個區域三個級別，包括電影製片廠或哥譚大學。雖然大多數關卡都是典型的戰鬥關卡，偶爾會有 3D 效果，但也有一些飛行關卡，玩家需要使用蝙蝠翼或噴氣背包。

Alex Kidd in the Enchanted Castle (USA).key: Alex Kidd in the Enchanted Castle (USA)
Alex Kidd in the Enchanted Castle (USA).original_name: Alex Kidd in the Enchanted Castle
Alex Kidd in the Enchanted Castle (USA).name: 小玉理惠子
Alex Kidd in the Enchanted Castle (USA).original_desc:
Alex Kidd, resident of planet Aries, is the brother to the king. One day he comes across a rumor that his long lost father, King Thor, is alive and somewhere on the planet Paperock. 

Now Paperock is a place where you have to be good at the game of 'Paper, Rock and Scissors' to get anywhere. With that knowledge you must take control of Alex, guide him through the odd natured, unfriendly planet and help him find his father.
Alex Kidd in the Enchanted Castle (USA).desc:
亞歷克斯·基德是白羊座行星的居民，是國王的兄弟。有一天，他聽到一則謠言，說他失散已久的父親雷神國王還活著，並且在佩洛剋星球的某個地方。

現在，Paperock 是一個你必須擅長“石頭、剪刀、布”遊戲才能到達任何地方的地方。有了這些知識，你必須控制亞歷克斯，引導他穿越這個性質古怪、不友好的星球，並幫助他找到他的父親。

El.Viento (USA).name: 第63屆格萊美獎
El.Viento (USA).original_desc:
In 1930s New York, a dark cult plans the resurrection of their master, the Dark Prince Hastur, in order to control all of New York and the world. The mob is on their side in this, funding their dark projects and rituals needed to bring their dark master out into their world.

The only one that can stop them is a young girl named Annet... born of the cursed bloodline of Hastur, yet against his plans. Her only weapon: a mystic boomerang known as El Viento...

As Annet, you will do battle with the mob, navigating through Sewers, Caves and buildings, collecting bonus items along the way.
El.Viento (USA).desc:
20 世紀 30 年代的紐約，一個黑暗邪教計劃復活他們的主人黑暗王子哈斯塔，以控制整個紐約和世界。暴民在這方面站在他們一邊，資助他們的黑暗項目和儀式，將他們的黑暗主人帶入他們的世界。

唯一能阻止他們的是一位名叫安妮特的年輕女孩……出生於哈斯塔的受詛咒血統，但卻違背了他的計劃。她唯一的武器：一把被稱為 El Viento 的神秘迴旋鏢……

作為安妮特，你將與暴民戰鬥，穿過下水道、洞穴和建築物，沿途收集獎勵物品。

Krusty's Super Fun House (USA, Europe) (.key: Krusty's Super Fun House (USA, Europe) (Rev A)
Krusty's Super Fun House (USA, Europe) (.name: Super Girls
Krusty's Super Fun House (USA, Europe) (.original_desc:
Krusty the Clown's Fun House has been overrun by rats.  You must help him to herd the rats into trap machines to clear them out.  In order to do so, Krusty must manipulate his environment to set up pathways so that the rats are headed in the right direction.  Objects that Krusty move around include blocks, fans, and pipe pieces.

The trap machines are operated by other recognizable Simpson's characters:  Bart, Homer, Sideshow Mel, and Corporal Punishment.
Krusty's Super Fun House (USA, Europe) (.desc:
小丑庫斯蒂的遊樂園已被老鼠佔領。你必須幫助他將老鼠趕入陷阱機器中以將其清除。為了做到這一點，庫斯蒂必須操縱他的環境來建立路徑，使老鼠朝著正確的方向前進。Krusty 移動的物體包括方塊、風扇和管件。

陷阱機器由辛普森的其他知名角色操作：巴特、荷馬、雜耍梅爾和體罰。

Truxton (World).name: Mega Drive游戏列表
Truxton (World).original_desc:
Truxton is one of the earlier 2D scrolling shoot-em-ups. Originally an arcade game, the Genesis/Megadrive version was the only home port of the game released in the United States of America and Europe (and is fairly rare to find). The game was released as "Tatsujin" on the PC Engine in Japan as well.

The game features the usual vertical scrolling backdrops, multiple rounds/stages, myriads of enemy fighters, BIG guns and power-ups.
Truxton (World).desc:
Truxton 是早期的 2D 捲軸射擊遊戲之一。Genesis/Megadrive 版本最初是一款街機遊戲，是該遊戲在美國和歐洲發行的唯一本地端口（而且相當罕見）。該遊戲也在日本的 PC 引擎上以“Tatsujin”的名稱發布。

該遊戲具有常見的垂直滾動背景、多個回合/階段、無數敵方戰鬥機、大槍和能量提升。

X-Men 2 - Clone Wars (USA, Europe).name: X戰警2：複製人大戰
X-Men 2 - Clone Wars (USA, Europe).original_desc:
This is the second X-Men game from Sega for the Genesis.  This time around, an alien force known as the Phalanx is out to control the earth. The X-Men are our only hope to stop this menace.

The gameplay of this adventure is similar to side-scrolling action of the previous title.  You have more playable characters this time: Beast, Gambit, Nightcrawler, Psylocke, Wolverine, Cyclops and even Magneto.
X-Men 2 - Clone Wars (USA, Europe).desc:
這是世嘉為 Genesis 推出的第二款 X 戰警遊戲。這一次，一支被稱為“方陣”的外星勢力要控制地球。X戰警是我們阻止這種威脅的唯一希望。

這個冒險的遊戲玩法類似於前作的橫向捲軸動作。這次你有更多的可玩角色：野獸、智謀、夜行者、靈蝶、金剛狼、獨眼巨人，甚至萬磁王。

Mortal Kombat II (World).name: 真人快打11
Mortal Kombat II (World).original_desc:
The Mortal Kombat fighters, plus several new ones, return for a tournament held by the evil Shang Tsung of the Outworld. The action is one-on-one as before, and famed for its high level of violence and blood (other than the sanitised Nintendo version). There are 5 difficulty levels and optional credits, as well as the usual two player mode including same character duels.

To win the main tournament, the player must beat each of the other human players, before taking on Shang Tsung, Kintaro and finally Shao Kahn. Players have a range of punches and kicks available, as well as flying kicks, uppercuts, roundhouses, and the special moves, which vary for each player. These include throws, uppercuts, long-distance bullets, bicycle kicks and a teleport feature.
Mortal Kombat II (World).desc:
真人快打戰士以及幾名新戰士回歸參加外星邪惡尚宗舉辦的錦標賽。該動作和以前一樣是一對一的，並以其高水平的暴力和血腥而聞名（除了經過消毒的任天堂版本）。有 5 個難度級別和可選的積分，以及通常的兩人玩家模式，包括相同的角色決鬥。

為了贏得主賽，玩家必須擊敗其他所有人類玩家，然後再對陣 Shang Tsung、Kintaro，最後是 Shao Kahn。玩家可以使用一系列的拳擊和踢腿，以及飛踢、上勾拳、迴旋拳和特殊動作，這些動作因每個玩家而異。其中包括投擲、上勾拳、遠距離子彈、自行車踢和傳送功能。

Steel Empire (USA).name: 俠盜獵車手V
Steel Empire (USA).original_desc: The game presents itself as an old-time war film produced by the "HOT-B Film Corporation". In the film, the future is the Steel Age, where a military dictatorship called Motorhead enslaved the human population. The only hope for freedom is the Republic of Silverhead, who managed to remain independent, and who alone has the weapons to take out Motorhead.
Steel Empire (USA).desc: 該遊戲將自己呈現為“HOT-B Film Corporation”製作的一部舊式戰爭電影。在電影中，未來是鋼鐵時代，一個名為摩託海德的軍事獨裁政權奴役了人類。自由的唯一希望是銀頭共和國，它設法保持獨立，並且只有銀頭共和國擁有武器來消滅摩托黑德。

Greatest Heavyweights (USA).name: Map of the Soul: 7
Greatest Heavyweights (USA).original_desc:
Greatest Heavyweights is a boxing game featuring the ex heavyweight champions Evander Holyfield, Larry Holmes, Joe Frazier, Muhammad Ali, Floyd Patterson, Rocky Marciano, Joe Louis and Jack Dempsey. Their likeness and real fighting style are simulated by the game.

The game is an enhanced version of Evander Holyfield's "Real Deal" Boxing, being also played in a pseudo-3D side view with moving around the ring handled by scrolling the backdrop and moving the ropes. This time, a 2.5D camera is shown at the top of the screen.

There are three game modes:

1. Exhibition: one or two players can fight a single match.

2. Tournament: one player chooses among the eight heavyweight champs available in a eight-man tournament against the remaining seven.

3. Career: one player creates a character who starts as the #30 of the ranking, fighting his way up against fictional characters. During character creation, players can choose the fighter's color of skin (which now includes some unnatural colors such as green and blue), trunks and hair, haircut, size of body and stats emphasis (power, speed and stamina). Between matches, career mode offers various exercises to assign the boxer to improve his stats. After reaching the #1 in the ranking, the player will be challenged by each one of the eight greatest heavyweight champions.

During the fights, besides an energy bar, the fighters have a head and a torso damage meter. This meters are images of their head and torso, which become gradually grey, from top to bottom, as they are hit. If one of these meters becomes totally grey, it will start blinking, warning that it the fighter takes some more punches on that area, he will loose the fight by TKO. Being knocked down tree times in a round also leads to a TKO. During the rounds' breaks, fighters regain strength as the girl with the round sign passes along their sides.

Fighters can perform three types of punches: jabs, hooks and uppers, which can be aimed at the opponent's head or torso. Fighters can also taunt their opponents. Each one of the heavyweight champions has his own set of personal taunts. If by some reason the fighters avoid to fight, the spectators will start to hiss at them. To keep the spectators pleased, the fighters must keep punching each other on a regular basis.

The game plays sensibly faster than Evander Holyfield's, and the character animation is more detailed. There's a replay feature included, and the fights are announced by Michael Buffer's voice.
Greatest Heavyweights (USA).desc:
Greatest Heavyweights 是一款由前重量級冠軍伊万德·霍利菲爾德、拉里·霍姆斯、喬·弗雷澤、穆罕默德·阿里、弗洛伊德·帕特森、洛基·馬西亞諾、喬·路易斯和傑克·登普西參加的拳擊比賽。遊戲模擬了他們的相似度和真實的戰鬥風格。

該遊戲是 Evander Holyfield 的“Real Deal”拳擊的增強版，也是在偽 3D 側視圖中進行，通過滾動背景和移動繩索來控制拳擊場的移動。這次，屏幕頂部顯示了 2.5D 攝像頭。

共有三種遊戲模式：

1. 表演賽：一到兩名選手可以進行一場比賽。

2. 錦標賽：一名選手從八人錦標賽中的八名重量級冠軍中選出，與其餘七名選手進行比賽。

3. 職業生涯：一名玩家創建一個角色，開始時排名第 30，與虛構角色戰鬥。在角色創建過程中，玩家可以選擇戰士的膚色（現在包括一些不自然的顏色，例如綠色和藍色）、軀乾和頭髮、髮型、身體大小和統計重點（力量、速度和耐力）。在比賽之間，職業模式提供了各種練習來分配拳擊手來提高他的統計數據。達到排名第一後，玩家將受到八位最偉大的重量級冠軍的挑戰。

在戰鬥中，除了能量條外，戰士還有頭部和軀幹傷害計。這些米是他們的頭部和軀幹的圖像，當他們被擊中時，從上到下逐漸變成灰色。如果這些儀表中的一個完全變成灰色，它就會開始閃爍，警告如果拳擊手在該區域再多出拳，他就會被 TKO 輸掉戰鬥。在一輪中被擊倒樹木次數也會導致 TKO。在回合休息期間，當帶有圓形標誌的女孩從他們身邊經過時，戰士們會恢復體力。

拳手可以打出三種拳法：刺拳、勾拳和上拳，可以瞄準對手的頭部或軀幹。戰士還可以嘲諷他們的對手。每一位重量級冠軍都有自己的一套個人嘲諷。如果拳手出於某種原因避免戰鬥，觀眾就會開始對他們發出嘶嘶聲。為了讓觀眾滿意，拳手們必須經常互相拳打腳踢。

該遊戲的運行速度明顯比伊万德·霍利菲爾德的遊戲快，而且角色動畫也更加細緻。其中包括重播功能，戰鬥由邁克爾·緩衝區的聲音宣布。

Sword of Vermilion (USA, Europe).name: 铃木裕
Sword of Vermilion (USA, Europe).original_desc: The cousin of Sega's RPG Phantasy Star II, Sword of Vermilion contains elements from action, adventure, and RPG games in a medieval-fantasy setting. A third-person, top-down perspective is used to move around towns. A first-person view is used for overland travel outside of towns. A third-person sideview perspective (a la Double Dragon or Final Fight) is used for the combat sequences. The player is cast in the role of an ordinary young man who discovers that he is really a prince, and the son of the deceased good King Erik. He is charged with traveling around the land of Excalabria to collect the eight magic Rings of Good, defeating a number of boss enemies on the way to confronting the evil King Tsarkon.
Sword of Vermilion (USA, Europe).desc: 《朱紅之劍》是世嘉 RPG《夢幻之星 II》的表親，包含中世紀奇幻背景的動作、冒險和 RPG 遊戲元素。第三人稱、自上而下的視角用於在城鎮中移動。第一人稱視角用於城鎮外的陸路旅行。戰鬥序列採用第三人稱側視視角（如《雙龍》或《決戰》）。玩家扮演一個普通年輕人的角色，他發現自己實際上是一位王子，並且是已故善良國王埃里克的兒子。他的任務是環遊埃克斯卡拉布里亞大陸，收集八枚神奇的善良指環，並在對抗邪惡國王沙康的途中擊敗多個頭目敵人。

MUSHA - Metallic Uniframe Super Hybrid A.key: MUSHA - Metallic Uniframe Super Hybrid Armor (USA)
MUSHA - Metallic Uniframe Super Hybrid A.original_name: MUSHA : Metallic Uniframe Super Hybrid Armor
MUSHA - Metallic Uniframe Super Hybrid A.name: Mega Drive游戏列表
MUSHA - Metallic Uniframe Super Hybrid A.original_desc: Dire51, a supercomputer crafted to control a space colony, goes rogue and sends its attack robots, led by mech Big Asia., to destroy mankind. A team of fighters in giant mechs try to stop it, but all but one, Ellinor (Terri in the US version), are killed, leaving Ellinor to save humanity from destruction on his own.
MUSHA - Metallic Uniframe Super Hybrid A.desc: Dire51 是一台專為控制太空殖民地而設計的超級計算機，它失控並派出了由機械大亞洲領導的攻擊機器人來毀滅人類。一隊穿著巨型機甲的戰士試圖阻止它，但除了埃利諾（美國版中的特里）之外，其他人都被殺了，留下埃利諾獨自拯救人類免遭毀滅。

Dune - The Battle for Arrakis (USA).name: 沙丘:阿拉吉斯之戰
Dune - The Battle for Arrakis (USA).original_desc:
Westwood Studios' real-time strategy classic Dune II received a major overhaul when ported to the Sega Genesis. While the basic concept remains the same, the game features all-new graphics, streamlined controls, changes to the tech tree as well as completely new levels.

As in the original game, the player controls the troops of one of three noble Houses, called by the Emperor to mine the Spice Melange on the planet Arrakis, also known as Dune. A series of consecutive battles must be won by mining spice, constructing a base and building units to attack the enemy.

The rather complex menu-based controls of the original game have been replaced by a context-sensitive cursor system, where a unit reacts according to what is below the cursor - either moving to a destination or attacking an enemy unit, for example.

The tech tree has been simplified: Among other changes, concrete slabs are only available in the 4x4 size, there is only one type of vehicle factory and the advanced units do not require an IX research center anymore.

Finally, the progression of levels in the console version is strictly linear, as there is no choice of the next map to be played as in the original version.
Dune - The Battle for Arrakis (USA).desc:
非官方更新檔（unofficial patch）是由使用者社群而非原始開發者為一款軟體創作的非商業修補程式。與普通的官方更新檔一樣，非官方更新檔一般也是為修復軟體缺陷或劣勢製作，而通常不會改變軟體的預期用法，這不同於第三方的軟體適配（例如遊戲模組或破解更新檔）。
非官方更新檔是一種通常經過全球資訊網傳播的使用者供應內容，可以被視作Web 2.0與重組文化的一部分。

James Pond - Underwater Agent (USA, Euro.name: 任天堂DS游戏列表
James Pond - Underwater Agent (USA, Euro.original_desc: "James Pond" is (obviously) a parody on the famous agent 007 stories. You control Pond, a fish-like creature, who has to complete several missions, while making his way through levels full of dangers and hostile creatures. It is not a typical "jump and run" game: instead of breezing through large levels, Pond has to complete unique missions for each game area: free hostages, detonate a structure, find keys, etc. It is possible to exit a level only after having completed the objective. Many missions are timed.
James Pond - Underwater Agent (USA, Euro.desc: 《詹姆斯·龐德》（顯然）是對著名特工 007 故事的模仿。你控制池塘，一種像魚一樣的生物，他必須完成多項任務，同時穿越充滿危險和敵對生物的關卡。這不是一款典型的“跳躍和奔跑”遊戲：Pond 不是輕鬆通過大型關卡，而是必須完成每個遊戲區域的獨特任務：釋放人質、引爆建築物、找到鑰匙等。只有完成目標後才能退出關卡。許多任務都是有時間限制的。

Twinkle Tale (Japan) (Translated).name: ONF
Twinkle Tale (Japan) (Translated).original_desc:
An overhead scrolling fantasy shoot 'em up, Twinkle Tale casts the player in the role of the young witch Saria, in a quest to rid her magical floating island of the evil creatures that have invaded it.

The game is played from an overhead perspective, with Saria having complete freedom of movement in all directions and with the objective being to clear out all enemies in all 9 stages, looting whatever treasure you can find and defeating each stage's boss.

Saria's offensive weapons come pre-defined as three different spells, which you can freely switch to at any time and level-up by collecting power stars, as well as screen-clearing bombs.
Twinkle Tale (Japan) (Translated).desc:
《Twinkle Tale》是一款架空捲軸奇幻射擊遊戲，玩家將扮演年輕女巫薩莉亞 (Saria) 的角色，努力將入侵她的魔法浮島的邪惡生物趕走。

遊戲以俯視視角進行，莎莉亞在各個方向上擁有完全的移動自由，目標是清除所有 9 個階段中的所有敵人，掠奪你能找到的任何寶藏並擊敗每個階段的 Boss。

薩莉亞的進攻性武器預先定義為三種不同的法術，你可以隨時自由切換，並通過收集能量星星和清屏炸彈來升級。

Bio Hazard Battle (USA, Europe).name: 白金版遊戲
Bio Hazard Battle (USA, Europe).original_desc:
