The civilization on the planet Avaron is by far more advanced than that of the Earth. People developed special biogenetical creatures - giant flies, crabs, and other animals. Unfortunately, those monsters rebelled against the Avaronians and threatened to conquer the planet. It is up to you to save the planet Avaron from the invasion!

"Bio-Hazard Battle" is a horizontally scrolling space shooter. You can choose one of the four ships, each one having its own attacks. During the game, you can upgrade your ships' weapons by collecting colored balls floating around. You can store up to three different weapons at the same time, executing attacks in different directions.
Bio Hazard Battle (USA, Europe).desc:
阿瓦隆星球上的文明比地球上的文明先進得多。人們培育出了特殊的生物遺傳生物——巨型蒼蠅、螃蟹和其他動物。不幸的是，這些怪物反抗阿瓦隆人並威脅要征服這個星球。你有責任拯救阿瓦隆星球免遭入侵！

《生化危機之戰》是一款橫向捲軸太空射擊遊戲。您可以選擇四艘船中的一艘，每艘船都有自己的攻擊方式。在遊戲過程中，你可以通過收集周圍漂浮的彩球來升級你的船隻的武器。您最多可以同時存儲三種不同的武器，向不同的方向執行攻擊。

Golden Axe II (World).name: 1989年电子游戏界
Golden Axe II (World).original_desc:
Not long after the malign reign of the Death Adder has ended, another evil rises. The peace of the land has again been threatened, this time by 'Dark Guld', who was supposed to be imprisoned but apparently isn't. He has instead now got his hands on the Golden Axe, and is using it for his own nasty purposes, and with his minions is causing much chaos.

So once more, Ax-Battler, the fierce barbarian; Tyris-Flare, the fearless Amazon; Gilius Thunderhead, the ferocious dwarf; get up to deal with the oppression, with their might and magic, and recover the Golden Axe.

The hack and slash gameplay, in a medieval fantasy setting, is essentially the same to that of the previous game. Beat up opponents with melee attacks and collect scrolls to launch magical attacks. Moreover,  players can also ride dragons and other beasts and use their attack capabilities to their advantage.
Golden Axe II (World).desc:
死亡毒蛇的邪惡統治結束後不久，另一種邪惡勢力崛起。這片土地的和平再次受到威脅，這次是來自“黑暗古爾德”，他本應被監禁，但顯然沒有被監禁。相反，他現在拿到了金斧頭，並用它來達到自己骯髒的目的，並與他的爪牙一起造成了很多混亂。

再次，戰斧戰士，兇猛的野蠻人； Tyris-Flare，無所畏懼的亞馬遜人；吉利烏斯·雷頭，兇猛的矮人；站起來，用力量和魔法應對壓迫，奪回金斧頭。

中世紀奇幻背景的砍殺遊戲玩法與前作基本相同。用近戰攻擊擊敗對手並收集捲軸以發動魔法攻擊。此外，玩家還可以騎乘龍和其他野獸，並利用它們的攻擊能力來發揮自己的優勢。

Monster World IV (USA) (Genesis Mini).name: Game Source Entertainment
Monster World IV (USA) (Genesis Mini).original_desc:
This is a sequel to Wonder Boy 5: Monster World 3. You control Asha, the green-haired girlfriend of Shion, the hero of the previous game. One day, Asha was standing on a cliff near her home village, and suddenly heard a mysterious voice calling for help. She decided to leave the village and to embark on an adventure to discover the identity of this mysterious person.

Monster World 4 is essentially a platform game, with slight RPG/adventure elements (puzzles, treasure, equipment, etc.) Asha can jump, run, attack or defend (by pressing the "down" button). She can also use items and equip weapons and armor, talk to people, and open treasure chests. Later in the game, she will also be able to use magic, and a little blue pet animal will assist and help her on her journey. The combat system is very similar to the classical Zelda style. Health and mana points are measured in little hearts, and the more you progress in the game, the more hit points you gain.

The game was released only in Japan. It is sometimes erroneously called "Wonder Boy 6".
Monster World IV (USA) (Genesis Mini).desc:
PlayStation 5遊戲列表列出部分已經發售或正在開發的PlayStation 5遊戲。除了本表列出的遊戲，PlayStation 5向下相容PlayStation 4及PlayStation VR的遊戲。欲要檢視受相容的PlayStation 4和PlayStation VR遊戲，請參閱PlayStation 4遊戲列表。
目前本表有492款遊戲。

Vectorman (USA, Europe).name: 任天堂Switch Online
Vectorman (USA, Europe).original_desc:
In 2049, the human population of Earth embarks on a migratory voyage to try to colonize other planets. They leave mechanical "orbots" to clean up the mess they made on Earth through littering and pollution. Raster, a high-level orbot who watches Earth through a planetwide computer network, is accidentally attached to a working nuclear missile by a lesser orbot and goes insane, becoming an evil dictator named Warhead. He declares himself ruler of Earth, and begins preparing to execute any humans who dare return to their planet.

Enter Vectorman, a humble robot in charge of cleaning up toxic sludge by simply discharging it into the sun. As he lands on Earth after his last trip, he finds chaos and confusion. Because all the other Orbots are controlled by Warhead (Vectorman having not been affected because he was away), Vectorman takes it upon himself to destroy the errant orbot and restore peace to Earth.
Vectorman (USA, Europe).desc:
2049年，地球上的人類踏上了遷徙之旅，試圖殖民其他星球。他們留下機械“機器人”來清理他們在地球上亂扔垃圾和污染造成的混亂。光柵是一個通過全球計算機網絡監視地球的高級機器人，意外地被一個較小的機器人連接到一枚正在運行的核導彈上，並陷入瘋狂，成為一個名為彈頭的邪惡獨裁者。他宣布自己是地球的統治者，並開始準備處決任何膽敢返回地球的人類。

Vectorman 登場了，它是一個不起眼的機器人，負責通過簡單地將有毒污泥排放到陽光下來清理有毒污泥。當他在最後一次旅行後登陸地球時，他發現了混亂和困惑。由於所有其他軌道機器人均由彈頭控制（矢量人因不在而未受到影響），矢量曼親自承擔起摧毀錯誤軌道機器人並恢復地球和平的責任。

Comix Zone (USA).name: 任天堂Switch Online
Comix Zone (USA).original_desc:
Sketch Turner was a starving comic book artist, living with his pet rat Roadkill... that is until a lightning storm mysteriously brought his cartoon villain, Mortus, to life and imprisoned Sketch within the pages of his own comic book. Now trapped in the world that he himself created, but someone else is now drawing, Sketch must battle through the pages of his own comic book, and past his own creations, to a final battle with Mortus. Perhaps one of his own creations, General Alissa Cyan might be able to help...

Comix Zone is a side-scrolling fighting game with a difference, you're inside of a comic book and you yourself know it. Smash enemies into the sides of frames, rip through the paper to unleash a super move and otherwise wreck havoc throughout the limitations of the graphic novel. Sketch himself can jump, attack and use various items that he finds along the comic book, including his rat friend, Roadkill. Button combinations can be used to unleash powerful techniques.

The game progresses linear through each page of the comic book, however secret paths and alternate routes through the story can be discovered. At the end of each level, Sketch receives a super hero rating for how well he's progressing.
Comix Zone (USA).desc:
斯凱奇·特納 (Sketch Turner) 是一位飢餓的漫畫家，與他的寵物老鼠 Roadkill 住在一起……直到一場閃電風暴神秘地使他的卡通反派莫圖斯 (Mortus) 復活，並將斯凱奇囚禁在他自己的漫畫書中。現在，斯凱奇被困在他自己創造的世界中，但現在有其他人在畫畫，斯凱奇必須翻閱自己的漫畫書，超越他自己的創作，與莫圖斯進行最後的戰鬥。也許艾麗莎·青將軍是他自己的創造物之一，也許能夠提供幫助……

Comix Zone 是一款與眾不同的橫向捲軸格鬥遊戲，您置身於漫畫書中，而且您自己也知道這一點。將敵人猛擊到框架的側面，撕開紙張以釋放超級動作，或者在圖畫小說的局限性中造成嚴重破壞。斯凱奇本人可以跳躍、攻擊和使用他在漫畫書中找到的各種物品，包括他的老鼠朋友 Roadkill。按鈕組合可用於釋放強大的技術。

遊戲在漫畫書的每一頁中都是線性進展的，但是可以發現故事中的秘密路徑和替代路線。在每個關卡結束時，Sketch 都會根據自己的進步程度獲得超級英雄評級。

Pirates! Gold (USA).name: 龙与地下城
Pirates! Gold (USA).original_desc:
As with the original, this is a blend of strategy, action and adventure. Pirates! Gold lets you play the role of a beginning buccaneer in the 17th century Spanish Main, in search of fame and fortune. Each town in this untamed raw region has different surprises and dangers. 

How you acquire stature is up to you; you can make your living through honest trade and the search for hidden treasure, or you can be a little more daring and attack and plunder ships. As you can choose a specific skill to stand out in, the game can vary each time. Sword fighting is played out in side-view action sequences.
Pirates! Gold (USA).desc:
非官方更新檔（unofficial patch）是由使用者社群而非原始開發者為一款軟體創作的非商業修補程式。與普通的官方更新檔一樣，非官方更新檔一般也是為修復軟體缺陷或劣勢製作，而通常不會改變軟體的預期用法，這不同於第三方的軟體適配（例如遊戲模組或破解更新檔）。
非官方更新檔是一種通常經過全球資訊網傳播的使用者供應內容，可以被視作Web 2.0與重組文化的一部分。

Wiz 'N' Liz (USA).name: Bizarre Creations
Wiz 'N' Liz (USA).original_desc:
Wiz 'n' Liz are magicians. They live on the planet Pum and brew potions and cast spells. They also tend to wabbits. Lots of wabbits. One day, a concoction went awry and sent all the wabbits to distant parts of Pum. Wiz 'n' Liz set off to look for them.

Catch all the wabbits in tons of levels in several difficulty settings. Create magical words and mix ingredients for extra lives, bonus levels and other surprises. Features a password save system so you can take off where you left.
Wiz 'N' Liz (USA).desc:
Wiz 'n' Liz 是魔術師。他們生活在普姆星球上，釀造藥水並施展法術。他們也喜歡兔子。很多兔子。有一天，一種混合​​物出了問題，把所有的兔子都送到了普姆的偏遠地區。維茲和莉茲出發去尋找他們。

在多種難度設置的大量關卡中捕捉所有兔子。創建神奇的單詞並混合成分以獲得額外的生命、獎勵級別和其他驚喜。具有密碼保存系統，因此您可以從離開的地方起飛。

Castlevania - Bloodlines (USA).name: 恶魔城系列
Castlevania - Bloodlines (USA).original_desc:
In the year 1917, evil had threatened to rise up again in Transylvania. A young lady named Elizabeth Bartley, who was tried as a witch and killed centuries before, was planning to resurrect the Prince of Darkness, Count Dracula, once again.

The latest of the Belmont lineage, John Morris, and his friend Eric Lecarde, must now travel across Europe to the Palace of Versailles in France, where Bartley is planning the resurrection. And in their way stands Dracula's strongest followers yet...
Castlevania - Bloodlines (USA).desc:
1917年，邪惡勢力威脅要在特蘭西瓦尼亞再次崛起。一位名叫伊麗莎白·巴特利的年輕女士，在幾個世紀前作為女巫受到審判並被殺，她計劃再次復活黑暗王子德古拉伯爵。

貝爾蒙特家族的最新成員約翰·莫里斯和他的朋友埃里克·萊卡德現在必須穿越歐洲前往法國的凡爾賽宮，巴特利正在那裡計劃復活。德古拉最強大的追隨者擋在了他們的路上……

Michael Jackson's Moonwalker (Japan, USA.name: 麥可·傑克森的月球漫步
Michael Jackson's Moonwalker (Japan, USA.original_desc:
Michael Jackson's Moonwalker is pretty much based on the Michael Jackson movie. Mr. Big has kidnapped the children and has nasty things in store for them, like drugging them and making them slaves. It's up to Michael to use his powers and save his little friends.

Michael Jackson (MJ) can jump, throw magical stars, and dance to counter his opponents as he looks for the hidden children. Stages come in shape of some of MJ's videos like streets and graveyards.
Michael Jackson's Moonwalker (Japan, USA.desc:
邁克爾·傑克遜的《月球漫步者》很大程度上是根據邁克爾·傑克遜的電影改編的。大個子先生綁架了孩子們，並為他們準備了骯髒的東西，比如給他們下藥，讓他們成為奴隸。邁克爾必須運用他的力量來拯救他的小朋友們。

邁克爾·傑克遜（MJ）在尋找隱藏的孩子時可以跳躍、投擲魔法星星和跳舞來反擊他的對手。舞台的形狀類似於 MJ 的一些視頻，例如街道和墓地。

Sonic & Knuckles + Sonic The Hedgehog 3.name: 刺猬索尼克系列
Sonic & Knuckles + Sonic The Hedgehog 3.original_desc:
Dr. Eggman's (AKA Dr. Robotnik's) Death Egg was once again blasted by Sonic, crash-landing on the peak of a volcano on the Floating Island.
Dr. Eggman is still at large, and Sonic can't allow him to get his hands on the Master Emerald and repair the Death Egg. Sonic must also keep Knuckles off his back but Knuckles has problems too. As guardian of the Floating Island and all the Emeralds, Knuckles must do his part to keep the island safe. While they're going the rounds with each other, who will stop Dr. Eggman?
Sonic & Knuckles + Sonic The Hedgehog 3.desc:
艾格曼博士（又名機器人博士）的死亡蛋再次被索尼克炸飛，迫降在浮島的一座火山頂上。
艾格曼博士仍然逍遙法外，索尼克不能讓他得到翡翠大師並修復死亡蛋。索尼克還必須讓納克魯斯遠離他，但納克魯斯也有問題。作為浮島和所有綠寶石的守護者，納克魯斯必須儘自己的一份力量來保護島嶼的安全。當他們互相巡視時，誰能阻止艾格曼博士？

Strider (USA, Europe).name: 亞拉岡 (魔戒)
Strider (USA, Europe).original_desc:
The year is 2089AD. In Russia, the evil Grand Master Meio has begun his insane plot to take over the universe. A lone figure drops from a stealth glider into Meio's base. He is Hiryu, Super A-Class Strider. His mission is to defeat the Grand Master and put an end to his plotting once and for all.

Converted from the classic arcade game, Strider lets you run, jump, perform acrobatics and climb walls and overhangs. You wield a plasma sword, called a Cypher, through 5 levels fighting robots and guards, with mid- and end-level bosses.
Strider (USA, Europe).desc:
時間是公元2089年。在俄羅斯，邪惡的大師梅奧已經開始了他接管宇宙的瘋狂陰謀。一個孤獨的人影從隱形滑翔機上落入 Meio 的基地。他是超A級神行者飛龍。他的任務是擊敗大師並徹底結束他的陰謀。

Strider 由經典街機遊戲改編而成，可讓您奔跑、跳躍、表演雜技以及攀爬牆壁和懸挑。你揮舞著一把名為 Cypher 的等離子劍，通過 5 個關卡與機器人和守衛以及中端和端級 Boss 戰鬥。

World of Illusion Starring Mickey Mouse.key: World of Illusion Starring Mickey Mouse and Donald Duck (USA, Korea)
World of Illusion Starring Mickey Mouse.original_name: World of Illusion Starring Mickey Mouse and Donald Duck
World of Illusion Starring Mickey Mouse.name: Mega Drive游戏列表
World of Illusion Starring Mickey Mouse.original_desc: World of Illusion is sort of a follow-up to Castle of Illusion. Mickey Mouse and Donald Duck are taken to a magic world and have to get back home. In order to do that, they can play magical tricks and interact to each other in a 2-player mode. Like other Disney games for SEGA consoles of the same period, the game has cartoon-like graphics and is played as a side-scrolling platformer.
World of Illusion Starring Mickey Mouse.desc: 《幻象世界》是《幻象城堡》的後續作品。米老鼠和唐老鴨被帶到了一個魔法世界，必須回家。為了做到這一點，他們可以玩魔術並在兩人模式下互相互動。與同時期世嘉遊戲機上的其他迪士尼遊戲一樣，該遊戲具有類似卡通的圖形，並且是一款橫向捲軸平台遊戲。

Shadow Dancer - The Secret of Shinobi (W.key: Shadow Dancer - The Secret of Shinobi (World)
Shadow Dancer - The Secret of Shinobi (W.original_name: Shadow Dancer : The Secret of Shinobi
Shadow Dancer - The Secret of Shinobi (W.name: PlayStation 2游戏列表
Shadow Dancer - The Secret of Shinobi (W.original_desc:
A.D. 1997, New York City

Having vanquished the evil crime empire, Neo Zeed, the ninja master Shinobi and his combat ninja skills were not heard from for some time. But a new threat arose, in a reptilian form that lived on vicious instinct alone. The colossal monster moved slowly and quietly, and its attack was relentless. The souls unfortunate enough to survive became hostages, and mass panic swept the streets.

It remained only for Shinobi to take action. His weapons were stealth and quickness of attack, his only allies facing overwhelming forces. Relying on Ninja weapons and magic, Shinobi fought on, assisted by his faithful dog.

Shadow Dancer: The Secret of Shinobi is similar to Shadow Dancer for home computers, and consists of five missions containing three stages each. However, there are a few differences between the two. For example, in this Sega Genesis/Mega Drive exclusive, the stages are different, and you rescue hostages rather than disarm bombs.  Each mission ends up with you fighting a boss, and when you defeat each (except the final one), you also participate in a bonus stage where you must shoot all ninja flying towards you.

Some of the enemies are also quite different. Some of the lizards, which appear in later missions,  leave a "lizard coin", which you can collect for bonus lives.
Shadow Dancer - The Secret of Shinobi (W.desc:
公元 1997 年，紐約市

擊敗邪惡犯罪帝國後，忍者大師忍者尼奧·澤德和他的戰鬥忍者技能有一段時間杳無音訊。但一種新的威脅出現了，它是一種僅靠邪惡本能生存的爬行動物。巨大的怪物動作緩慢而安靜，攻擊毫不留情。不幸倖存的靈魂成為人質，大規模的恐慌席捲了街道。

剩下的就是忍者採取行動了。他的武器是隱秘且攻擊迅速的，他唯一的盟友面臨著壓倒性的力量。忍者依靠忍者武器和魔法，在忠實的狗的協助下繼續戰鬥。

影子舞者：忍者的秘密類似於家用電腦上的影子舞者，由五個任務組成，每個任務包含三個階段。然而，兩者之間存在一些差異。例如，在這款 Sega Genesis/Mega Drive 獨占遊戲中，關卡是不同的，你要營救人質而不是解除炸彈。每個任務最終都會與一個 Boss 戰鬥，當你擊敗每個任務（最後一個除外）時，你還會參加一個獎勵階段，你必須射擊所有飛向你的忍者。

有些敵人也有很大不同。一些出現在後續任務中的蜥蜴會留下“蜥蜴幣”，您可以收集它來獲得額外生命。

Gunstar Heroes (USA).name: 有生之年非玩不可的1001款游戏
Gunstar Heroes (USA).original_desc:
Chaos has broken out on the planet Gunstar-9!!

The mad Colonel Red has discovered four crystals that imprison a deadly being known as GoldenSilver, and plans on unleashing it onto the population of the planet! He must be stopped! Enter...the Gunstar Heroes, Red and Blue!

Unleash some mad blasting action onto the Colonel's army and don't let him bring GoldenSilver to life!! The fate of Gunstar-9 is in your hands!
Gunstar Heroes (USA).desc:
Gunstar-9 星球爆發混亂！ ！

瘋狂的雷德上校發現了四塊水晶，囚禁了一種名為金銀的致命生物，併計劃將其釋放到地球上的人們身上！必須阻止他！輸入...槍星英雄，紅色和藍色！

對上校的軍隊發動瘋狂的爆破行動，別讓他讓金銀復活！ ！Gunstar-9 的命運掌握在你的手中！

Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles - Tournamen.key: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles - Tournament Fighters (USA)
Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles - Tournamen.original_name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles : Tournament Fighters
Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles - Tournamen.name: 超級英雄：武力對決2
Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles - Tournamen.original_desc:
The game features the original 4 turtles from the previous games in the series, as well as other fighters.

The game is very much in the tradition of the Mortal Kombat or Street Fighter series, pitting you against opponents one at a time. Some fighters (besides the turtles) will be familiar, such as the Rat King, or even Shredder (now called "Cyber-Shredder" here).

Though even people familiar with the turtles will see differences in them. They can now, for example, do moves involving projectiles, such as "fireballs".

The game's modes include a story mode, where you can only pick one of the turtles and go on fighting opponents in order to rescue April and Splinter, and a tournament mode, where you fight only for the fame and money.
Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles - Tournamen.desc:
全球最高跨媒體製作票房收入列表包含從書、電影、電子遊戲、漫畫書、電視節目或其他媒體開始製作的跨媒體製作收入超過20億美元。
該清單包括總收入數字和收入細目。對於尚未報告總收入數字的跨媒體製作作品，根據不同媒體的綜合收入給出估算。對於報告數字不是最新的跨媒體製作作品，會根據現有數據給出更新的估計。

Shining in the Darkness (USA, Europe).name: 世嘉土星
Shining in the Darkness (USA, Europe).original_desc:
This is a story-driven console-style RPG, and is the first in the three game Shining series for the Genesis (followed by Shining Force and Shining Force 2). The Kingdom of Thornwood has been invaded by Dark Sol's men, and it is your job to vanquish them. You will need the Arms of Light to do this.

The game is a first person RPG, with turn-based combat and cartoony graphics. The dialogue is displayed via dialog bubbles appearing above the characters speaking, although the protagonist never speaks. There are no sub-quests - the secrets in the game involve  the location and use of special metal for forging esoteric items. There are about 25 to 30 hours of gameplay to be found here, before the final battle and ending sequence.
Shining in the Darkness (USA, Europe).desc: 本電子遊戲列表列舉了索尼PlayStation 2的電子遊戲。

Eternal Champions (USA).name: 龙与地下城
Eternal Champions (USA).original_desc:
From various time periods of past, present and future, nine fighters killed in an unjust manner find themselves given a second chance for life.  An alien being, known only as the Eternal Champion, brings back the fighters into a competition for one reason: to find one among them worthy of being resurrected, giving them a chance to avert their death and tip the balance between good and evil.

The fighters range from different eras of Earth's History: Larcen, the cat burglar. Jetta, the circus acrobat. Blade, the futuristic bounty hunter. Midknight, the vampiric bio-chemist. Rax, the cyborg. Shadow, the corporate assassin. Slash, the neanderthal. Trident, a Atlantean warrior. And Xavier, a warlock and alchemist.
Eternal Champions (USA).desc:
在過去、現在和未來的不同時期，九名被不公正殺害的戰士發現自己獲得了第二次生命的機會。一個被稱為“永恆冠軍”的外星人將戰士們帶回一場比賽，原因只有一個：找到其中一個值得複活的人，讓他們有機會避免死亡並打破善惡之間的平衡。

這些戰士來自地球歷史的不同時代：拉森，貓竊賊。捷達，馬戲團雜技演員。刀鋒，未來派賞金獵人。午夜騎士，吸血鬼生物化學家。拉克斯，機器人。影子，企業殺手。斯萊什，尼安德特人。三叉戟，亞特蘭蒂斯戰士。還有澤維爾，一名術士和煉金術士。

Langrisser II (Japan) (Rev B) (Translate.name: Game Source Entertainment
Langrisser II (Japan) (Rev B) (Translate.original_desc:
"Langrisser II" is a sequel to  Warsong (whose original title is Langrisser). The events of the game take place several years after those described in "Warsong". Gone is the benevolent kingdom of Baltia, and a new power has risen - the Rayguard Empire, led by Emperor Bernhart and his four generals. Recently, Bernhart ordered his army to attack the neighboring countries, obviously searching for something. This "something" might be none else but a legendary evil sword, that makes the one who wields undefeated. It is up to the noble knight Elwin and his friends to stop the Emperor!

"Langrisser II" is a strategy RPG. The army is divided into soldier units and generals, who fight alone and who are usually stronger than a whole unit. Before the scenario begins, you must hire soldiers, buy weapons and items, etc. During the battle, if you come into contact with an enemy unit, an automatic battle sequence occurs. You can also cast healing spells on your units or offensive spells to hurt the enemy.

The major difference between "Langrisser II" and its "remake",  Der Langrisser for SNES, is the absence of branching storyline in Genesis release.
Langrisser II (Japan) (Rev B) (Translate.desc:
《Langrisser II》是《戰歌》（原名《Langrisser》）的續集。遊戲中的事件發生在《戰歌》中描述的幾年後。仁慈的巴爾蒂亞王國已經不復存在，一個新的勢力崛起了——由伯恩哈特皇帝和他的四位將軍領導的雷加德帝國。最近，伯恩哈特命令自己的軍隊進攻鄰國，顯然是在尋找什麼。這個“東西”或許不是別的，正是一把傳說中的邪劍，揮舞不敗。高貴的騎士艾爾文和他的朋友們必須阻止皇帝！

《Langrisser II》是一款策略角色扮演遊戲。軍隊分為士兵和將軍，他們單獨作戰，通常比整個部隊更強大。在場景開始之前，你必須僱傭士兵，購買武器和物品等。在戰鬥中，如果你接觸到敵方單位，就會發生自動戰鬥序列。你還可以對你的單位施放治療法術或攻擊法術來傷害敵人。

《Langrisser II》與其“重製版”《SNES 版 Der Langrisser》之間的主要區別在於 Genesis 版本中缺少分支故事情節。

Puggsy (USA).name: 普格索
Puggsy (USA).original_desc: Puggsy is a platform game with a combination of action and puzzle-solving elements. You control the the creature Puggsy, who has crash landed on an alien planet and had his spaceship stolen. Your goal is find the spaceship so you can get off the planet and return home.  To do this, you will need to make your way from the start to the exit of numerous levels which take place in a variety of environments. Throughout each level are a variety of objects which you can pick up; on many of the levels you will need to figure out how to use the objects available to you in order to reach the exit. Some objects can used (like a gun or keys), and objects may be thrown, moved around and stacked. Of course, each level will also have a variety of bad guys wandering about which will cost Puggsy one of his lives if he's caught. On your quest there will also be six evil guardians which will need to be defeated before you get your spaceship back!
Puggsy (USA).desc: Puggsy 是一款結合了動作和解謎元素的平台遊戲。你控制的是帕格西生物，他墜毀在一個外星球上，他的宇宙飛船被盜了。你的目標是找到宇宙飛船，這樣你就可以離開地球並返回家園。為此，您需要從開始到結束在各種環境中發生的多個關卡。每個關卡都有各種各樣的物品可供你拾取；在許多關卡中，您需要弄清楚如何使用可用的物體才能到達出口。可以使用某些物體（如槍或鑰匙），並且可以投擲、移動和堆疊物體。當然，每一關都會有各種各樣的壞人在遊蕩，如果被抓住的話，普格西就會喪命。在你的任務中，還會有六名邪惡的守護者，在你拿回你的宇宙飛船之前，需要擊敗他們！

Crusader of Centy (USA).name: Mega Drive游戏列表
Crusader of Centy (USA).original_desc:
Before the time of plants and animals, the earth was completely dark, and inhabited by things we now call 'monsters'. When some voice said 'Let There Be Light' , many monsters died because they could not live in this new light world. Not all died however; some of them hid in caves, and grew stronger. Now, they want to return to the world, and in these days you live your life.

On your fourteenth birthday you are given your deceased father's sword and shield. Now you are considered ready for the trials and maybe, just maybe, you can become a hero yourself.
Crusader of Centy (USA).desc: 維根純素主義的定義，從狹義的純素飲食，即不吃任何動物或源自動物的任何製品，到廣義的一種完整生活型態，也就是個人生活中完全屏除動物性製品的使用。除了食品，維根純素者在服裝方面也避免使用真皮革、皮草等動物製品，而美妝品方面，也不使用有經過動物實驗的商品，更不會參與或支持任何血腥運動，如鬥牛和狐狸獵殺等。因道德倫理而持純素的人通常會避免和抵制任何生產或執行過程有剝削動物的產品和活動。 這個列表名單都是公開吃純素的名人，然而他們主張的純素主義可不僅僅侷限在飲食。

Golden Axe III (Japan) (En).name: 砍殺遊戲
Golden Axe III (Japan) (En).original_desc:
This 'Prince of Darkness' has taken away the Golden Axe and put an evil curse over all the warriors. However, one of the heroes has their curse relieved and is sent to set things straight - lift curse off others, defeat the villian and return with the Golden Axe.

The gameplay has been expanded slightly, but is essentially the same hack n' slash as the previous games. New features to the series include new characters, new moves and junction points where you can choose which path to take.
Golden Axe III (Japan) (En).desc:
這位“黑暗王子”奪走了金斧頭，並對所有戰士施加了邪惡的詛咒。然而，其中一位英雄的詛咒被解除，並被派去糾正事情——解除其他人的詛咒，擊敗惡人並帶著金斧頭回來。

遊戲玩法略有擴展，但本質上與前作相同。該系列的新功能包括新角色、新動作和交匯點，您可以在其中選擇要走的路徑。

Dr. Robotnik's Mean Bean Machine (USA).name: 刺猬索尼克系列
Dr. Robotnik's Mean Bean Machine (USA).original_desc:
Set on planet Mobius, Dr. Robotnik has hatched a new plan to menace the world and its inhabitants - by kidnapping the citizens of Beanville and turning them into devious robot slaves, the doctor will create an army that will help him rid the planet of music and fun forever. To this end, he has created a giant roboticizing machine called the "Mean Bean-Steaming Machine" to use on the jolly bean folk. Putting his plan into motion, Robotnik sends out his henchbots to round up all the unfortunate bean folk and group them together in dark dungeons so they can be sent to the Mean Bean-Steaming Machine.

Assuming the role of Has Bean, the player must now stand up against Robotnik's henchmen by breaking into the dungeons, freeing the bean folk before it is too late, and get through Robotnik's henchbots to the deranged doctor himself and foil his evil plans once and for all.
Dr. Robotnik's Mean Bean Machine (USA).desc:
以莫比烏斯星球為背景，機器人博士制定了一項威脅世界及其居民的新計劃 - 通過綁架比維爾的公民並將他們變成狡猾的機器人奴隸，博士將創建一支軍隊，幫助他永遠消除這個星球上的音樂和樂趣。為此，他創造了一台名為“平均豆蒸機”的巨型機器人機器，供快樂豆人使用。為了實施他的計劃，機器人尼克派出他的追隨者去圍捕所有不幸的豆子人，並將他們集中在黑暗的地牢中，這樣他們就可以被送到卑鄙的豆子蒸機器裡。

扮演哈斯·比恩的角色，玩家現在必須挺身而出，闖入地牢來對抗機器人的追隨者，在為時已晚之前釋放豆人，並通過機器人的追隨者找到瘋狂的醫生本人，一勞永逸地挫敗他的邪惡計劃。

Lost World, The - Jurassic Park (USA, Eu.key: Lost World, The - Jurassic Park (USA, Europe)
Lost World, The - Jurassic Park (USA, Eu.name: 夺宝奇兵
Lost World, The - Jurassic Park (USA, Eu.original_desc:
The game situates itself on the "Isla Sorna" sites of Jurassic Park, a concept originally based on the Steven Spielberg series of movies. You play the role of a bounty hunter trying to catch some prized dinosaurs. This game is not a side scrolling platform game like the other two Jurassic Park games on the Genesis. This is a top-down view game like the SNES version of Jurassic Park, with gameplay similar to The Chaos Engine.

Each of the four Isla Sorna sites contains three missions. Once you have completed the three missions you unlock the boss mission. For a change in the game, the boss missions are 3D look-alike levels. Once the four sites are cleared you get two more final missions to complete the game.
Lost World, The - Jurassic Park (USA, Eu.desc:
該遊戲位於侏羅紀公園的“索納島”遺址，該概念最初基於史蒂文·斯皮爾伯格系列電影。你扮演賞金獵人的角色，試圖捕捉一些珍貴的恐龍。該遊戲不像《創世紀》中的其他兩款《侏羅紀公園》遊戲那樣是橫向捲軸平台遊戲。這是一款類似於 SNES 版《侏羅紀公園》的自上而下視角遊戲，玩法類似於《混沌引擎》。

索納島的四個地點均包含三個任務。完成這三個任務後，您就可以解鎖老闆任務。遊戲中的一個變化是，Boss 任務是 3D 相似的關卡。清除四個地點後，您將獲得另外兩個最終任務來完成遊戲。

Combat Cars (USA, Europe).name: 俠盜獵車手V
Combat Cars (USA, Europe).original_desc: Combat Cars is a racing game in which the player not only competes with other cars, trying to outrun them, but also uses all kinds of weapons and gadgets to damage their opponents. In the beginning of the game, the player can choose one of the eight available characters. Each character has his/her own strengths and weaknesses (speed, car handling, etc.), as well as unique weapons. The weapons include a simple gun, glue spots they can leave to trap other cars, homing missile, and others. There are 24 different tracks available in the game. The player must complete them in a linear fashion, and once they run out of time, the game is over.
Combat Cars (USA, Europe).desc: Combat Cars 是一款賽車遊戲，玩家不僅要與其他車輛競爭，試圖超越它們，還要使用各種武器和小工具來傷害對手。在遊戲開始時，玩家可以從八個可用角色中選擇一個。每個角色都有自己的優點和缺點（速度、汽車操控等），以及獨特的武器。這些武器包括一把簡單的槍、可以用來困住其他汽車的膠點、尋的導彈等。遊戲中有 24 條不同的賽道可供選擇。玩家必須以線性方式完成它們，一旦用完時間，遊戲就結束了。

Outlander (USA).name: 賈斯汀·羅蘭德
Outlander (USA).original_desc:
Mindscape developed this game hoping to get it licensed as an official Mad Max game, however Warner Bros never made this happen. Anyway, the game closely resembles "The Road Warrior" (Mad Max 2). Your objective is to drive your car through the wasteland, trying to survive motorcycle gang members' attacks and to avoid running out of gas.

The gameplay is a split of two genres: racing and side-scrolling. In the racing parts you have to destroy enemies like motorcycle gang members, gyro-copter captains, red trucks, etc. Your car has a machine-gun installed in its front, and if some guy drives along side of you, a little window pops up, allowing you to shoot them with your shotgun.

Along the road there are several towns, and every time you pass through one of them, an alarm will warn you. As your gas run low, you have to stop on these towns and refuel your reserves of gas and ammo. When doing so, the game turns to a side-scrolling perspective, as you get out of your car, dealing with your enemies in hand-to-hand combats. In the cities you'll also find new equipment to your car, such as missile launchers, nitro, etc.
Outlander (USA).desc:
Mindscape 開發了這款遊戲，希望獲得官方《瘋狂麥克斯》遊戲的許可，但華納兄弟從未實現這一目標。無論如何，這款遊戲與“公路戰士”（瘋狂的麥克斯2）非常相似。你的目標是駕駛你的汽車穿過荒地，試圖在摩托車幫成員的攻擊中倖存下來，並避免耗盡汽油。

遊戲玩法分為兩種類型：賽車和橫向捲軸。在賽車部分，你必須消滅敵人，如摩托車幫成員、旋翼機隊長、紅色卡車等。你的車前部安裝有機關槍，如果有人在你旁邊開車，會彈出一個小窗口，讓你用霰彈槍射擊他們。

沿途有幾個城鎮，每當你經過其中一個城鎮時，就會有警報警告你。當你的汽油即將耗盡時，你必須在這些城鎮停下來補充你儲備的汽油和彈藥。當你這樣做時，遊戲會變成橫向捲軸視角，當你下車時，與你的敵人進行肉搏戰。在城市中，您還會發現汽車的新設備，例如導彈發射器、硝基等。

Out of This World (USA).name: 2025年遊戲大獎
Out of This World (USA).original_desc: Out of This World (known as Another World in Europe and Outer World in Japan) is an action-adventure game designed and developed by Eric Chahi which thrusts the player into the role of a red-headed physicist trapped on an alien planet.
Out of This World (USA).desc:
大取代（法語：Grand Remplacement），抑或稱取代理論，是白人民族主義者提倡的極右陰謀論，由法國作家雷諾·加繆提出。該理論認為，通過與「取代派」精英合謀或合作（pouvoir/élite remplaciste），歐洲的白人正在人口及文化層面逐漸被非白人（特別是穆斯林）取代。取代手段則包括大規模移民、人口增加及降低出生率。然而，主流學界並不認同這種主張，認為其源自對移民數據的誇大解讀，而且以不科學的種族主義世界觀為前提。
實際上，類似的極右觀點早在19世紀就有人提出，只不過到了2011年才由加繆在著作《大取代》（Le Grand Remplacement）中正式命名並推廣。加繆認為，法國穆斯林占了人口相當大的比例，可能會威脅甚至摧毀法國的文化與文明。加繆與其他陰謀論者認為這種過程之所以出現，乃是法國政府、歐洲聯盟或聯合國內部的全球派或自由派精英（也就是「取代派」）有意推進的政策造成的。他們認為這種政策是「以替代手段進行的種族滅絕」。
大取代陰謀論在歐洲獲得廣泛支持，影響力更遍及其他西方國家的反移民及白人民族主義運動。認同該理論的人士認為「移民之所以湧入白人占多數的國家，是因為他們打算讓白人人口在他們的土地上成為少數民族，乃至讓本土的白人徹底滅絕」，因此它很大程度上與更加廣泛的白人種族滅絕陰謀論密切相關，不僅是利用伊斯蘭恐懼症推動反猶太謠言傳播，進行戰略性替換。
外界認為，大取代陰謀論與其簡單的包羅永珍的口號是其在泛歐世界中具有更廣泛吸引力的原因，儘管這一理論根植於許多白人至上主義運動的反猶太情緒，特別是美國。儘管加繆公開譴責白人民族主義者的暴力行為，學者還是認為他將非白人移民描繪成白人人口的外部威脅是在無形中呼籲暴力。而近年的2018年匹茲堡猶太教堂槍擊案、2019年紐西蘭基督城清真寺槍擊案、2019年埃爾帕索槍擊案及2022年水牛城槍擊案都有大取代的影子。

Taz-Mania (World).name: Game Boy游戏列表
Taz-Mania (World).original_desc:
One evening, Taz's father is telling an intriguing tale. Somewhere on Tazmania is a Lost Valley, and in that valley nests a huge seabird, so huge that one of it's eggs could feed a family for a year! Just think of the omelette one of those could make!

Thus Taz becomes fascinated and leaves in search of one of those eggs before his Dad has even finished the story...

Taz can Jump, perform a Spinning Jump and a Spin Attack. Munch roast chickens to replenish life. Gain extra points by moving quickly through the levels - there are six stages and each stage has two rounds.

There are a few other items and pickups such as:

1. Spring: boings Taz up to high ledges.
2. Blocks: destructible.
3. 1-UP: extra life.
4. Star: invulnerability. Unless you run into a bomb.
5. Bomb: does what it says on the tin.
Taz-Mania (World).desc:
一天晚上，塔茲的父親講述了一個有趣的故事。塔茲馬尼亞的某個地方有一個失落的山谷，山谷裡棲息著一隻巨大的海鳥，它的一個蛋可以讓一個家庭吃一年！想想其中一個可以做的煎蛋捲吧！

因此，塔茲被迷住了，在他爸爸還沒講完故事之前就離開去尋找其中一個雞蛋……

塔茲可以跳躍，進行旋轉跳躍和旋轉攻擊。咀嚼烤雞來補充生命。快速通過關卡即可獲得額外積分 - 有六個階段，每個階段有兩輪。

還有一些其他物品和拾取物，例如：

1. 春天：轟鳴聲 Taz 升到高高的壁架上。
2. 方塊：可破壞。
3. 1-UP：額外生命。
4.星：刀槍不入。除非你碰到炸彈。
5. 炸彈：正如其上所說的那樣。

Mutant League Hockey (USA, Europe).name: 喷神James节目列表
Mutant League Hockey (USA, Europe).original_desc:
Mutant League Hockey is a violent hockey game in the same series as Mutant League Football.  There are 23 bizarre hockey teams to choose from, with players consisting of zombies, skeletons, trolls, and robots.  The arenas are equally strange, with hidden bottomless pits, mines placed under the ice, spikes, and a "Demon Net" that functions as a goalie by chomping up and down and devouring the puck.
The game plays similar to normal hockey, except in this game your players can pick up chainsaws, maces, axes, etc. to use against the competition.  It's a bloody game, with opponents exploding into piles of goo (or circuits if they are a robot) when they become too injured.  The player can call special plays, like an exploding puck or jail break and attack the goalie.  The game also has fighting sequences if two players decide to get into a brawl.  
The game comes with multiplayer and a playoff series, full stats for your players and instant replays.
Mutant League Hockey (USA, Europe).desc:
《變種人聯盟曲棍球》是一款與《變種人聯盟足球》同系列的暴力曲棍球遊戲。有 23 支奇異的曲棍球隊可供選擇，球員包括殭屍、骷髏、巨魔和機器人。競技場也同樣奇怪，有隱藏的無底洞、埋在冰下的地雷、尖刺，還有一張“惡魔網”，它可以上下咀嚼併吞噬冰球，充當守門員。
該遊戲的玩法與普通曲棍球類似，不同之處在於您的玩家可以拿起電鋸、狼牙棒、斧頭等來對抗比賽。這是一場血腥的遊戲，當對手受傷太重時，他們會爆炸成一堆粘液（如果他們是機器人，就會爆炸成電路）。玩家可以調用特殊的比賽，例如爆炸冰球或越獄並攻擊守門員。如果兩個玩家決定打架，遊戲也會有戰鬥序列。
該遊戲提供多人遊戲和季后賽系列賽、球員的完整統計數據和即時重播。

ToeJam & Earl in Panic on Funkotron (USA.key: ToeJam & Earl in Panic on Funkotron (USA)
ToeJam & Earl in Panic on Funkotron (USA.original_name: ToeJam & Earl in Panic on Funkotron
ToeJam & Earl in Panic on Funkotron (USA.name: 埃文·韦尔斯
ToeJam & Earl in Panic on Funkotron (USA.original_desc:
The sequel to ToeJam & Earl starts off where the first game ends. The two funky aliens have finally gathered all their rocket parts and left Earth for their home planet Funkotron. Accidentally, some earthlings manage to cling on to their spaceship and come along to Funkotron with them.

Being responsible for the huge disturbance the humans are causing on their funky planet, the duo set off to clean up the mess.

The earthlings come in all sorts of surprising forms, kids running around, construction workers, tourists, and the regular wierdos. You can choose either character, or have two players play out together, as you hit the earthlings with special jars that suck them in, so they cud be transported back to Earth.

You meet other Funkotron inhabitants and interact with them, things like helping them find stuff or ringing their doorbell and running away! All these people will help you in getting the job done and preventing Funkotron from losing its funky-ness.
ToeJam & Earl in Panic on Funkotron (USA.desc:
《ToeJam & Earl》的續集從第一款遊戲的結束處開始。這兩個時髦的外星人終於收集了所有火箭部件，離開地球前往他們的家鄉 Funkotron。意外地，一些地球人成功地抓住了他們的宇宙飛船，並與他們一起來到了 Funkotron。

由於人類對他們這個時髦的星球造成了巨大的干擾，兩人出發去清理混亂。

地球人以各種令人驚訝的形式出現，到處亂跑的孩子、建築工人、遊客和普通的怪人。你可以選擇其中一個角色，或者讓兩個玩家一起玩，當你用特殊的罐子擊打地球人時，將他們吸進去，這樣他們就會被運回地球。

你會遇到其他 Funkotron 居民並與他們互動，比如幫助他們找到東西或按響門鈴然後逃跑！所有這些人都會幫助您完成工作並防止 Funkotron 失去其時髦感。

Cyborg Justice (USA, Europe).name: DC擴展宇宙
Cyborg Justice (USA, Europe).original_desc:
You are a member of the Galatic Unity Agency on routine patrol in deep space when your patrol ship is damaged after accidently passing through a meteor storm and starts to lose control, smashing into a nearby planet and blacking out.  The next thing you remember you are rummaging through scrap metal and welding together steel to make parts for weapons. You have become a cyborg slave in a munitions factory for the Cydrek Federation, a twisted machine with a human brain, unable to comprehend your situation, clouded by cybernetic programming until one day your human side finally starts to break through.  You remember everything and realize that the Cydrek Federation is building an army to take on the G.U.A. and you must stop it. You must take on the entire Federation using your new cybernetic body and stop them from taking over the universe.

You can build up to 216 different combinations of cyborg body parts to rip, tear and burn your opponents in submission, even using the destroyed parts of your downed foes and putting them onto your body. You can also play in Arcade mode in which you take on wave after wave after wave of opponents until your cyborg is finally destroyed or even play co-op with a buddy.  The game features up to five levels from the plants surface, the Cydrek Command Center even a futuristic jungle.
Cyborg Justice (USA, Europe).desc:
你是銀河統一機構的一名成員，在深空進行例行巡邏，你的巡邏船在意外穿過流星風暴後受損，並開始失去控制，撞向附近的一顆行星並陷入黑暗。接下來你記得你正在翻找廢金屬並將鋼材焊接在一起以製造武器零件。你已經成為 Cydrek 聯邦軍火工廠中的半機械人奴隸，一台帶有人腦的​​扭曲機器，無法理解你的處境，被控制論編程所籠罩，直到有一天你的人性一面終於開始突破。你記得一切，並意識到 Cydrek 聯邦正在組建一支軍隊來對抗 G.U.A.你必須阻止它。你必須使用你的新控制體對抗整個聯邦，並阻止他們接管宇宙。

你可以構建多達 216 種不同的半機械人身體部位組合，撕扯、撕扯和焚燒你的對手，甚至使用被擊倒的敵人被摧毀的部位並將它們放在你的身上。您還可以在街機模式下玩，與一波又一波的對手對抗，直到您的機器人最終被摧毀，甚至可以與好友一起玩合作遊戲。遊戲設有植物表面最多五個關卡、Cydrek 指揮中心甚至未來叢林。

Kid Chameleon (USA, Europe).name: 任天堂Switch Online
Kid Chameleon (USA, Europe).original_desc:
Kid Chameleon is a side-scrolling platform game in which the main character has entered a virtual reality game called "Wild Side" to free the other kids inside that have been captured (*cuckoo*). He can change his shape into various other forms (hence the "Chameleon"). This gives him special abilities which must be used to pass each of the game's 100+ stages.

An interesting point about Kid Chameleon is that the game has 100+ levels (most of which are very, very difficult) which must be played in sequence AND there is no save feature or password feature - which means completing this game would be a major feat of endurance (and patience).
Kid Chameleon (USA, Europe).desc:
Kid Chameleon 是一款橫向捲軸平台遊戲，其中主角進入了一個名為“Wild Side”的虛擬現實遊戲，以釋放裡面被捕獲的其他孩子（*布穀鳥*）。他可以將自己的形狀改變成各種其他形式（因此被稱為“變色龍”）。這賦予了他特殊的能力，必須使用這些能力來通過遊戲的 100 多個階段。

《變色龍小子》的一個有趣之處在於，該遊戲有 100 多個關卡（其中大部分非常非常困難），必須按順序玩，並且沒有保存功能或密碼功能 - 這意味著完成這個遊戲將是耐力（和耐心）的重大壯舉。

Sonic Spinball (USA).name: 刺猬索尼克系列
Sonic Spinball (USA).original_desc:
The evil doctor Robotnik has a new plan to take over the world. He has built a new weapon, the Veg-O-Fortress on Mount Mobius and with it, he is transforming all creatures into robots. Sonic sneaks into the fortress and tries to stop Robotnik.

Use Sonic as a pinball in 4 dangerous levels. Score points, get rings, collect Chaos Emeralds and destroy the boss at the end of each level.
Sonic Spinball (USA).desc:
邪惡的機器人博士有一個接管世界的新計劃。他在莫比烏斯山上建造了一種新武器“Veg-O-Fortress”，並用它將所有生物變成了機器人。索尼克潛入堡壘並試圖阻止機器人尼克。

在 4 個危險關卡中使用索尼克作為彈球。得分、獲得戒指、收集混沌翡翠並在每個關卡結束時摧毀 Boss。

Donald in Maui Mallard (Europe) (Rev A).name: Super Nintendo Entertainment System游戏列表
Donald in Maui Mallard (Europe) (Rev A).original_desc:
Disney's Donald Duck takes the starring role in this sidescrolling platform game. As the detective Maui Mallard, he's on the trail of a long lost Idol, which has recently vanished. Early on, Maui can also switch between his normal self and Ninja Maui, and with all the creepy voodoo enemies he'll encounter throughout his adventure, he's going to need all the help he can get.

As previously mentioned, there are two personalities to Maui, and as a result, two different sets of controls. Normal Maui carries a bug gun, which can fire a variety of different insect ammo, from basic bugs, to the more powerful lightning and fire bugs. It's also possible for Maui to combine bugs to pack a more powerful blast at his enemies.
Donald in Maui Mallard (Europe) (Rev A).desc:
迪士尼的唐老鴨在這款橫向捲軸平台遊戲中擔任主角。作為偵探毛伊野鴨，他正在追踪一位失踪已久、最近又消失的偶像。早期，毛伊島還可以在正常的自我和忍者毛伊島之間切換，並且在整個冒險過程中他會遇到所有令人毛骨悚然的巫毒敵人，他將需要所有可以獲得的幫助。

如前所述，毛伊島有兩種性格，因此有兩組不同的控件。普通毛伊島攜帶一把蟲子槍，可以發射各種不同的昆蟲彈藥，從基本的蟲子到更強大的閃電和火蟲。毛伊島還可以結合蟲子對敵人發動更強大的爆炸。

Dahna - Goddess' Birth (Japan) (Translat.name: Mega Drive游戏列表
Dahna - Goddess' Birth (Japan) (Translat.original_desc:
Dahna: Megami Tanjo (Dahna: Birth of a Goddess) is a beat'em up with some RPG elements. The player controls Dahna as she scrolls horizontally or vertically through the levels. Dahna fights her enemies using a sword, and she can jump in two heights, duck and crawl. Dahna has also a magic meter, which has several colored levels. Different levels of her magic will produce different magical effects (as in Golden Axe). Her magic can be replenished by gathering magical orbs, dropped by enemy mages when killed. They will also drop health orbs as well.

She starts the game "riding" a giant, and in other portions of the game, she'll also ride other creatures, such as a horse and a griffin. When riding a creature, Dahna can't use her magic powers.

As she kills enemies and gather orbs, Dahna gains experience points, which grant her level upgrades. Leveling up affects only her health, as she gains more health points.
Dahna - Goddess' Birth (Japan) (Translat.desc:
Dahna: Megami Tanjo（Dahna：女神的誕生）是一款帶有一些 RPG 元素的清版遊戲。玩家控制 Dahna 在關卡中水平或垂直滾動​​。達娜（Dahna）用劍與敵人戰鬥，她可以跳兩個高度，躲閃和爬行。達納還有一個魔法計，它有幾個顏色級別。不同等級的魔法會產生不同的魔法效果（如金斧頭）。她的魔法可以通過收集魔法球來補充，魔法球是敵方法師被殺時掉落的。他們也會掉落生命球。

她開始遊戲時“騎著”一個巨人，在遊戲的其他部分，她還會騎其他生物，例如馬和獅鷲。當騎乘生物時，達娜無法使用她的魔法力量。

當達娜殺死敵人並收集球體時，她會獲得經驗值，從而提升她的等級。升級只會影響她的健康狀況，因為她會獲得更多的健康點。

Mega Man - The Wily Wars (USA) (Genesis.key: Mega Man - The Wily Wars (USA) (Genesis Mini)
Mega Man - The Wily Wars (USA) (Genesis.name: 喷神James节目列表
Mega Man - The Wily Wars (USA) (Genesis.original_desc: Mega Man: Wily Wars is a collection of the first three NES Mega Man titles. It features enhanced graphics and sound as well as the game "Wily Tower", a short game that mixes enemies from all three games.
Mega Man - The Wily Wars (USA) (Genesis.desc: 本列表共有1047款Game Boy遊戲。

Pulseman (Japan) (Translated).name: 杉森建
Pulseman (Japan) (Translated).original_desc: Pulseman is an electric hero who was created to fight cyber crime. Combat the galaxy gang throughout 7 stages with around 50 levels. Pulseman is best described as a fusion between the gameplay of Sonic the Hedgehog and Mega Man in ways of gameplay.
Pulseman (Japan) (Translated).desc: 脈衝曼是一位電動英雄，為打擊網絡犯罪而生。在 7 個階段、約 50 個關卡中與銀河幫作戰。《Pulseman》最好的描述是遊戲玩法上《刺猬索尼克》和《洛克人》遊戲玩法的融合。

Alien Soldier (USA) (Virtual Console).name: 異形戰士
Alien Soldier (USA) (Virtual Console).original_desc:
In the year 2015 the planet Sierra is in the grips of Xi-Tiger's Scarlet terrorists. All hope now lies with Epsilon-Eagle, a fearsome warrior with a lethal arsenal. Armed with all the hardware you can carry, blast, shoot and burn through level after level of incredible cyber-action before confronting the mighty Xi-Tiger.
Various weapons to pick up and loads of boss battles. Each boss has it's own weakness, which you must exploit. You can change forms to vary your attack pattern.
Alien Soldier (USA) (Virtual Console).desc:
2015 年，Sierra 星球落入 Xi-Tiger 的猩紅恐怖分子手中。現在所有的希望都寄託在厄普西隆鷹身上，他是一位擁有致命武器的可怕戰士。配備所有硬件，您可以攜帶、爆炸、射擊並燒毀一關又一關的令人難以置信的網絡行動，然後再面對強大的西虎。
可以拾取的各種武器和大量的頭目戰鬥。每個老闆都有自己的弱點，你必須利用它。你可以改變形式來改變你的攻擊模式。

Ballz 3D - The Battle of the Ballz (USA,.key: Ballz 3D - The Battle of the Ballz (USA, Europe)
Ballz 3D - The Battle of the Ballz (USA,.name: Ballz 3D : Fighting at Its Ballziest
Ballz 3D - The Battle of the Ballz (USA,.original_desc: Ballz is a fighting game, but what makes it uniqe is the fact that your player is made out of balls. The game has a detailed 3D engine with a fixed camera. The game plays like your normal beat 'em up game. This game supports 2 players, 3 difficulties and up to 21 matches.
Ballz 3D - The Battle of the Ballz (USA,.desc: Ballz 是一款格鬥遊戲，但它的獨特之處在於你的玩家是由球組成的。該遊戲擁有詳細的 3D 引擎和固定攝像頭。遊戲玩法就像普通的清版遊戲一樣。該遊戲支持2名玩家、3個難度、最多21場比賽。

NBA Jam - Tournament Edition (World).name: Greatest Hits
NBA Jam - Tournament Edition (World).original_desc:
This game lets you play two-on-two arcade basketball with players from all the NBA teams. Gameplay is fast and action-packed, with few rules, no fouls, and deliberately unrealistic jamming. Players are rated on eight ability categories, from steals and blocks, to dunks and 3-pointers.

Up to four human players can take part, each always controlling a single player for their team, and AI for missing players. This allows for four players to face each other in teams of two, or for two players to team up against a third player with a CPU team-mate.

The Tournament Edition ups each team's roster to three players, and allows for substitutions between quarters. Shoving players now results in injuries, which lower a player's stats; encouraging you to sub them out and let them recover. Aside from the usual secret characters and cheat modes, the T.E. also includes four new additions you can individually enable from the special options menu:

1. "Hot Spots" are randomized zones on the court that reward extra points (up to a 9-point shot!) for making a basket while standing within them.

Powerup icons appear randomly, and convey temporary arcade-like benefits when picked up. Some examples are instant "on-fire," enhanced 3-point accuracy, monster dunks from anywhere on the court, or a bomb that knocks all other players to the ground.

"Juice Mode" increases the speed of the game up to 4x.

"Tournament Mode" disables all other modes, special characters, and cheats, and challenges you to defeat all the NBA teams to unlock extra players (2 extra players for almost every team). Winning Tournament Mode also unlocks a higher CPU difficulty level.
NBA Jam - Tournament Edition (World).desc:
在這款遊戲中，您可以與所有 NBA 球隊的球員進行二對二的街機籃球比賽。遊戲玩法快速且充滿動作，規則很少，沒有犯規，也沒有故意不切實際的干擾。球員的能力分為八個類別，從搶斷和蓋帽到扣籃和三分球。

最多可以有四名人類玩家參加，每個玩家總是控制自己團隊的一名玩家，並為失踪的玩家控制人工智能。這允許四名玩家以兩人一組的形式相互對抗，或者允許兩名玩家與具有 CPU 隊友的第三名玩家組隊對抗。

錦標賽版將每支球隊的名單增加到三名球員，並允許在季度之間進行換人。推搡球員現在會導致受傷，從而降低球員的統計數據；鼓勵你將他們替換掉並讓他們恢復。除了常見的秘密角色和作弊模式之外，T.E.還包括四個新功能，您可以從特殊選項菜單中單獨啟用：

1. “熱點”是球場上的隨機區域，站在這些區域內投籃可獲得額外積分（最高 9 分投籃！）。

通電圖標隨機出現，並在拾取時傳達臨時街機般的好處。一些例子包括瞬間“火力全開”、增強的三分準確度、從球場上任何地方的怪物扣籃，或者將所有其他球員擊倒在地的炸彈。

“果汁模式”將游戲速度提高至 4 倍。

“錦標賽模式”禁用所有其他模式、特殊角色和作弊，並挑戰您擊敗所有 NBA 球隊以解鎖額外球員（幾乎每支球隊 2 名額外球員）。獲勝錦標賽模式還可以解鎖更高的 CPU 難度級別。

Road Rash (USA, Europe).name: 暴力摩托
Road Rash (USA, Europe).original_desc:
Road Rash is an aggressive motorcycle racing game where the player assumes the role of a biker who takes part in a series of illegal races across the U.S.A. Starting at the back of the pack the objective is always to finish first on a linear course, overtaking the other bikers. This is achieved by driving very well or by playing it dirty, knocking opponents of their bikes using clubs, crowbars or your bare hands. The other racers fight back in a similar fashion and there are also hazards. All the races take place on the regular road with normal traffic and the cops, as well as occasional oil slicks and stray cows.

By winning races you can get promoted to a stronger division and earn cash with which you can buy a better bike. Whenever you're knocked off your bike or hit something you will have to run back to your bike and lose valuable time, plus your bike will suffer some damage.
Road Rash (USA, Europe).desc:
《Road Rash》是一款激進的摩托車賽車遊戲，玩家扮演一名摩托車手，參加美國各地的一系列非法比賽。從後面開始，目標始終是在直線賽道上率先完成比賽，超越其他摩托車手。要達到這一目標，可以通過駕駛得很好或者玩得很骯髒，用棍棒、撬棍或徒手將對手的自行車撞倒。其他賽車手也以類似的方式進行反擊，但也存在危險。所有比賽都在常規道路上進行，交通正常，警察也正常，偶爾也會出現浮油和流浪牛。

通過贏得比賽，您可以晉升到更強大的級別，並賺取現金來購買更好的自行車。每當您從自行車上摔下來或撞到東西時，您都必須跑回自行車上，從而浪費寶貴的時間，而且您的自行車也會受到一些損壞。

Skeleton Krew (USA).name: 骷髏克魯
Skeleton Krew (USA).original_desc:
The game takes place in the year 2062. A baddy named Moribund Kadaver has assumed control of a cryogenics plant near Monstro City. Kadaver is apparently a former mortician who has dabbled in cryogenics ever since he purchased Deadly Enforcement Aggressive Destruction Incorporated, aka DEAD Inc. Now he has the power to unleash mutants called Psykogenix on the population of Monstro City! The Military Ascertainment Department (MAD) has decided to call upon the world's most vicious mercenaries: the Skeleton Krew.

Skeleton Krew has you choosing between three members of the deadly organization: Spine, Joint, and Rib. The object of the game is to make it through four planets on your way to stop Kadaver's nefarious plans.

The areas include Earth, Mars, Venus and finally the Psykogenesis Planet, where you will infiltrate DEAD HQ. A second player can join in for simultaneous play, and you can continue your game via passwords. Skeleton Krew features three difficulty levels.
Skeleton Krew (USA).desc:
遊戲發生在 2062 年。一個名叫 Moribund Kadaver 的壞人控制了怪物城附近的一家低溫工廠。卡達弗顯然是一名前殯葬師，自從他收購了致命執法積極破壞公司（又名 DEAD 公司）後，他就開始涉足低溫技術。現在，他有能力向怪物城的居民釋放一種名為 Psykogenix 的變種人！軍事探明部（MAD）決定召集世界上最邪惡的僱傭兵：骷髏克魯人。

《骷髏克魯》讓你在這個致命組織的三個成員之間進行選擇：脊柱、關節和肋骨。遊戲的目標是穿越四個行星，阻止 Kadaver 的邪惡計劃。

這些區域包括地球、火星、金星，最後是心靈起源星球，你將在那裡滲透死亡總部。第二名玩家可以加入同時玩遊戲，您可以通過密碼繼續遊戲。《骷髏克魯》具有三個難度級別。

Buck Rogers - Countdown to Doomsday (USA.key: Buck Rogers - Countdown to Doomsday (USA, Europe)
Buck Rogers - Countdown to Doomsday (USA.name: 巴克·羅傑斯：世界末日倒計時
Buck Rogers - Countdown to Doomsday (USA.original_desc:
It is the year 2456.

Humanity has spread across the terraformed planets and satellites of the solar system. Colonies drift though the upper regions of the Jupiter gas clouds and cities have been carved out of asteroids. Mars, the seat of power among the inner worlds, is home to a powerful, despotic Russo-American Mercantile (RAM). Its goal: The enslavement of the solar system.

But what of Earth?

The ancesteral home of mankind now struggles to overcome the devistation of war and pollution. All hope for a return to its former glory lies in a daring band of rebels, the New Earth Organization (NEO) led by Buck Rogers.

Now you and the members of your team can join Buck and his allies to rid the solar system of RAM tyranny!
Buck Rogers - Countdown to Doomsday (USA.desc:
這是2456年。

人類已經遍布太陽系的改造行星和衛星。殖民地漂流過木星氣體雲的上部區域，而城市則由小行星雕刻而成。火星是內部世界的權力所在地，也是強大、專制的俄美商人（RAM）的家園。它的目標：奴役太陽系。

但地球呢？

人類祖先的家園現在正在努力克服戰爭和污染的破壞。恢復昔日輝煌的所有希望都寄託在巴克·羅傑斯領導的一群勇敢的叛逆者身上，即新地球組織（NEO）。

現在你和你的團隊成員可以與巴克和他的盟友一起消滅太陽系的 RAM 暴政！

Haunting Starring Polterguy (USA, Europe.name: 《鬧鬼》主演 波爾特吉
Haunting Starring Polterguy (USA, Europe.original_desc: The ghost of a teenager seeks revenge against a snobbish family.  Your job is to scare them out of their house(s).  They can't see you so your only means of scaring them is by possessing various objects throughout the household.  For example, possessing a piece of furniture would cause something to fly out from it and possessing an object would make it come alive in some way or another.  You need to act quickly because you have something called "ecto" which acts as the fuel that allows you to roam the real world.  You're awarded more ecto each time a family member exists the room.  The more scares you did, the more ecto you gain.  Losing all ecto sends you to the underworld where you have to regain your ecto to full capacity in order to go back into the real world.
Haunting Starring Polterguy (USA, Europe.desc: 一名青少年的鬼魂尋求向一個勢利的家庭復仇。你的工作就是把他們嚇出家門。他們看不到你，所以你嚇唬他們的唯一方法就是在家裡擁有各種物品。例如，擁有一件家具會導致某些東西從其中飛出，擁有一個物體會使其以某種方式活起來。你需要迅速採取行動，因為你有一種叫做“ecto”的東西，它可以作為讓你在現實世界中漫遊的燃料。每次有家庭成員進入房間時，您都會獲得更多的 ecto 獎勵。你製造的恐懼越多，你獲得的外在就越多。失去所有的 ecto 會將你帶到地獄，在那裡你必須完全恢復你的 ecto 才能回到現實世界。

Dynamite Headdy (USA, Europe).name: 电子游戏开发商列表
Dynamite Headdy (USA, Europe).original_desc:
Dynamite Headdy is a platformer... with a difference. You control a little character whose main attack comes from his disembodied head. Yes, years before Rayman appeared, we already had a hero who used detachable appendages to attack his enemies.

Rather than the traditional power-ups, Dynamite Headdy enables you to swap your head for different kinds – such as heads that heal you or heads that stick on to walls. You use your head in order to climb up on platforms as well, as you can grab hold of things with it, and on certain stages of the Mega Drive/Genesis version it is used to turn the game into a side-scrolling shooter, as you gain a propeller, jet, or bird head. Basically, Dynamite Headdy is just a traditional platformer at heart.
Dynamite Headdy (USA, Europe).desc:
Dynamite Headaddy 是一款與眾不同的平台遊戲。你控制一個小角色，其主要攻擊來自他脫離實體的頭部。是的，早在雷曼出現之前的幾年，我們就已經有了一位使用可拆卸附肢攻擊敵人的英雄。

與傳統的強化道具不同，Dynamite Headaddy 可以讓你將你的頭換成不同類型的頭 - 例如可以治愈你的頭或粘在牆上的頭。你也可以用你的頭爬上平台，因為你可以用它抓住東西，並且在 Mega Drive/Genesis 版本的某些階段，當你獲得螺旋槳、噴氣機或鳥頭時，它可以將游戲變成橫向捲軸射擊遊戲。基本上，Dynamite Headaddy 本質上只是一款傳統的平台遊戲。

James Pond II - Codename - Robocod (USA,.key: James Pond II - Codename - Robocod (USA, Europe)
James Pond II - Codename - Robocod (USA,.name: Game Boy Advance游戏列表
James Pond II - Codename - Robocod (USA,.original_desc:
In his second adventure James Pond must retrieve the toys Dr Maybe has stolen. Pond has been armed with an Inspector Gadget-style stretch device, which he can use to view higher areas or claw onto ceilings so as to slide across them.

The gameplay takes place across worlds themed around particular types of toys, such as sporting goods, candy and aircraft. The levels scroll sideways, although a small amount of vertical movement is included. On each level Pond must collect 2 penguins and reach the exit, although there are usually multiple exits and lots of secret areas to explore. After completing each pair of two worlds (each of which has three sub levels), a boss must be faced.
James Pond II - Codename - Robocod (USA,.desc:
在他的第二次冒險中，詹姆斯·龐德必須找回梅博士偷走的玩具。龐德配備了一個檢查員小工具式的拉伸裝置，他可以用它來觀察更高的區域或抓住天花板以便滑過它們。

遊戲玩法發生在以特定類型玩具為主題的世界中，例如體育用品、糖果和飛機。儘管包含少量的垂直移動，但水平面會橫向滾動。儘管通常有多個出口和許多秘密區域可供探索，但每個級別的池塘都必須收集 2 只企鵝並到達出口。完成每對兩個世界（每個世界有三個子級別）後，必鬚麵對一個老闆。
